message.subject: A thank you gift – my book excerpt
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=245bc1552d91fc3ba8f527d8a7f1c2e922524d633e656411fd ab9be2a298ca89639316707fe225d1 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b18039fa287901ef4db5200f9f70dfb299fecf40df69a1a18e 18176148dd3626273624311ccb8628 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cccc5ce6ea216c61efd99ea8a880bc65419062dbb5b41404a1 936a492da4961a99c1944eb0f97dcb preferences linguistiques
Michael --
Thank you for taking action.
Your generous donation to our Q3 fundraising drive is already helping Team Trudeau prepare for the most important day ahead: Election Day, October 19, 2015.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f28e1bb85ee26f8ef681431f1dacb1c8ed56c30aeaeb3bd558 f4707a5e131d4cb79366af3bc76f4a As a special thank you, here is your sneak preview from my new book Common Ground , published by Harper Collins.It just launched today and you’ll be among the first in Canada to read an excerpt.
Michael, your hope and hard work is making all the difference on the road to Election Day.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=29044ef112deca42a82bb3dca783edbdec5b86c67a1fe65ac9 dadf7e7deb3a55604d58190da1ea58

message.subject: On our shared National Tragedy
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0d20b049684e843418720ee2f4fee6e647bb05e6d02581b7d6 b8fe4545a97a23e6dc55eed6a63103 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9ec22d881c17170b26ab65a2b3802073c34c7009da4c492c25 b113c89dda639d0b4ef2c40c43344f version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d1030d4c418e1a4138cc28868a963f30b29a748864dae47ce5 1f38c98ed6839b374d89d6f6d1de85 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
I am deeply saddened by yesterday’s horrific events here in Ottawa, and unreservedly condemn these brutal and heartless acts of violence.
This attack is unforgivable. Should any other perpetrators or co-conspirators exist, they must be caught and be punished to the full force of our laws. I’ve extended an offer of full support to the government, along with any assistance members of our Party can provide at this time.
My thoughts and prayers, along with those of my colleagues, go out to the family and friends of the victims of this horrific shooting, including Corporal Nathan Frank Cirillo, who was standing dutifully, guarding one of our nation’s most sacred monuments.
Words cannot express the deep sadness we feel over his loss.
To the brave women and men who rushed to the scene to confront the shooter, and help keep us safe, I can say only thank you. Thank you for your selfless courage and your professionalism in a time of crisis.
In the days that follow, there will be questions, anger, and perhaps confusion. This is natural, but we cannot let it get the better of us. Losing ourselves to fear and speculation is the intention of those who commit these heinous acts.
They mean to shake us. We will remain resolved.
They want us to forget ourselves. Instead, we should remember.
We should remember who we are. We are a proud democracy, a welcoming and peaceful nation, and a country of open arms and open hearts. We are a nation of fairness, justice, and the rule of law.
We will not be intimidated into changing that.
If anything, these are the values and principles to which we must hold on even tighter. Our dedication to democracy and the institutions we have built are the foundation of our society. A continued belief in both will guide us correctly into the future. Staying true to our values in a time of crisis will make us an example to the world.
Criminals cannot and will not dictate to us how we act as a nation, how we govern ourselves, or how we treat each other. They cannot and will not dictate our values. And they do not get to decide how we use our shared public spaces.
Yesterday we heard about a loss of innocence in Canada. This is inaccurate. Canada is not innocent to the threats we face, and we know that we are not immune. What is true is that we have not let those threats shape us, and we have never bowed to those who mean to undermine our values and way of life.
We have remained Canadians. And this should be how we will carry on.
We deserve answers to how and why this happened. They will be vital in preventing any potential future attack.
To our friends and fellow citizens in the Muslim community, Canadians know acts such as these committed in the name of Islam are an aberration of your faith. Continued mutual cooperation and respect will help prevent the influence of distorted ideological propaganda posing as religion. We will walk forward together, not apart.
In the coming days, we will be inundated with pictures and videos showing what happened. But there is one in particular we should remember: the picture in our minds we have of a Canadian guarding Canadians. That is who we truly are. That is who we will continue to be.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9cdd5218086656177ed2413c217a985e435e6b7c7d22474ae2 166663529ad16ab5e399c4f717c6d3 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=22f708d92e4c5b4f62732c7e6f6d4598656a8e10baba37cf58 e3a145b43f9d487865c22b579ec48c Unsubscribe

message.subject: Canadians have asked. Here’s our answer:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0ef3484ae1b7c0319096b58ce87b273633bcd1d0e24fdb9b81 e3a68d1464855fa8912b9905a030be http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1871a16248e0d302ee2a72d091c77eb9e5b1ed4c4040c903ca b300006ced8b3d0d150cf15d8617b2 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b13187b160098cd91dbe9e937baa48af791e583b75b19cefa0 21f05abad22783c0a40c893ee827d5 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
Justin Trudeau sat down with me and some of the other Team Trudeau candidates to discuss issues that are on Canadians’ minds. I’m sharing these videos with you because I want you to hear our views on several key matters.
This “Team Trudeau on the Issues” video series focuses on a wide variety of topics, including leadership, local needs, resource development, team building and the urban agenda.
Get access to all eight conversations by clicking any of the topics below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bf5f1994d4e19743c97e93ca8652b2ac2b2c26890d9fc4c581 4f28ce077c65ba7f6fb12dcf4e3474
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bf5f1994d4e19743c97e93ca8652b2ac2b2c26890d9fc4c581 4f28ce077c65ba7f6fb12dcf4e3474
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bf5f1994d4e19743c97e93ca8652b2ac2b2c26890d9fc4c581 4f28ce077c65ba7f6fb12dcf4e3474
The conversation is just getting started. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bf5f1994d4e19743c97e93ca8652b2ac2b2c26890d9fc4c581 4f28ce077c65ba7f6fb12dcf4e3474 Watch all the videos here.
Thank you.
Chrystia Freeland
MP, Toronto Centre
Team Trudeau Candidate
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cf23b9615e6df2216a75df05799472924ffd12daedbe1ef393 15f7a68515122039ebfbfdfa7915c3

message.subject: Michael, I’ll keep it short
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eb6f28cc50d70a918c26b085d46e2a9d6ae5ce852dffc6a0 1596c828dc2941a36aa71dbacfb345 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eb6f28cc50d70a06d84549641dd7c2eee6511b2112e7d387 9afc6949d730e27e4e568d0af4d09b version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0928e7b6f2edc88cfd1b0cd94fdce2ab34ef5197b07eb1ab15 ce939426cb9dbe87f579b75ed5d1cb preferences linguistiques
Michael --
I’ll keep this short.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0928e7b6f2edc88c32465dd5a01cb36776792a6b1125633d21 cc79783b1f1de726edfe359381b85e
We have just five days to turn this number -- our live donation counter -- into $350,000.
That’s five days to rally together in the name of hope, hard work and the vision of Canada we’re all working for.
So far, 595 Canadians have donated $30,886 in response to an email just like this one since our October fundraising drive began. But we haven’t heard from you.
Michael, take a look at this, and then please give:
5 DAYS LEFT!
-- October fundraising goal: $350,000 -- Difference needed by midnight, October 31: $319,114 -- Suggested donation: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0928e7b6f2edc88c32465dd5a01cb36776792a6b1125633d21 cc79783b1f1de726edfe359381b85e $8
-- Donate here: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0928e7b6f2edc88c32465dd5a01cb36776792a6b1125633d21 cc79783b1f1de726edfe359381b85e http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0928e7b6f2edc88c32465dd5a01cb36776792a6b1125633d21 cc79783b1f1de726edfe359381b85e
Michael, with less than one year to the election, your support is essential in driving positive change.
Thank you.
Jeremy Broadhurst
National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
PS. You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET every day from October 27 to October 31 (if you don’t get through, please try again). Everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from Justin Trudeau’s new book Common Ground.

message.subject: Proof you can help us win
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a0387669e7e469ac49031f82d880ef1ad999 88119a9bc18db35a3cd517b9c83999 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a0679ed63195ebd3773274d124221d4033c8 c419f3b851d7a140db5573a0e1ef49 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a009b3edf51dfade43074f558f4fd807f923 ed04e71bf48aa3056ee0adb6c683cc preferences linguistiques
Michael --
As a recently elected MP, I know from experience just how divisive election campaigns can be.
But there’s just no place in politics anymore for cynicism and attacks. It’s not constructive. And there’s just too much at stake for Canadians right now.
That’s why, with two by-elections just around the corner in Ontario and Alberta -- with volunteers to train, phone calls to make, brochures to print and more -- it’s so important we raise $350,000 by midnight, this Friday, October 31.
So far in our fundraising drive, XXX Canadians have stepped up to donate $XX,XXX in response to an email like this one.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a00fc7ddabfed7c99067e097d609dd37c252 3e496a3907fc75c51ede777bba51c9 Donate $8 right now to help us hit $350,000 by midnight October 31.
I’m so proud of our two Team Trudeau by-election candidates who are working hard for positive change in their communities, every single day.
Celina Caesar-Chavannes, our Team Trudeau candidate in Whitby--Oshawa is an entrepreneur, mother of three and acclaimed researcher. And she’s going to make an incredible MP.
Meanwhile, Ryan Maguhn of Yellowhead is a proud, lifelong Albertan, former Town councillor and a father, who is working hard to build on our historic momentum in Alberta in the last 12 months.
Michael, the best way to show that hope, hard work and a commitment to positive politics is what Canadians want is to donate and help send these two great candidates to Ottawa as Liberal MPs.
Thank you.
Adam Vaughan
MP, Trinity--Spadina
PS: You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET tonight (if you don’t get through, please try again). Don’t forget, everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from Justin Trudeau’s new book Common Ground.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a010b8547e2f7b56eb30068bfd659f64f149 eb309d8a784d1a3f782fd835b65963
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a0c4b0e1be44907b44597ea875f24316cb99 8ebea5e920b82f84349828809bd582 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a03b0f528849a5e6790fcae0c170073654ae 19790ec71decc5806c63011040ef33 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da2d9445b36f60a09bc42786c2b7d1e88b94b555201e475fae caa22158bb79617d0a64a3ab837365 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Michael, is this correct?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9800893cf83b3f9f71d81c63183e2a22dc658228580aa8329d 70a22d9afb9ddf31f51c12ff62b415 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9800893cf83b3f9f02a77d5528e5f67631b1370856bc69dbb8 9082fe3f67c7c621b2661acd46d6f5 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2430882d32b53e2dcd7dd8c26f96ae7243089d3de7fa0bcb ac870779c5584aab58faffba6b5dd5 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
With 72 hours left, 1,184 Canadians have donated $63,516 as we work to raise $350,000 before our Halloween deadline of midnight, October 31.
I still don’t have you down for a donation, so here’s your 2014 donation history to help:
Donor: Michael
October Fundraising Drive donation status: PENDING*
Total donated nationally in 2014:$10 (You have $1,190 in contribution room left in 2014)
Recommended donation: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2430882d32b53ef6c177d9fce4124aa1a9b0191da8783c40 df699fb44ccb02d384efc918f35322 $8
There’s just no place in politics anymore for cynicism and attacks. It’s not constructive. And there’s just too much at stake for Canadians right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2430882d32b53ef6c177d9fce4124aa1a9b0191da8783c40 df699fb44ccb02d384efc918f35322 If you want a government that stands for hope, hard work and a commitment to positive politics, we need your support today.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman
Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
PS. You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET every day from October 27 to October 31 (if you don’t get through, please try again). Everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from Justin Trudeau’s new book Common Ground.
----
*Your 2014 donor history record is for this exact email address. If you made a recent online contribution, or contributed by check or by mail, this may not be reflected in your 2014 donor history -- thank you for your support!
Please note: Yesterday, you might have received an email that was missing the number of donors to this campaign. The current numbers are included in this email.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2430882d32b53ef6c177d9fce4124aa1a9b0191da8783c40 df699fb44ccb02d384efc918f35322
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2430882d32b53eeb90b2b547b00afa9a0709cac96e7d675e 8ddf4f59dc08309fa601f7cae83c2a here to view our policy.

message.subject: A complete outrage
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cd03547efb946fafcb8479091c261fd041116a7274c6a64a09 bd718a176f3e4344f4387f3a69f9dd http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba7942715a1985b8bc1570a0d0619c7302e47 6f005a79c373eed5c085b8eb2b494d version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba778d6b5eb22482b13aa015d0f7156450ab6 7ba1f83ca6354e6952f592eab3bea2 preferences linguistiques
Michael -- this is urgent.
The Conservatives have launched a new negative personal attack ad on Justin Trudeau.
There’s just no place in politics anymore for cynicism and attacks like this. It’s not constructive. And there’s just too much at stake for Canadians right now.
We don’t know if this attack will air on TV or just online, but we do know that it will hurt our positive movement each time it plays. We need to act swiftly to stop it now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba771b515d6140d040068d3dc7e4505d0f80e dbdab7efd33157e3fe8ce28ad3da80 Please donate $8 right now -- help hit $350,000 by midnight October 31 so we can fight these Conservative negative personal attacks before they do real damage.
The Conservatives are gearing up to spend millions on attacks like these.
While the Conservatives are focused on attacking us, Justin Trudeau is focused on Canadians and focused on you.
That’s why we’re thrilled that since this fundraising drive began, 1,778 Canadians have stepped up to donate $100,303 in response to an email like this one.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba771b515d6140d040068d3dc7e4505d0f80e dbdab7efd33157e3fe8ce28ad3da80 Michael, if we’re going to reach our goal of raising $350,000 by midnight October 31, we need your help.
Thank you.
Ralph Goodale
Deputy Leader
PS. You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET every day from October 27 to October 31 (if you don’t get through, please try again). Everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from Justin Trudeau’s new book Common Ground.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba771b515d6140d040068d3dc7e4505d0f80e dbdab7efd33157e3fe8ce28ad3da80
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba70ed538554d457ce93709fd61ea28da89e0 63494efefb66a1724b8cb8d0698c61 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba787b6e1d3e9a0e1d3b86f2d7d60775f1e00 872554ec4cb2dff72d36749c2b6604 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bd57092d5525fba727889ea1bc3c4d846930537a3dda009b7b 178a399d66b8c3e565bac56c870599 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Nothing is spookier than this:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b269ec2c475155055a1db799bf66915840aa 5c52ae814b472159fb1be3a2b46110 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b2ed7d128e231a4706b3614e0d590cff67c7 5f92e906f98cf903d41a9ee22c6781 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b2b8b0c3e47de5d48cffdc7ac48e9e2763d1 6c803d7461b26b63573b08040bd25e preferences linguistiques
It’s that time of year again – Halloween’s just around the corner.
And you know what spooks us the most?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b28effcb0541237e313c907a38e060507c53 6dacf958a3135438c62ff162459724
It could happen if they keep outraising us.
Thankfully, there’s something you can do about it:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b28effcb0541237e313c907a38e060507c53 6dacf958a3135438c62ff162459724 DONATE NOW
----
You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET every day from October 27 to October 31 (if you don’t get through, please try again).
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b201ff5c94cfb3d9fe82ee6d7f194c8b9f4e 414fbabefe042428ea17d0a85336f0 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a3dd7e72b044c8b254898bf933e03c5ab040db19feffc1fc7f 9c23d5ff4c74d523dc2732ed18ae4d Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=43970a01ceaed2f2fedac9e87c98ebdba97a679631514e2678 00d092441f6c52113814cb4d753a35 here to view our policy.
20141030LPC - Email 7 - LPC - DONOR - EN

message.subject: Heartening
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184dc4c5dd8035f15a249f86a2a6dacc3f68fe 1bfc3a4f6a84dfd5fc8dfb69ae4769 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d5036fd7bf8921de1981ba0af4e73b5d7a9 c225aae6fc4fc9a78d07dbffb3762d version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d70c6aa3c109c10b1e08d0ac8dd98c9e5cf 208e734349d23064c06736e0e6a911 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
Thank you for everything you do.
Every day our movement for change is growing stronger. And it’s no secret why.
Since this fundraising drive began, 2,533 Canadians have stepped up to donate $140,237 in response to an email like this one.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d80fb4bf0a3cb3d9cc55333cf9cc1d4f2a4 905e4f29f5118e8cd5807d37bbe3b3 Michael, now I’m asking you: can you donate $8 and help us reach $350,000 by midnight?
Thanks for chipping in before the deadline.
Justin Trudeau
PS: You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET tonight (if you don’t get through, please try again). Don’t forget, everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from my new book Common Ground.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d80fb4bf0a3cb3d9cc55333cf9cc1d4f2a4 905e4f29f5118e8cd5807d37bbe3b3
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d2f939ae466b906a9e223fa9ec602ad3183 50cfcaac7aa961476b066aa3fcc5d2 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184db2a476a8d0509960daedcf1ff90518dc2b f63847a4a37fd21f7083ccbd4f0ce2 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=190eee5f8fa1184d415c44ca371b18138387fb3316366db9cf c87822ebd7a016513a085a62142eab here to view our policy.
20141030JT - Email 8 - JT - DONOR - EN

message.subject: Urgent update
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041d9671b40a7ad622001e6a7bfeac2716c9c d2941308a3cc51fa34e1bef018a8c9 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041be546e534e64a5c72fbb1c115179a33451 ecaa1c45b9ad8fa443344d89f3c025 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041554bd0efcdcb288a5b79f0da83e6c53a82 5ad9f4f4436bd7c42f2c4e566eff2d preferences linguistiques
Michael -- this isn’t just scary because it’s Halloween. It’s scary because it’s real.
The Conservatives just outraised us again.
Third quarter results were released today, and while we raised an incredible $3.3M, the Conservatives raised a threatening $4.2M. What’s more, with 34,953 donors, we trailed the Conservatives by only 248 donors. If that shows us anything, it’s that every donor counts!
Michael -- it’s going to get even scarier if we don’t hit our October fundraising goal -- and we have just a few hours left to do it!
Take a look at this urgent update below -- http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a0417094e4750fe9a91abe3a52c2cfbe95457e dc728d79b0c265a1fbf0939ffb199e and chip in right now :
DEADLINE MIDNIGHT!
-- End-of-third-quarter fundraising goal: $350,000
-- Difference needed by midnight tonight: $171,647
-- Suggested donation to help us close the gap: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a0417094e4750fe9a91abe3a52c2cfbe95457e dc728d79b0c265a1fbf0939ffb199e $8
Michael, we’re down to the wire and won’t hit our goal without you -- http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a0417094e4750fe9a91abe3a52c2cfbe95457e dc728d79b0c265a1fbf0939ffb199e so please donate now.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman
Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
PS. You can always donate by phone at 1-888-542-3725. Our lines are open until 5pm ET tonight (if you don’t get through, please try again). Everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from Justin Trudeau’s new book Common Ground.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a0417094e4750fe9a91abe3a52c2cfbe95457e dc728d79b0c265a1fbf0939ffb199e
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041f6d938a85febd02270e40fa52b5381580e d6e4c8c15e02694c213ae6a90dd2b5 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041553d378ddac90a4ded0a9a1d729ffe9678 bbb491487352f54cf50c59f4dcc79d Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3dfea43a7b96a041b081c6891eb1efccfa743a656246a458fe 564dd50002ff07caf3638832cefea4 here to view our policy.
20141031SB - Email 9 - SB - DONOR - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Bad policy
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5118e1ad54cb15a5c5f64fd4746eb9c7c742dddd67ce87a29b fd7bc4d18f944d40b3373b42367c5d http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5118e1ad54cb15a516fc0e7bba716e7628eb4eec449e75d799 9a5f9ae773ce0813a68481640dd786 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5118e1ad54cb15a5aa0d6d86dab6004d66fb99f7f375b53544 ef395dfae8979ca806fdcebdc001a9 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
One last word before tonight’s fundraising deadline.
By now you’ve probably heard about Stephen Harper’s income splitting announcement.
It is simply not fair that middle class families should have to pay more to give families like Mr. Harper’s and mine a $2,000 tax break.
There’s a line the government likes to repeat a lot: they say they’re all about jobs and growth. But even they know these tax cuts won’t grow the economy... and won’t create a single job. These cuts are a bad idea. We know that. Jim Flaherty knew that. These tax cuts won’t help most Canadians. They will only divide us.
They are bad policy, and we oppose them without hesitation.
Canada has been built by people who work hard to make sure their kids have a better life than they did. And every day, middle class Canadians everywhere continue to do that. We have a responsibility to ensure that hard work is not done in vain.
That’s the kind of government our movement is working toward. One that works for all Canadians. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5118e1ad54cb15a5ddda330495f1ee7ee042d0020af0269449 1159e761838ce3ca31bedd7086c6f4 And that’s why it’s so important that you pitch in $8, now, before midnight.
Last quarter, the Conservatives outraised us by almost a million dollars. And 248 more Canadians donated to their cause than to ours. Nothing should offer better proof that every donor counts.
Let’s give it everything we’ve got to hit $350,000 by midnight.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
PS: Don’t forget, everyone who gives will also receive an electronic preview from my new book Common Ground.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5118e1ad54cb15a5ddda330495f1ee7ee042d0020af0269449 1159e761838ce3ca31bedd7086c6f4

message.subject: 85% of Canadians DON'T benefit
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8af1ff95fdee6f1984cca6bdd1c9d9369e823d0d9ac6eb6cac 3b643be5a41e4b7804d95e84a3ea0f http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8af1ff95fdee6f19fb8be6e101df9397da2f92fe7b2125f20d 51706ff69bde832bfa2388c9e268e6 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8af1ff95fdee6f1925bc36e6eb21bf267da9b28022c3183eb4 cf29090982c00cc2edcc65af589b83 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
While Conservative Members of Parliament, earning $163,700 a year, are sharing their excitement about the Harper government’s income-splitting tax scheme, experts across the country are unified in dismissing it as bad policy:
- “Most families would receive no benefit whatsoever.” - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8af1ff95fdee6f1986f4d2228771bde1d15dd4b9ef47d5ba5b 72d4360d0ad7f21ea459942bdfb9c8 Canadian Centre for Policy Alternatives, Jan ‘14
- “85 per cent of Canadian taxpayers will get precisely nothing from this cut… There is no justification whatsoever for introducing income-splitting on social or economic grounds.” - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dc2081907ddf0a27527b8cf2dec3c231adc529519e57a9e2bd 0cfa05e5f533eaf2e71bfb06077a75 Scott Clark and Peter DeVries, iPolitics, Oct ‘14
- “The Harper government’s parental income splitting plan is designed in such a way that guarantees it will only make a difference to the richest Canadians.” - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dc2081907ddf0a2738a859e4c825ef33f9827b71c6fb58d6dd 1c85bacbfa659fdbbdf9a92d359ffb Kathleen Lahey, Professor, Queen’s University, The Globe and Mail, Oct ‘14
They’re not alone. The late former Conservative Finance Minister, Jim Flaherty, spoke out against it. And, just days ago, Minister of State for Social Development Candice Bergen acknowledged that income splitting won’t benefit single-parent families. What’s the point of a tax cut if it doesn’t help those who need it most?
Our stance is clear:It is simply not fair that middle-class families should have to pay more to give families like Mr. Harper’s a $2,000 tax break.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dc2081907ddf0a27b9f2036bf51764186c835ce0a9606f7c3e 45696c086866858471941a546a6fad Michael, read this op-ed to find out why Justin Trudeau is speaking out against income splitting.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dc2081907ddf0a27b9f2036bf51764186c835ce0a9606f7c3e 45696c086866858471941a546a6fad If you think income splitting is unfair because it only benefits a small percentage of Canadians, please sign this petition.
Thank you.
Scott Brison
Liberal Finance Critic
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dc2081907ddf0a2791246040127543f79939aaa0fae0fca426 a701a71b1db9393647eadc54464e0e

message.subject: Thank you – and our results
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6a4c9f3fb3992e20877ff18b27533c21ced665fae243a794ca 74332f28b8938f6ea02cfef8aa9098 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6a4c9f3fb3992e208bd9d5b9aa1dbfd15b00bbf1ab74b1fd6e 525d525f3aaec64902a119245c3f11 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6a4c9f3fb3992e2076438a01cd61497134dd81f6797be6a9d1 8d0d2f6b1c3e77b6fa903efd264879 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
It takes a massive team effort to accomplish what we did in just ten days. You are an integral part of our Liberal team -- and I simply can't thank you enough for making our October fundraising drive a success.
Have a look:
What's more, we raised 3.3 million dollars in all of Q3. But this is an election year -- our most important job lies ahead. And the Conservatives outraised us by almost one million dollars and had 248 more donors last quarter.
It highlights the importance every single donor makes -- thank you! And it's all the more reason we need your continued hope and hard work to help build a better government for Canada.
Thank you.
Christina Topp
Senior Director Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6a4c9f3fb3992e2007e10c9a1077c95a287f1d4ddcc0cbcdfa f10528763d5b89ab26c6198c75be7b

message.subject: On behalf of a grateful nation
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4dc29e2cba3108c03bf3c9b78122129056e173bd9bf2e4a66e 91a7c303096653f437350c2691d784 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4dc29e2cba3108c08d6e2252f3b4b9984c7be97272f85f7f09 5e50b41861db56ece8bec355ad8c21 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4dc29e2cba3108c0974524ccacc2bea74dec32255f3ab46c80 54216383f7bc5063f76a9b9afd68ed preferences linguistiques
Michael --
This Remembrance Day, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4dc29e2cba3108c0e8c929532a2f1b0b7307a6574921bdc3f6 8f1b7a50a06c6ba7943c971abdb602 please join me in honouring the bravery of our men and women in uniform.
As Canadians we owe an immense debt to the members of our armed forces, both past and present. Their courage throughout history, and among recent events, is an important reminder of the sacrifices made for the freedoms we all cherish.
We have a social covenant with our veterans and their families – a sacred obligation that ensures that those who serve, and their families, will have nothing less than the very best care and support on behalf of a grateful nation.
To the dedicated men and women of Canada’s Armed Forces -- on behalf of a grateful nation, I extend my deepest thanks for your dedication, bravery and your invaluable contributions in helping to weave the fabric of Canadian democracy.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
This email was sent to: mailto:liberal@mikesmit.com liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Thank you Celina and Ryan
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9fdc85393fc4f309070091ddb02bf479bea8cfa2b05c3d0d1d feb3391ccf1188e5a5d0ed5ac95ce8 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9fdc85393fc4f3092690a556da999f9a759d0ea4d266b2e1b8 11ab46a4612f352ddcfaab2506cccd version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9fdc85393fc4f3093224d037de2e46eb032618d0a3a0cd7b24 77ae81c6e86def230edb7f80eaca41 preferences linguistiques
Michael --
It’s been an incredible evening!
I am so proud of the two phenomenal Liberal candidates who’ve made impressive gains in today’s by-elections: Celina Caesar-Chavannes in Whitby-Oshawa, Ontario, and Ryan Maguhn in Yellowhead, Alberta. The Liberal Party of Canada is the only party to increase support in all 11 by-elections since April 2013.
After weeks of campaigning, they’ve shown us the real meaning of hope and hard work.
Michael, please consider joining me in thanking Ryan and Celina:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=181054d6b22514d106dd28fa0f83eb665bda8cb4391d40af74 709523a39e0a965e3e0c30be376dec Click here to thank our candidates and watch my speech at tonight’s results rally.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=181054d6b22514d1e2c24ba1f1d3a4ba1f64293ac2b194576c 9f0e65617b0211050ee810676196ec

message.subject: VIDEO: 5 measures Ottawa should take
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=db83799326445977e6eef2b7e021fe4825cfc9e54bc12bf606 39775010837b49cc9abd8670abf479 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=db837993264459778fc634608c612f11197b0eb0552753a374 5f6be486ab012e2e116655b5dbd202 version francaise | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=db837993264459770e78adf105d29588e1018f5be03b4edf91 84afa3230f15b73fa3db91dede83a6 preferences linguistiques
Michael, it’s simple really.
Canadians are looking for a better, open and modern government. A Government where information is open by default. That’s why I’ve made my Private Member's Bill, The Transparency Act, a top priority.
Over 15,000 Canadians have helped shape this bill.The official debate began last night in the House of Commons – and you can have your say before the vote!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=db83799326445977d2095ccfe38a5cb5248affb1d598146e09 9db222298ca95c2b60cee17677549c Watch this video on the five measures I propose to improve transparency in Ottawa -- then add your name.
Michael, it’s our government, and I want to know that you stand with me for openness and transparency.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=db83799326445977acd37633a0e7cb5ddf918770ea80a800a5 a7b527eafa25e736785d7dfefe43a5

message.subject: SURVEY: I’ll be reviewing the results personally
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f7514f75de7cf28ca4c35c837be6f934edc80d6ebb87486aa3 704811e9b27ffb2ba1c565b365d96cSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f7514f75de7cf28c6200a1a0c9d8a8c685c6ddc62f02d4cee0 450d43c804e1128a835170b7167c1b Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f7514f75de7cf28c8dc1479854cb85960ca577ccd73a562d0e 9d702da54b9748511633484f2d049a Préférences linguistiques
Michael --
I’m asking 25,000 Canadians to participate in our 5-Question Platform Consultation before midnight, November 30, and I’d like you to be among the first.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f7514f75de7cf28c3919ba10398539bea19e4420e01b4b7983 87e6ed8204ec0772caec4536e6d9b5 Start Right Now →
I will be reviewing the results personally. Your answers will help shape the next Liberal platform.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Michael, we haven't heard from you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a72784372966928bdea15253a3bb8bfddc68 475b532775373e8f083019581ad8f2Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a74a4fcfb404e4c49bfcf20dee1e395753f0 c68b431dc6b1f540cdc66724e3ea09 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a7768658f7745cac69714c81debebb08a25a 0f6b3cc3ce76db72c241f377ad3766 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a78e40387dbbd27d78c85c79072a5f570f4e 6c643615c813cc4a74c871182b6ee7
Remember this picture, Michael? Taken October 8, it shows Liberal MPs poring over the results of the last survey we sent our supporters.
Now Justin Trudeau wants your input on the next Liberal Platform. 23,990 Canadians have responded already.
But we haven't heard from you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a78e40387dbbd27d78c85c79072a5f570f4e 6c643615c813cc4a74c871182b6ee7 Start Right Now →
Be one of 50,000 Canadians to participate in our 5-Question Platform Consultation before midnight November 30.
Thank you.
Ralph Goodale Deputy Leader
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ea875a90d64e48a7d1dd4626640c1351bb361141655eb7462d cd3f361f52ea4af6bd6d9c9a1b833e Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: Reminder: 5-Question Platform Consultation
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d992ebd53ee1cee37f3089cd7c4ee6ef53c3aad96b51161e4e e64edf525211a4c9a1f28face8c84aSimple Liberal Email Template

Michael -- We don’t want you to miss your chance to help shape the next Liberal Platform. That’s why I wanted to remind you that there’s still time to participate in the 5-Question Platform Consultation.
Responses: 29,344
Michael's Response Status: PENDING
Michael, Justin Trudeau will be reviewing the results personally -- and he wants to hear from you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d992ebd53ee1cee3e39419e9aa15f731620feab9fa9cfd40cb a09cb97635b451c427fda9b69a1e45 Start Right Now →
Thank you.
Anna Gainey President of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Trending at LPC: November 2014
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabba13ec4a5c07ca53078add3d4825ebe2cf7 a6542fbb6ccd656c50c11899c157d8
This new monthly newsletter will help you keep up with the latest happenings at LPC. Enjoy!
>From the Leader's Desk
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabb7e98e4697b840c7bd4bda037c2c0134735 e3058d81bbdb0558cdf3b0a7f7473f Michael --
We have a sacred obligation to those who serve in uniform and their families. Liberals’ priority is ensuring that our veterans have nothing less than the best of care and support from a grateful nation.
On Tuesday, the Auditor General issued a report that serves as a shameful reminder of the Conservatives’ record on Canadian veterans.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabb7e98e4697b840c7bd4bda037c2c0134735 e3058d81bbdb0558cdf3b0a7f7473f Full Message →

What's New at LPC http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabb85934573421c11cf70a2b2953a15a0b4df 5c6e3518375648bf8304ef62ff0603 A brand new liberal.ca http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabb85934573421c11cf70a2b2953a15a0b4df 5c6e3518375648bf8304ef62ff0603
The new Liberal.ca is now election-ready, with a focus on building the team, building the plan and helping Canadians learn more about Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabb85934573421c11cf70a2b2953a15a0b4df 5c6e3518375648bf8304ef62ff0603 Read More →Road to Victory in 2015 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabbff0aee2d033f46d35dabb60bda92bdeade c447eaf98d0d4353195447645348b9 322 days to the fixed election date http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabbff0aee2d033f46d35dabb60bda92bdeade c447eaf98d0d4353195447645348b9
More than 160 Team Trudeau candidates, including more than 50 women, have been nominated to take part in the 2015 election. And that’s just the beginning.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabbff0aee2d033f46d35dabb60bda92bdeade c447eaf98d0d4353195447645348b9 Read More → In Case You Missed ItRecent items from the Liberal blog to view and share

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabbe4a53ba7a75284d004f3a6a80016cafdf0 087651264a94d59adffcaa01392068 Our sacred obligation Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f7e02357b00dabbe4a53ba7a75284d004f3a6a80016cafdf0 087651264a94d59adffcaa01392068 watch the video and sign the petition to support our vets and their families.
Infographic
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=71c7ca440131502173e7daa8ec333fcb7c6cfa2dd511638b1e 20fd0563d455f853b7b464dd403804 Stephen Harper has wasted $750 million of your money Stephen Harper keeps cutting, but he found $750 million in taxpayer dollars to spend on advertising to sell his partisan talking points. Canadians aren’t buying it.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=71c7ca440131502173e7daa8ec333fcb7c6cfa2dd511638b1e 20fd0563d455f853b7b464dd403804

message.subject: Mittens for next 3 days only!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9128db5a3a071176e85098006433d675fa4dace5a80bd8404a 9ae76bf0809154c05f1c1723bfdcdaSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd91527bc29da660c292d7e6b85f507c10e70c68a 4f792de66499580d0b19e54ac6b2f0 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd9152702127e8b6dc5129a867bcd631aa1979545 4a45c6d3f7053712efd990f726431a Préférences linguistiques
We’re entering an exciting phase, Michael.
Everything we’ve been building -- and whether we’ll be election ready in 2015 -- comes down to what happens next.
The Conservatives will be pulling out all the stops in their fundraising this month -- and we need to do everything we can to make this our biggest December ever.
We must not allow the Conservative machine to drown out the voices of progressive Canadians -- like yours -- with cynicism and negativity. We are the stewards of a vision of positive change in Canada. No one else will defend it for us. It’s yours to nurture and build -- and I’ll be building it with you.
That’s why, as a thank you for your support this year, we’ve decided to kickstart our December fundraising drive with a special offer.
For a limited time -- the next 3 days only -- everyone who donates $100 (as little as $25 after your tax credit), or more, will receive these cozy Liberal mittens!
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd91527224208e07791765e6c1139d352fc6c33a6 99c6a977d05bd64ce7c311a6a7e37a Michael, donate $100 →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
What’s more, if your total donations for 2014 reach $1,200 (just $625 after your tax credit)before Wednesday’s deadline -- you will receive an autographed copy of my new book, Common Ground -- a Globe and Mail bestseller.
Michael, the road to victory in 2015 starts right now -- and I need you with me.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 PM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd915272dae44349104e120bc8ae36d73527dd90e 6ce3f0c74f7661929ff08a3394df76 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd915272b0a7063f795852df838c36640114a8d3e c5d6d12d473af2c5352791479801ca Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b3cbdc6c8fd91527e3d4df86d13af7b3d79b5792e5b74bdac0 2691192c07912391f86381bb7e85b0 here to view our policy.
20141201JT - Email 1 - JT - DONOR - NEW - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: An important message
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1babac91cc6148bb0aaf47bf881c4b983832999bd114b12931 e4512abe7d47177d25f70b71ba93ddSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1babac91cc6148bb7eace1900c2f7487997d17ed098803a186 4faee8bcfcb2efd1152455f1d71be8 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1babac91cc6148bb3e67e92fcbb3054ae416044ca56d46fc81 62fcd0b6520b7ac8fa2c279bf218bf Préférences linguistiques
OTTAWA -- Liberal Mittens issued the following important statement today:
“The Liberal Party of Canada is committed to keeping Canadians’ hands warm, and snug this winter.
“That’s why, for the next 2 days only, everyone who donates $100 (just $25 after your tax credit), or more, will receive a special thank you gift: me!
“Canadians are suffering enough under Conservative rule. There is no reason they should endure frostbite too.
“Don’t wait -- warm up now!”
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1babac91cc6148bbfa69553a2f5bff01101f0a689684a37aec e60042597cc66c36578b48a2d4f00d Michael, donate $100 →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 PM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1e67547b8ba6a39d003732d744223dd20f6b0af9a5074468f0 a4022ca7931afeee60df7fc41d8b58 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Can you check this, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3c8bdc41792da64d42779ad8bc7aa852fb46e29fabb5a40d2b c6f1c70f4e203704ed625e9f519ef3Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3c8bdc41792da64d2c4a03d862d69991d00830f742cc4861e4 b323d7242a47564066b11192c9a2c0 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3c8bdc41792da64d45ef92558b06fa3f735d73897d46e6b36f 85bc836087d74af70e21304edfef58 Préférences linguistiques
Can you check our records are correct, Michael? The deadline for Liberal mittens is midnight ET tonight and I wouldn’t want you to miss out!
Donor name: Michael Mittens fundraising drive status: PENDING Will Michael’s hands be cold this winter: Yes. Brrrr!
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3c8bdc41792da64d2182742cf823f295e0da1789eb5a4b9c72 9abc30c2fc24e995e2d6922050d6f2 Michael, donate $100 →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
What’s more, if your total donations for 2014 reach $1,200 (just $625 after your tax credit)before tonight’s deadline -- you will receive an autographed copy of Justin Trudeau's new book, Common Ground -- a Globe and Mail bestseller.
Canadians want a better government -- that’s what our movement is all about -- but we can’t deliver change without you, Michael.
Thank you.
Christina Topp Senior Director, Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=00ec0e667dc595bba25462d200be190507e80d12294182a6ea d2640fb07ca829cdd4cc3f5171de3fSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=00ec0e667dc595bbea259060528257dc25f17e01706c16c212 8e6ec8c9cc6ebf11fd34c60029152e Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=00ec0e667dc595bbda010681e49be28df5b75abe785e27c4e3 2c457b1a4dd0a5e971e224d345ddc9 Préférences linguistiques
Michael -- last call for Liberal mittens! There are less than 10 hours left to get your limited edition Liberal mittens -- and by tomorrow morning, I want to see your name on our latest donor list.
The 2015 election depends on it.
The Conservative fundraising pace is escalating -- but you can help make this our biggest December ever.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=00ec0e667dc595bb1c8f0d08b6c1758b7c63ad00fe7ed3a15e 793ac94812ccb671f9c42a897bf1af Michael, donate $100 →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
What’s more, if your total donations for 2014 reach $1,200 (just $625 after your tax credit)before Wednesday’s deadline -- you will receive an autographed copy of Justin Trudeau’s new book, Common Ground -- a Globe and Mail bestseller.
Michael, this is the most critical month of 2014 -- we can’t deliver change without you.
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET

message.subject: She met Hillary Clinton. You could win this...
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=63ce06781b62aab9c22bcb6c0627e2c6a7c1be27706cfddfc2 085a2c8a07383735e0cd8019e1d217Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=63ce06781b62aab9065ad40584182dfb865f851d71f0077fa4 b3434ebb119dca399f15e8d36c01d3 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=63ce06781b62aab9874b06b04ae4365001cce2090fe843b85a cda81198897b7ef21c20f51b8dd6ab Préférences linguistiques
Daphne Sleigh met Hillary Clinton. Now you could experience something extraordinary.
That’s why I’m asking you to help us raise $1-million by midnight December 12, and then enter our Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane. Not salaries and overhead.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=63ce06781b62aab9a169aa65e766506728a00560d23b1f4885 cab574e10c162357f3f200c82c262b Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Just five days into December, the Conservatives are fundraising hard -- which is why I’m so grateful 1,847 Canadians have already donated $261,624 in response to emails like this one. Michael, I hope you’ll join them.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Jet power
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe8580d74c34b3877909f5b02bf076c3136d9d015a5b1f8936 1b4c34fdbc00767444b0e5bb1aa63fSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe8580d74c34b387b80340b057536070c03c90fc9617e4426e 279e215b0b4c1897185c2f4a39793e Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe8580d74c34b3871c1fab35d9cfcb3500a65f5d49a6c97e21 54e7e5b7252069612cd5cd43e6d9dc Préférences linguistiques
This week we’re in the final stages of negotiating a deal for our campaign plane. I’ve been an organizer for 16 years, Michael. And I can tell you that getting the candidate from point A to point B in a country that is almost 8,000 kilometers across takes jet power, and comes with a multi-million dollar price tag.
Since Justin Trudeau became Liberal Leader, he’s attended over 1,000 events in more than 140 cities. During the election he’ll have to cover a similar amount of ground -- in just 36 days.
With a deposit due shortly after we sign this deal, this fundraising drive is coming at a key moment for us.
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane. Not salaries and overhead.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe8580d74c34b3870d749468cb7f1b734d9f0e744f27a041a3 8e5518e11cf50b2e37e3d99072edeb Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
When you give, you’ll be joining 2,392 Canadians who’ve donated $299,028 in response to emails like this one.
Thanks for chipping in at this critical time.
Richard Maksymetz
Senior Director, LPC Campaign Mobilization
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Saturday and Sunday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: We’re doing something big
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=07c4c7b871afa5e3ecadba0f7cada7fdf971fdb8203f827ebd dc9e02d433f95af4addcb391828df4Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=07c4c7b871afa5e31358376c6ee94c217a69f8e471d1ebd930 749a12a4863e59f47fa9ed46a97e92 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=07c4c7b871afa5e37819ffe810f1412c4a38b7b5179416b399 edeceb007504c0fd2dc611d211ee2c Préférences linguistiques
Like your community, Michael -- mine has been through a lot of tough changes.
After almost 10 years of Conservative government, my riding of St. John's South—Mount Pearl wants positive change -- and we're doing something about it.
We're rallying strong, inspired by Justin Trudeau's message of hope and hard work -- and we want you to join us!
With the Conservatives fundraising stronger than ever -- it’s going to take each and every one of us, in communities across Canada, to help raise $1-million by midnight December 12.
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
Donate now and then enter our Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=07c4c7b871afa5e3a3ed94bed434004f2f0b2813e9a8b2584f b8f02d146cb8bbf46a9c303c19a162 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
When you give, you’ll be joining 2,695 Canadians who’ve donated $336,315 in response to emails like this one.
In my career as a broadcast journalist, and a politician I’ve seen that when communities power change, anything is possible.
Michael, let’s do this together.
Thank you,
Seamus O'Regan
Team Trudeau Candidate St. John's-South–Mount Pearl
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Saturday and Sunday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Urgent: The latest numbers
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e6a7a6768f7fea2c906a6554369f031bdc21f04d84f106cb31 49bdcf18383feff641a65e5590f2ccSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e6a7a6768f7fea2c5cd550c0fdac4d068412b23cc6621c7cdf c339989c7e7e6c804f8fdd7b9c3919 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=621fed2ad76729669c3b4376ce9b1cad428ff0a13a0b737e09 baf54abd936a5e003baa18a4fa0ea4 Préférences linguistiques
I want to show you the latest Liberal and Conservative financial statements Michael. Nothing illustrates what we’re up against in the 2015 Election Campaign better than this.
LPC CPC
2013 assets & cash on hand $9.1M $14.3M
2014 fundraising revenue (Q1 through Q3) $9.9M $13.5M
No. of contributors last quarter 34,953 35,201
You can see plainly we’ve got a lot of work ahead of us to close the gap with the Conservatives.
That’s why in this fundraising drive every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
(And why after you donate we’re inviting you to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.)
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=621fed2ad7672966b2d41972e0d892502dbd8dcba1b5ef6c1c af55765eb7310e0d8047dba9d1deeb Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
The Conservatives have already raised hundreds of thousands more than us this quarter. That’s why the contributions of the 2,989 Canadians who have donated $370,695 in response to emails like this one are so critical right now.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman
Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c73ba5ac737b1a99dbe74653d937589cbf55f9dc057aea43f fcee46967c2b5b7fb4d8bf5e5585c4Simple Liberal Email Template

Michael, can you check the latest supporter information we have associated with this email address? Donor name: Michael December fundraising drive status: PENDING
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c73ba5ac737b1a99325beabac32d9d6e40da4c92a910f36ce 62126b29dea6f341b36ed631f817f0 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund and the deposit on our campaign plane. And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
We’ve even created a plane progress meter so we can track our momentum.
Remember -- donations of any size translate into votes through travel, ads, and even pizzas for volunteers. Let’s get that plane progress meter to read $1-million by midnight ET, Friday, December 12!
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-Chair, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Trust
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4fc3c27f766a941fc455ba23500c2a1298afd00beb2824dfed dab21ec78d04f405056499a081135dSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4fc3c27f766a941f8e89ede66b50ba0745df3a9e8562a8e594 7a7226c315e2c6600b5763169b238f Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2bfdab769a7e44812d838222a47f377290a96f5d1b33779380 e1d76faf35141fa0e2136558cf2434 Préférences linguistiques
It’s about trust, Michael. In order for Canada to meet the significant challenges that face us in the future, we need to trust each other, and we need to work in partnership.
This is especially true for our national government. Yet across our great country, the Conservative government has broken the trust of the Canadian people time and time again.
>From turning their backs on our veterans, to ignoring the desperate need for education in our aboriginal communities, to refusing to even meet with provincial Premiers like Ontario’s Kathleen Wynne, everywhere, the partnerships this great country needs to succeed are being challenged.
Justin Trudeau is the leader who can restore this trust.
>From raising the bar on transparency and accountability in Ottawa, and standing up for our veterans, to his commitment to our First Nations, Métis, and Inuit communities, you have seen the measure of his leadership, and his promise as Prime Minister.
That’s why it’s so important that you join the 3,581 Canadians who have donated $437,138 to this fundraising drive.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2bfdab769a7e448122b0906a09acc596b0e991b9c8ba9b941b 05828948660919d087ae1afd769404 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Thank you.
The Right Honourable Paul Martin
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.

message.subject: Michael, is this correct?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3bb9a686f4b664f868fcdb0e57a3faba8dd1ac41e4d14288da b09800e8f1a716a6b041fd2475a4c3Simple Liberal Email Template

This can’t be correct, Michael. 3,581 Canadians have donated $437,138 but we still haven’t heard from you.
Donor name: Michael December fundraising drive status: PENDING
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3bb9a686f4b664f8ca0411d19256cd32fcb61cf882a8415ef3 8345c63a2660341450fa56081287a0 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund and the deposit on our campaign plane.
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Thank you.
Liberal Party of Canada

Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET

message.subject: It's been inspiring
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1be15abd76b66d4a53d1ef68a1d7cb4ccfc2b09e4133c6c941 716cc0b69846d0ff26f75b2b5259e9Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1be15abd76b66d4a97bf8fceeccc34af71865f2fcc562ab606 e1bf9b1d7a369550131f09b5fd6f53 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1be15abd76b66d4a7b2854eed80d0cb5faa088bca750008d73 6958775f99a617f99c6b1a6df39aea Préférences linguistiques
In my work volunteering to improve the lives of women and children, Michael, I’m sometimes asked a great question by people who want to get involved.
Where do you start?
Start small! Start small because that’s how you create something larger scale.
When you start doing something, it’s contagious. You meet people who are inspiring, and dreaming together is the way to build something big. That’s why I do it — you get closer to people, and unite.
I can’t help but feel the same is true in politics.
It’s been so inspiring to watch what’s happening in this fundraising drive.If you’ve been watching it too -- maybe it’s time to take the next step. Michael, start small. Start here. And help make something really big happen in 2015.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1be15abd76b66d4a53fe6467be1c37a370da0c840eac7a566e 20b1766f203cff701f8c1169b0ef63 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Thank you for all you do -- Justin and I greatly appreciate your support.
Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET

message.text:

Michael, this is our biggest deadline yet. We have less than 48 hours to raise $1-million -- so we can secure our campaign plane!
4,468 people have donated $518,440 to this fundraising drive but the Conservatives are stepping up the pace every single day -- Michael, we can’t hit $1-million without you.
Have a look below, donate, then enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
DEADLINE: MIDNIGHT TOMORROW!
Donor name: Michael December fundraising drive status: PENDING
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=42f6a2bea882aed316c9c8ba3b0cd33609b6bfef95c5f9a66d 6b2d2edd0c11cad3952c393624eadb Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
Michael -- take action now!
Thank you.
Chrystia Freeland MP, Toronto Centre
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET

message.subject: Let’s fly
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c6251ee895af1f28f6626c8b1f8bd52fb6eba528ccbe1375e bfef2f2634d8898cb0ed4e6152744cSimple Liberal Email Template

Michael, if you want to be part of this:
Time is running out. You should give -- right now.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c6251ee895af1f2a75b684dc279738782d953c1db93701424 6f6ae42f919c38c413eb3060c7186c Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Thank you.
Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 7 PM ET

message.subject: This is too important
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=aae3cc107284eeab14fa5a9dbc2a273ec7138f813edb261fb3 da7165b2747a72e89c08a157df28f4Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=aae3cc107284eeab29a00710ea9d8aa7279991e22e773833af 9a89eb55ee7ffd93c3e531514173ed Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=aae3cc107284eeabc346c59a22bc8db75a3d737c52de96fd57 a67f03ba05d18785a8d641126e7167 Préférences linguistiques
With less than 24 hours until our midnight deadline, we know the Conservatives are fundraising harder than ever -- but according to our records -- you are still PENDING in this fundraising drive.
Can this be correct, Michael?
DEADLINE: MIDNIGHT TONIGHT!
Donor name: Michael December fundraising drive status: PENDING
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=aae3cc107284eeab7851900f91a36f575cc4e759351484937d 4914482e9c882d55bee977975a2d3c Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
If you still need convincing remember that every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane. And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Don’t miss out -- join 5,329 Canadians who have donated $601,821 to help secure our campaign plane.
Michael, it doesn’t get more critical than this. By midnight, I need to see your name on our donor list.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman
Chief Revenue Officer
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Our lines are open until midnight ET tonight.
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Courageous
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01564fe8fd4166db7cbc0cc839cb3308245f0ad213dd23d65f 69bae5042a554a304b97d7c17e9884Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01564fe8fd4166dbcbc177ee8d0cf8da8e1d75fe6370eaef93 6d0fe691aefae38a3f8f745a1748e4 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01564fe8fd4166db5931fa4c84dc2d38c0c1d6cfc3f30ef6e1 a8303a442a079e1a822f548ebe5929 Préférences linguistiques
The 2015 election is almost upon us, Michael. After nearly 9 years of Stephen Harper and his tired old government, this is our chance to elect a leader who cares about Canadians and listens to them.
The sky's the limit for a Prime Minister with a vision and a team.
Think of what Liberal Governments have accomplished: Medicare, the Canada Pension Plan, the Canadian flag, our Constitution and the Charter of Rights and Freedoms, balanced budgets, the Clarity Act, Team Canada trade missions, Kyoto and a strong independent foreign policy.
Leadership does make a difference.
We refused to go to war in Iraq in 2003.It was the right thing to do.The Americans and others did not listen to UN, NATO and Canada among others.Stephen Harper who wanted us to go to war went to the US to criticize Canada’s decision.
Liberals were against sending troops then, just as Liberals are against sending them now.
We are not responsible for the mess created in Iraq, but we can help in ways that don’t include dropping bombs.The Canadian tradition is to help refugees and provide the victims of war with food, lodging and medical supplies.
That was the Canadian way before the Harper Government.
Liberals believe that Government can make a difference in our society.
Justin Trudeau and the Liberal Party of Canada believe in action, not talking points and wasteful government advertising.
Under his management Stephen Harper took a decade of Liberal Government surpluses and turned them into 6 years of deficits.Now he is bragging about a balanced budget… next year!
Fiscal responsibility with a social conscience…that is the Liberal Party of Canada!
That's why so many Canadians are looking to Justin with hope and inspiration -- and the best is yet to come.
With 12 hours left to raise $1-million, 5,766 Canadians have decided they're serious about electing Justin Trudeau Prime Minister in 2015. They’ve donated $637,518. But we won't make it all the way without you.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01564fe8fd4166db9566503f9612250eeb4efcf2d3fc939436 e7840d9ee35b243fb423b41095dc81 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Thank you.
The Right Honourable Jean Chrétien
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Our lines are open until midnight ET tonight.
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Humbled
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dffe6d52c1d907bb7eabe6d3ccb5b7277603602ed91e6435f5 76f966f8770155290460537293594cSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dffe6d52c1d907bb0dde40067d5c57d2fc3a42eb02c806defb 07a50de43221bbe3a75e614971fb2c Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dffe6d52c1d907bbce4d7213fa5d73c9b2ad3472bf065837ee b391ae64029c0bed209ccaf50d964f Préférences linguistiques
I am humbled, Michael. I can’t tell you how much I appreciate the kind words from Prime Ministers Chretien and Martin.
Nor can words express my appreciation for the 6,632 Canadians who have risen to the challenge of raising $715,900 as we shoot for $1-million by midnight tonight.
Michael, the moment has come for me to ask you:
Will you join me in this great adventure, in building this grand project called Canada?
Together we can continue to build this nation into something great. But I can’t do it alone. I can’t do it without you, Michael. With you in this, anything is possible.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dffe6d52c1d907bbb53a93a49b842ba83573808265e41bb55a 56ea84d14ceb3d0e6aaf85cb6e74d3 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Our lines are open until midnight ET tonight.

message.subject: Michael, this is it
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d2524f80b28c02b507c71de0db6f4cb2d209f47628423ef1a2 8570ea636b7d2fba954b139f491738Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d2524f80b28c02b5f04cc94976fb1b9b6ddbb1a03485e88f77 bfade42c94767c60c5ce2644df53a4 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d2524f80b28c02b5dd0e41ae609a7d3d00e7f47a9670d19ebf 9e1df59e8a24955b1aa3970965c42d Préférences linguistiques
This is it. We have just hours to raise $226,313 and hit $1-million -- but we absolutely can’t do it without you, Michael.
Your $10 in contributions this year have made an incredible difference, thank you. But the Conservatives aren’t resting -- and neither can we.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=09bce3d3c59c0126b8065d18cfe2f39b41b23eec54e882a496 3347798f52245fcd25814263bbff73 Michael, donate $100 -- then enter the promotion! →
(This contribution will maximize your 2014 tax credit, saving you an estimated $82.50.)
Every dollar you donate will go to our 2015 Election Fund, and the deposit on our campaign plane.
And after you give, don’t forget to enter the Win a Day on the Campaign Trail promotion.
The clock is ticking -- can Justin Trudeau count on you?
Jeremy Broadhurst
National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Our lines are open until midnight ET tonight.
