message.subject: What we've accomplished
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194ff3e07f90670d5c45b3a0082705035afd121 43d93a4a829b8e20ed9cf408eac728Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194ff8525815be821d9a311026f05324ad653c9 1c83a1e3758965779fab9b351f1607 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194fff93c8941b9265262ab17dc137c0efb6194 d4d50b09a1c75d1977dafd97000d21 Préférences linguistiques
New LPC radio ads
We’re setting the record straight on the Conservative income splitting scheme.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194ffb06cc43885813b5b9f4bb63859cd230cd7 580ec7f036444ef256e485702e6015 Listen and share →
Michael --
As the year comes to a close, I want to take this opportunity to reflect on all that we have accomplished together in 2014.
In Parliament, our party led the charge on accountability and transparency by publicly disclosing our MPs’ expenses, an example that has now been followed by all political parties. We’ve taken a principled stand on women’s reproductive rights and Senate reform, doing more for the latter in one day than Mr. Harper has in almost a decade. I was also pleased to introduce my Transparency Act to make government open by default.
Liberals vowed to re-open the closed veteran service centers that were shamefully boarded up by the Conservatives to save $4-million – just one example of how this government has failed our veterans and military service members. We outlined a counter proposal to the government’s flawed small business EI tax credit. And most recently, our party has challenged the merits of the Conservatives’ unfair $2 billion income splitting plan – a tax break for the wealthy that does nothing to help 85 percent of Canadians.
While we’ve been busy in Ottawa, we’ve also been hard at work in communities across the country.
Thanks to our open nominations, we now have over 300,000 members in the Liberal Party of Canada. Even more exciting, 200,000 are new members from this year alone.
We have passed the halfway mark with nearly 180 impressive and diverse candidates nominated to run under the Liberal banner in 2015. More than a third are women and our team continues to grow each day. We are already joined by former and current municipal councillors and mayors, veterans, healthcare and business leaders, teachers, entrepreneurs, and Aboriginal leaders.
In 2014, I attended over 600 events in 100 ridings across the country. I met with Canadians and discussed Liberal priorities, including jobs, growth, and help for struggling middle class families. In the new year, I will continue to engage with Canadians in their communities and bring their concerns to Ottawa.
Stephen Harper’s priorities are no longer Canadians’ priorities, but people don’t just want a different government – they want a better government. We are building a strong team and plan, and that will continue to be our focus as we approach the next election.
Thank you all for your support. We’ve got a big year ahead of us, but with a little hope – and a lot of hard work – we can bring Canadians the change they deserve.
Wishing you all a wonderful holiday season with your loved ones,
Justin P. J. Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
New LPC radio ads
We’re setting the record straight on the Conservative income splitting scheme.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194ffb06cc43885813b5b9f4bb63859cd230cd7 580ec7f036444ef256e485702e6015 Listen and share →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=795472ce4ed194ff70ac4e608ea452e4b0d702da5f64f6056d 356d50ef68843e939d55315302e611 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: One more chance for Liberal mittens
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=40f15aece755e6959805dad1a8f018bf526b032f0402d92fce 237ac3e25a519c2099216c1cd55c2bSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=40f15aece755e6956a36d063912c1f9bc94b7cf14427300f8c 25ce8b543f4e13d7ccbfd3fdd91f9b Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=40f15aece755e695ad904d0d852661a7e8183f0d634c937c67 8f456267737013924981246954e461 Préférences linguistiques
On behalf of Sophie, Xavier, Ella-Grace and Hadrien, I want to offer my family’s warmest holiday wishes -- and to let you know Liberal mittens are back! I am so grateful for your support this year, Michael. From by-election victories, to securing the deposit on our campaign plane, your hard work made our 2015 accomplishments possible. Thank you.
This movement is about people. It’s about offering leadership that’s focused on you. And building a vision where all Canadians have a real and fair chance to succeed. And it’s Liberal supporters like you who are helping to make this vision a reality.
That’s why, as a thank you, we’re bringing Liberal mittens back as part of an exclusive Boxing Day special offer.
For a limited time -- 48 hours only -- everyone who donates $100 (as little as $25 after your tax credit), or more, will receive these cozy Liberal mittens!
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e22d622f38138823c3d97427c339d6ef0cf64653192eb58c1c dc70c60bfbc86b3ec473b3d413f521 Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e22d622f381388230fa0c6d7f7c76969f4be5ede38c03e78de 7d72e9c8df8e40806253c8f1072ca9 Donate $390 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=40f15aece755e695e450c215f2e1cc4e63c0ac7876c750bb39 ad3968a620d5e41ec147bfeb130e92 Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=40f15aece755e695c7b1a2338d162bc5810376e97b4a4c1f3f 4e67bcb0bb550043129a3b782bc57f Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
Thank you, and Happy Holidays,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
December 26 - 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | December 31, 9 AM - 8 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: I'm baaaack!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7f93cc394dfdb090e86ef502b60f21d4b8a910cd476227f004 a8995604c259725426aca7f07c9f00Simple Liberal Email Template

By popular demand -- I’m baaaack!
It’s a cold Conservative winter out there. And you deserve the warmest, most stylish handwear compatible with your political beliefs.
That’s why, until midnight tonight, everyone who donates $100, or more, will receive a special thank you gift: me!
Please review your 2014 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $625 in end- of-year tax credits on 2014 federal political donations:
Donor name:Michael 2014 national donation total: $10
You have $1,190 in contribution room left for this year!
Estimated 2014 tax savings: $8
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7f93cc394dfdb090c07ce4a2f9c4533cbb19884718670ac106 4b3269574bcba06f84ed5602f5743d Donate $100 →

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
Thank you.
Liberal Mittens

message.subject: You’ll want to see these numbers
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3f5c1cad17e563668fdb89e0b04d1d06d42f6ef12c49e1abf0 29820bd497eca13eb71a3c58c4460cSimple Liberal Email Template

With 4 days left to fundraise in 2014, we could close the Conservative fundraising gap this quarter. But it’s going to take all hands on deck, including you, Michael.
Take a look at our fundraising dashboard:
LPC (Actual Q4)
CPC (Estimated Q4)
Amount to close gap
$4.0M
$5.4M
$1.4M
If we out-raise the Conservatives this quarter -- for the first time ever -- it will be thanks to the 42,078 Canadians who gave, including 514 who maxed out their 2014 national contribution. Don’t miss this chance to be part of it.
Please review your 2014 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $625 in end- of-year tax credits on 2014 federal political donations:
Donor name:Michael 2014 national donation total: $10
You have $1,190 in contribution room left for this year!
Estimated 2014 tax savings: $8
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
When I look at the hard numbers, I don’t just see a deadline, I see an opportunity to make history.
Let’s finish what we started, what we’ve been building all year.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer

message.subject: Michael, I had to show you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e2bb3e2a6023b19680898deed1b596819a78ffb3beb249bc77 82a9c939360e3fc379ec29fdb80d0bSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ff0966ac5533d25d2a0071f87912c0a967cff64e3f05b0f81e 5487951fc4cd21658984beab22904c Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ff0966ac5533d25df364ceb0ec51a4e41c635d7ea5d9162f3f cb723c501b7dcf865eaca23712b9c5 Préférences linguistiques
Our fundraising results this quarter have given the Conservatives a scare, Michael. Take a look at this email they recently sent their supporters:
"The Liberals know they can count on their adoring friends in the Ottawa media to gobble up and put out ANY story contrived to hurt Prime Minister Stephen Harper — and liberal pundits LOVE to gush about their new hero, Justin Trudeau.
"So now they are making a relentless full-court press to report more income than Conservatives by December 31 — then gloat this is “proof” that Canadians prefer a Liberal majority over Conservatives.
"Will you help us turn the tables on them?Will you help us steal their thunder? Will you help us deliver a surprise of our own?"
- CPC, December 19, 2014
This is proof, Michael. Proof the Conservatives have totally lost touch with what matters: Working hard for Canadians.
Let’s do exactly what they fear most -- out-raise the Conservatives and send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.
Don’t miss your chance to be part of this historic moment -- and to show that positive politics is stronger than cynicism and fear.
Please review your 2014 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $625 in end- of-year tax credits on 2014 federal political donations:

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
Thank you.
Ralph Goodale Deputy Leader, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: What’s behind these numbers?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=069961f16f62b8d00bec0db18aaf539eee0d99c00a7dd37447 d65400d584a8330c11066ca20508c8Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=069961f16f62b8d0e01e96808d17ef9d03a55849dc43559d28 bb3976fc7bd3282e3aab532d89bf7a Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1b59421259d0a79d591ec2a47a7c8767c2bb08c5b98bfbeb2 29b702df26567c841303e0a943c90e Préférences linguistiques
248, Michael. That’s how many more donors the Conservatives had than we did last quarter.
I want to show you a few more of our donor numbers, because behind each number is a Canadian, with a story, who decided to be counted.
Shortly, we will surpass the number of Canadians who donated to the Liberal Party of Canada last year.​
Total LPC donors in 2013 Total LPC donors in 2014 as of Dec 28, 11:59pm ET
71,655 70,260
I’m so proud of this achievement, but I need you take a look at another number, one that we don’t know.
Total CPC donors in 2013 Total CPC donors in 2014
80,135 ?
If we out-raise the Conservatives this quarter -- for the first time -- it will be thanks to the 42,481 Canadians who gave, including 527 who maxed out their 2014 national contribution. Don’t miss this chance to be part of it.
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1b59421259d0a79e0ab524910a2b12f81f15aad20a45b82d1 c8510d71434a3a9148c85610ad380f Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1b59421259d0a7989db4113bc20e02e3ba4c89330f7fffd81 fa78f7217e7309b69bcb45520e32a0 Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1b59421259d0a79f99536076a6f2215cb2ef18111c34d2e4a 4b409f24a1684963a3669849ce48a7 Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
We need to out-raise the Conservatives because it will send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.
Don’t miss your chance to be part of this historic moment -- and to show that positive politics is stronger than cynicism and fear.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Hi Michael, it's Chantal
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=81eed2173d2825ab3b570f65039458114b02484e4968e13f9a bdaf70536778c1071eb0f051cf0af0Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c1c8efd8d2863dba68306ea788ab6264fa030c4b09b576dbb7 f10ca0138966d413919dfc43faeda4 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c1c8efd8d2863dba3ad463525b2c625935f3ca47465fe5d8a0 5e101999d5a4cca187ee7b85b5642c Préférences linguistiques
As Justin Trudeau's friend, I can tell you that he is passionate about making Canada and the world better. Justin knows that the best way to lead is being a phenomenal example.
As someone who also juggles a demanding and public career with sincere devotion to family and community, I know that this does not come easily... it takes hard work!
Justin is no exception. Not by any stretch. In his case, he sets the bar so high, as to express his values not just in front of his own community, but in front of the world.
This is the kind of individual we need representing us at home, and abroad... someone who is clearly rooted in the field of service, and who lives to be in a position to help, heal and connect people on both the home front and the world stage.
Today's leaders should provide as fresh and positive an outlook as possible.
We need a bridge builder, someone who is not caught up in negativity, but dedicated to progress and a sensible outlook on the future for our children. We need someone who we can look up to.
I trust the future with Justin. He is every bit a great student and listener as he is a teacher, which I think is key for someone to be a leader.
I have watched him earn the affection of my own children. He has a presence of mind and heart. He is not stuck in any old ways that work for a mere few. And he is committed to a peaceful and prosperous world in which there is room for all to flourish.
That’s why I’m proud to say I support Justin Trudeau. And I hope between now and midnight, December 31, you’ll add your voice to mine.
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c1c8efd8d2863dba1967bb6b5b2afdc61683991fa5ea612c6e 17d39afcc94dbd15dd22a1ed2146b7 Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)

(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c1c8efd8d2863dba7b083116c55ee0a5041bdd5bde7b8b1344 cd8818d22d1b793aebef9a79414b56 Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c1c8efd8d2863dbaa1f2e066dee218dca94304e06258787eff 47d1efb54f173d3d0e13b95b205f8e Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →

Chantal Kreviazuk Juno Award-winning Canadian singer-songwriter

We need to make this happen to send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.

message.subject: Michael, have we made a mistake?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3846a75c7b0318a01c680e90966aadac20bf88edb7ec6aabf4 5d724f2a33f61757526c995b711696Simple Liberal Email Template

Michael -- Justin Trudeau has asked me to email him the latest numbers, and I want to make sure we’ve got your information down right. According to our records associated with this email address, it looks like you haven't yet made an end-of-year donation to help us out-raise the Conservatives this quarter.
Please review your 2014 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $625 in end- of-year tax credits on 2014 federal political donations:
Donor name:Michael 2014 national donation total: $10
You have $1,190 in contribution room left for this year!
Estimated 2014 tax savings: $8
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3846a75c7b0318a058f370543b6d00dc127be447b8ad735345 e13e5f65f91d246339e77c8e0178fb Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3846a75c7b0318a0636bab849517bbbb0636127b62a482cd3f 7dc9463bd595abf2e60ef995a3e0d3 Donate $390 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3846a75c7b0318a025600fab3e8a8e428d45f3d53d2c4d483b a60c8a26a3cf29896fdd5768cc3def Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3846a75c7b0318a083a3bc5b6713705f84789635ee57fffcb9 12e65130af981823f31ce52bdc1bff Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
We need to out-raise the Conservatives because it will send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.
Don’t miss your chance to be part of this historic moment -- and to show that positive politics is stronger than cynicism and fear.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer

message.subject: Grateful
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4285399826f88909e0b787a0f5dcfe51256f913cab64f4ecf6 736a7b1a868222ee253c2e282b81a8Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4285399826f88909ae49dffab473ec96d3e62dd97e65ea26e9 04f3abe723e6fee75345efe923e9f2 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8c6ba94326aa9e8e53e729013e198c521a8a1dd728b9e37b89 eebaf7dbf11e7cb0e157b8bb8242d4 Préférences linguistiques
What an incredible feeling, Michael. Today we wake up knowing we can celebrate the final hours of an extraordinary year. We can start thinking about the coming election year and this precious chance at real change before us.
I am tremendously grateful for the support, generosity, and hard work of so many Canadians over the past year. And I am filled with excitement when I think about this chance we have to build Canada together.
Still, there is so much more work to be done. Our first achievement of 2015, may well be out-raising the Conservatives in the final hours of 2014.
That’s why I’m asking you to think of someone you care about and to make a donation, not just for you, but for them. Because you both deserve a Prime Minister who is focused on you, and on making things better for Canadians. And I will never stop fighting for you.
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8c6ba94326aa9e8e7ef24caceecff76e9be4ce5374e527d80d 7d7e6dd8c334fd2fe0783ebca4d1d8 Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8c6ba94326aa9e8e3960c6b5328efbddd667682bb9fb4376e5 d8f7ae30d1d1a14593f65abfc57bb0 Donate $390 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8c6ba94326aa9e8e8acdc2728dfad7078c752784f19f5a69b9 af195a97c5866c51c7937b70f743e5 Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8c6ba94326aa9e8ed2f3659cf92896de4011f7c42bfde290c5 ad2b4007a2c49e70a8bfe275e44317 Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
We need to out-raise the Conservatives because it will send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.
Don’t miss your chance to be part of this historic moment -- and to show that positive politics is stronger than cynicism and fear.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: TICK-TOCK on your 2014 tax savings
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9d9ae2b7aacba05ce2495bccb5023bbbda4d85945eee40f0e8 0528fbb87c7e27b91405ca257259b1Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be04c2a82ee31c8fa9541fd217b6292599f4f 3b872e00f1d16cef8f7a570281b8b0 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be0357f53e33563a4086bfca9a2ec72a4b02f 7de65a1318249fad28492c147f0661 Préférences linguistiques
At midnight tonight, Elections Canada closes the books on the fundraising quarter, Michael. That means this is your last chance to donate before the election year begins, not to mention maximize your 2014 tax credit.
We need to out-raise the Conservatives because it will send a strong signal to Canadians that the Liberal Party of Canada is ready to take on the Harper Conservatives in 2015.
Don’t miss your chance to be part of this historic moment -- and to show that positive politics is stronger than cynicism and fear.
Please review your 2014 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $625 in end- of-year tax credits on 2014 federal political donations:
Donor name:Michael 2014 national donation total: $10
You have $1,190 in contribution room left for this year!
Estimated 2014 tax savings: $8
Michael, your recommended donation amount is highlighted below:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be0dae8429e67fac51d266cf55371c4df4465 9a660b73904f7080a13da44a747598 Donate $100 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $82.50)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be03151b2325abc3765062da0dc9766f67d27 6f2516e060346c4fe0dd2ed3cde065 Donate $390 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $300!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be0ce18bfb0fb17a56721139715ee19b31672 dd6f474431b2de921eebf67ab64bdf Donate $740 →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $475!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be05ff9c7ebf02e435019b5559a3f5a6103d3 767ad854563ac846287e891dc28f97 Donate $1,190 (MAX OUT!) →
(This would bring your estimated 2014 tax credit to $625 and you would join the Laurier Club!)
Thank you.
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
December 26 - 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | December 31, 9 AM - 8 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be02ec3d257026c410b1748775080f25a026b a70e919a0b851e008e8989adaf7ccd Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be0d1a4e2625b93bd859ce940ecfe314106d3 bdb1aaf5cc396611700c5f059fa5e8 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e51ca70bcca4be07a1f25f9a8e331bde87b09f01af27d8860 989fe99160256b1730ffe5ec4ecd3f here to view our policy.
20141231JB - DONOR - EN

message.subject: NEW POLL: 1-click on the issues
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b2df3571697d8b18e8cbf9850a83f92ed75ca39ed5d5a682d 8a016faf1e8e64a94dca6282d7e393Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b2df3571697d8b1fff47416ab5a73cb4a3c366df7b9cdb735 4985cb7eb36782e7aa689681f5eddd Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b2df3571697d8b1b90f9c8de98d33604bca069038ff5ec22c 9b94ac3fc837a8a35c07886ad5676d Préférences linguistiques
Michael, today Parliament is back. Which is why I’m asking Canadians what Parliament’s top priority should be this year.
Falling oil prices. Mission creep in Iraq. A budget in limbo. With so many critical issues facing Canadians, your voice needs to be heard.
Take our quick Parliament’s Top Priority Poll, and have your say!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b2df3571697d8b162be1773609a7d7f51fade82d43c9d037c 6e4a6d5d52e4a7a3113ad822ef2114 Start Right Now →
Michael, this year -- an election year --your voice matters more than ever. I am listening.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Michael, have you picked?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=028d29ba5a528eecbaedec96d624edcc83de8cd2375e250e9f e11b107bfce869ce6397e81efed309Simple Liberal Email Template

The environment. A strong middle class. Government transparency.Justin Trudeau wants you to weigh in on these critical issues, Michael.
But he still hasn’t heard from you.
Take our quick Parliament’s Top Priority Poll before midnight tonight, and have your say!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a15c36f533774ccabd32c23623dd17cc4ee25098444d1de00e 494c1ad072af3a3c970bef341dae61 Start Right Now →

message.subject: All because of you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8f32be8aae2c512e29d6bcd32b8ce3c4c95 4d04389e34513e5c8e48f475d6f53aSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b807c690454387a4cb540bca8fdb3b3e1d32 d54f6fcff13f6e6b38f4fab74ede01 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b858459a2335b26976ad07e72e99369232fb 860b628cb1c63b3615a46c872fe959 Préférences linguistiques
The official fundraising results for Q4 2014 for all parties are finally in -- and the news is simply exceptional.
We raised $5,787,560 million last quarter!
Chief Revenue Officer Stephen Bronfman was so thrilled he asked me to share a special video with you to mark our -- no YOUR-- Top 5 Fundraising Achievements of 2014. Have a look:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8b0fbe73ef810701600e26d0c89587573a9 536042d67186e71220b2c8b5868ea2
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8b0fbe73ef810701600e26d0c89587573a9 536042d67186e71220b2c8b5868ea2 Watch now →
As Stephen says in the video, this was our biggest quarter ever. Thank you Michael. This extraordinary achievement belongs to you. Still, the Conservatives managed to out-raise us by $847,156 -- a reminder that we have a lot of hard work ahead of us.
2015 is a big year -- the biggest. Every dollar donated in these early months can be invested in building a winning election campaign.
Michael, you helped raise the bar in 2014. To do it again in 2015, we’re going to need as many donors as possible to give as early as possible this year.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8509f8391c55466c599f9ef2dbb46c9c2c0 87c96e6253a5ee2fae3a961a4bf100 Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8b59cde4dcd6d1b8fc1ef8e2edb4bb97e39 bb6bcf852bebb8038434987aff3848 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b81ace62c55951901fc308555cf46132cb54 d606d313efde847093fbedd0ca8525 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fede93621a62e4b8d5a46a8e97d16ce22380ca65ce0164c975 8df6e997239457002410887ef8fd7f here to view our policy.
20150130JT - Q4 results video - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Trending at LPC: January 2015
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=65626f8b512cf0cbecc5ebf5005cf776fcac0b4c7f8497ccf3 0a757fa46a64599294fc08653f815a >From the Leader's Desk
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=65626f8b512cf0cb16da0e36a6bf9063d878b3c37f067963a0 d2a56aabbd88e97a3a363b66bbd4f7 Happy 2015, Michael --
Parliament resumed this week for the last time before the 2015 election, and our strong Liberal team remains focused on creating a plan that will strengthen Canada’s middle class, and ensure that everyone has a real and fair chance at success.
A prosperous Canada is about diversity, balance, and partnership between all regions and sectors. If we work hard, this is the year we’ll give Canadians a better government.
Watch this video of our incredible rally in Ottawa, this past week.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=65626f8b512cf0cb16da0e36a6bf9063d878b3c37f067963a0 d2a56aabbd88e97a3a363b66bbd4f7 Watch →

message.subject: Parliament’s Top Priority: Poll Results
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=85b13c517aa3cf111a1547d95a6bcb8258abc14952831600c5 a3dda9ae8db51e92f05aa3ef85249bSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=85b13c517aa3cf119063e21082146f7ab2bba375a1256db0e7 1a06402d7edfd67ecf8a386d65d553 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=85b13c517aa3cf11dbe05bc20494baaad822affd6130a7d59a 514697db67aca8fdc0a9c7f6088a16 Préférences linguistiques
Michael – The results are in! >From the environment and government transparency, to our struggling middle class and falling oil prices 35,526 Canadians made their voices heard. I want to thank you for sharing your priorities with us in our Parliament’s Top Priority Poll.
Here are the top 3 issues Canadians told us they care about:
1
Supporting the middle class.
2
Building a smart economic plan beyond oil.
3
Developing resources while protecting the environment.
Canadians expect real leadership from Parliament, but under Stephen Harper’s Conservatives the middle class is struggling. We need to support middle class families by investing in jobs and education – not an unfair tax break for the wealthy.
I’m looking forward to sharing your opinions with the team. Michael, your continued feedback is invaluable as we work hard to build a better government for all Canadians.
If you didn’t get a chance, you can still take our 1-click poll and tell us what you think our Parliament’s top priority should be in 2015:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7a77c8b656111a72079433488426418b8adadae38d4b55995d 831fe4bff9abb7dfeef36ebd763c39 Start Right Now →
Thank you.
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7a77c8b656111a729b26e18a0fd537fa9c96e85da6f47d2780 8c512d2caa03063f5aa221c3ec062f Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: The Maple Leaf
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=af12e77cc34f8f282b6d4d3cc72af9bde3fc57f357aa10a05e 6756df90a1afc50a46ad978b0623b4Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=af12e77cc34f8f28faee506b116ad5a724df65573111f82787 d86ea2d7fad56dea004890937fa258 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=af12e77cc34f8f28bc837c412718b4091278a0434a4f4f3ae9 60d820755cbd9a562bc3b6237f901d Préférences linguistiques
Each time I look up at our red and white Maple Leaf flag, Michael, I am reminded that we are a proud nation, strong, and always free. And everywhere I travel, our flag is one symbol that always stands out to me, this month especially. That’s because February 15 marks 50 years that our flag has been flying high over our schools, our businesses, and our Parliament.
Our flag represents fairness, generosity and honesty. It represents all the hard work we do in our communities, and it represents the hope I have for the future of our country. That is what our flag means to me.
Now Michael, I want to hear what our flag means to you. Join the #MyFlag campaign, and tell Canada what the Maple Leaf flag means to you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=af12e77cc34f8f282407e28fad828b17b4dd80055e4df34bea 4b79edcb9b7351dab8e8ad95682d47 Join The Campaign →
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: WATCH LIVE: Justin Trudeau on the environment and economy
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb141600601b2c3c0a3f21b4e2d9c656127b355a5e52 2adcf25b540f71e2befe4cf51916d2Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb14160060f12efd5ce128476099268dcc6a636dd445 6ddcd91d6ad65d9459ed361e2dc584 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb141600605acfb2a65635d2e32e466c05a75cccab24 4234a5da9528691f02dd136a359fb8 Préférences linguistiques
Michael, in just a few minutes Justin Trudeau will be taking the stage to give a major speech in Calgary, and you can watch live here.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb141600602bb0521cc00ba14929e71491db1325ebef 94fc7fcc0375cbc253cacdc4685670 Tune In Now →
Having trouble viewing on mobile?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb141600602946d1a56c4601639e2e3a476c9c6f77e9 300387c5b837fbf5fda4e06f86e4bb Go Here
As a long-time Member of the Legislative Assembly here in Alberta, I understand that our natural resources play an important role for both our community here and our entire nation.
Today, in Calgary, Justin Trudeau is going to talk about how we need to start a new conversation in Canada.One that represents a respectful dialogue between governments and Canadians.One that positions Canada to be competitive in a global economy focused on reducing greenhouse gas emissions. One that reflects the best of who we are, and shows it to the world.
This is why I am so excited that Justin Trudeau is here with us to share his views and talk about why we don’t have to make a choice between protecting the environment and growing our economy.
What: Justin Trudeau's speech to the Calgary Petroleum Club
When: TODAY at 12:00PM (MT) / 2:00PM (ET)
Where: Livestreamed online here:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb141600602bb0521cc00ba14929e71491db1325ebef 94fc7fcc0375cbc253cacdc4685670 Tune In Now
I hope you tune in!
Thank you.
Kent Hehr Liberal Candidate for Calgary Centre
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb14160060afc1e7e5f5fa7c69ffea46f93533d40d78 5528cc075e7fe110c692680adda50a Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=779d42bb14160060e42436c871c0af4991fe3f89510a61714f c6c1127e365529f3f89b1b81fd9370 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ae90d99de6584702ea17036ac2778944a52190a3f1a657e5c9 72fa33fcc52429881decbb986ac30d Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ae90d99de65847024370a3755b9259474357d98fe418a23b01 c0947fc3a70aa537cbbbd2786b59cb here to view our policy.
20150206KH - Calgary Livestream - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Get a signed digital photo, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=50faeddec45cf02255c820bf41de7085da745ab91555bb4c00 2772c0ca111b5a6e739d971b9f04eaSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=50faeddec45cf02280448420783860ad45b2f1ce0e4243725c e04d7c103e91e6803f7ca0840d7d5c Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=50faeddec45cf022c2ea90227d5bc479ae9f677be636fba88e 4eee5addbe39abb9500cdd2659ad64 Préférences linguistiques
Winning the election this year depends on how hard we work in these early, most important months of 2015, Michael. Our field teams -- the organizers and volunteers connecting with thousands of Canadians on doorsteps across the country -- are growing by the hundreds each week.
So is the infrastructure that supports them: nightly training webinars, a growing data operation, candidate websites and support hotlines.
I know not everyone can be out there knocking on doors or making phone calls. But every dollar you give today can power the hard work of those who are.
Every dollar you invest today means more flexibility to make better, smarter decisions, the kind that win elections, long before the first ballot is cast.
That’s why I’m asking you to help us raise $350,000 before midnight February 13th.
Michael, your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=50faeddec45cf0226e8966135c99a3ddcc035fc9c8e4d18748 98a515f7ac9dda0324b9c49bd03ce7 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with thousands of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fb538cd2b8611c198e6b1c8395df02e22310e4b80c1c334209 305d867c365fdcdecc3fb27fa5e1d6 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fb538cd2b8611c1904161d0afe68193473b7e1e803cf87af27 df7c928402c8d1824ce47c8ae33a7a Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fb538cd2b8611c19db9c89c6dd1cbfe368c87bfdc5bd39a0bb 2333fe54765e0b5a16e5d46b4d1d27 here to view our policy.
20150207JT_JT - DONOR - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Are you in my report?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=801d155bd0c5241f5fc76d03017cb792045d5d7ef3e5b1743a 6c1db7016939d29a043003f97c3395Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=801d155bd0c5241f1870db701129e6633b69f68d0599ac4d7b 8ca2d131a1b1522c9dcafa3d215bc3 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=801d155bd0c5241f50f921546dd7809244f346eaa3a1e51e9d 5a4c8d3704915ab80a755e71969883 Préférences linguistiques
Every morning I wake up and reach for my phone, knowing there’s an important email waiting: the daily LPC revenue report. That report tells me if we’ve raised enough money in the previous 24 hours to make those critical, early 2015 investments that will help us deliver a better government for Canadians on election day.
Those investments will help our field teams -- the organizers and volunteers calling thousands of Canadians each week asking for support -- target their calls, or ensure they’re using scripts tested for success.
We know not everyone can be out there knocking on doors or making phone calls. But every dollar you give today can power the hard work of those who are.
Thanks to 285 Canadians who have already donated $18,461 to this fundraising drive, the gap between where we are and where we need to be is shrinking. But to stay on track we need to raise $350,000 by Friday, February 13.
Please review your recent contribution history:
Donor name:Michael Your February Fundraising Drive donation status: PENDING Total donated nationally in 2015: $0.00 (You have $1500 in contribution room left in 2015).
Your most recent one time donation: $10.00 on September 20, 2014
Michael, your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=801d155bd0c5241feff9346990a6d85cd3a28dcb569fe7c8c6 a54a7397bb68e4860814fb52956ea6 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=801d155bd0c5241f1d1212ba23aefc4398f4f7694d6ab05b5f d8b1038c24e25b8a9f3bb53a10b6a0 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9ebbf9999e752a6eca561d967ecefa22ca602a20d34858127b a1575b766b37e7d6b6a878e8f8225c Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.

message.subject: Michael, can you verify this?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7440199154aa5538cc5d0dd33dba087b1e4b6ad0b4c48ab625 5738b820d99a8e495ca9f63a5c6f58Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7440199154aa55383ca793208eed805f99b1054c4eb779da6c cf9c97138d84c0a87cf8e98d721f46 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7440199154aa55389bc2cda3e1ca2b89f52e9860180fdee3d4 87639cd49cae77958ebda0ab870bfa Préférences linguistiques
The next election is approaching fast, Michael 523 Canadians have already donated $41,672 to our February fundraising drive -- but we’re still waiting to hear from you.
Please review your recent contribution history:
Donor name:Michael Your February Fundraising Drive donation status: PENDING Total donated nationally in 2015: $0.00 (You have $1500 in contribution room left in 2015).
Your most recent one time donation: $10.00 in 2014
Michael, your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7440199154aa5538ff806ebf8a9b6c405f8ffeaf7518b369f2 ccdb9959c549595a241ae1f3ea26a9 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with thousands of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7440199154aa55383ef7f9235a270e7c8745eafbc6e514fdd7 2d587a3b53c8c6646114afbe6c05f3 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Michael, what does it mean to you?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cc25f512835be466e650768fe957a1be75fbd8aa8d05ef7209 b8ead7bc4469909dbd30941dc10aecSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cc25f512835be46665cf0146466066d934e404a743f938e8b0 db4e1bf689c79a71308e9dcccec5a1 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cc25f512835be466c5afacd3627c0553995010a1faf45de2fa 74f26b3ab87810ce2fdc2c8c8f3f8f Préférences linguistiques
Michael, no matter where I travel, there are three things that always make me feel like I’m at home -- red, white and maple. When I see our flag waving in front of a school, or a business, or hanging proudly on the side of a barn in an open field, I am filled with pride for our country and for the community I am visiting.
Michael, we’re working harder than ever this year, because as Liberals, we believe there is a better way forward for Canada. A way that stands up for Canadians and delivers a better government for our country.
I am confident that if we work hard in these early months of 2015 we will succeed -- but we need you with us, Michael.
Our field team is growing rapidly. They need tools and training now -- before the writ drops -- so they are ready to take on the Conservatives at election time.
Michael, join 876 Canadians who have already contributed to our February fundraising drive to raise $350,000, before midnight February 13th.
Your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cc25f512835be466e79b26464d044d83f13b2780f3521348f6 20b6a7bd49898f5eeb79c0ede21764 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cc25f512835be466ea989a191bf17fbaf3fa0a5ae6d22987c9 d3539326cbcc5688030978df3aa7fc Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ef260a4b14f1c8f203611c8c0452b5b1dd10be4aa2c81ab06c 411675c91cffd2b705dc95bcf538c8 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ef260a4b14f1c8f2232c988c73a860b9557998f8e7bd916f4b ee6c70a9ac25f8d6e8dc3665820c90 here to view our policy.
20150210JT - DONOR - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Can I share a story with you, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=663f2c26ef43cfc0d0d55d360149a53b4e4e34825af13d2c43 f30eea0c9b8d90dd640eda481cdd85Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=663f2c26ef43cfc077bf1c1a198a70eb49cfd86ac83b879489 ddbdd5b6a8a31e012c39ca05591b08 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=663f2c26ef43cfc07c66aa6f0cd4f1b1d4612b2f33b274fd50 f06638416c51b6eb438da8ffe73401 Préférences linguistiques
Last year, a birth doula who is a good friend shared a touching story. My friend was helping a new Canadian mother through a difficult birth. Despite everything, the mother was so incredibly happy: “My child will be Canadian,” she told my friend, beaming with pride.
I love this story, because it reminds me to cherish my identity as a Canadian. It reminds me how lucky we are to live in this beautiful country, and share it with such a generous and caring people.
But it also reminds me we can’t leave Canada to chance. We must work hard to make our country better. And that if we can’t be out there knocking on doors or making the phone calls, our dollars can power the hard work of those who are.
That’s why, this week, as we celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag, we’re asking you to help support our national field team working hard inviting Canadians to choose a better government that shares our progressive values.
Your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=663f2c26ef43cfc0276c3afd98de88ab9f909d72a4314de126 3c2ea895f9c9794847c29d8132ab2b Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET

message.subject: URGENT UPDATE:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c943d13199d1617bfec03be1b1d0ec368fb0a03c8261822b0 9239778ad3eaf16fc2907b7a5e119aSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c943d13199d161799df69c438d641efa82152c2cb8865ed54 509139be56c44b9beea70da6ae4a5d Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c943d13199d1617dc57701a0fe94a56d93c4255e8b33087d6 39facf19fcbc61493813dd27b7bfe6 Préférences linguistiques
Mission critical Michael. It’s the final 48 hours for our February fundraising drive and Justin Trudeau just asked for an update on our progress. I’m pulling together the donor report for this fundraising drive right now -- but I don’t see your name on it, yet.
Donations are coming in from across the country and our team is busy taking contributions by phone. Michael, I really want to be able to show Justin Trudeau your name, the next time I run the report.
Will you help me set the record straight?
Please review your recent contribution history:
Donor name:Michael Your February Fundraising Drive donation status: PENDING Total donated nationally in 2015: $0.00 (You have $1500 in contribution room left in 2015).
Your most recent one time donation: $10.00 in 2014
Michael, your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c943d13199d161792f40fe341f610740a228a595ac78b0a83 125a465ba6b48273611e75d4f24882 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer
--- Original Message ---
From: Justin Trudeau
To: Stephen Bronfman; Christina Topp
Subject: quick question re: fundraising drive
Hey guys,
Please pass on my sincere thanks to all donating or considering donating. Do you guys have a sense yet if we will make our $350K goal?
J

message.subject: This is amazing, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ec32dd20a45e900a0e5ab5070fef56bdd733d4aa5e2c7ddae0 ccc9a49afc5dc9b5b292c2b5a3dab3Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ec32dd20a45e900a15c217d80121c07a865d00cd2cc44d0cfd d077598ed26d520413ab72985ced3b Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=953fb77ed9a546120e418de4921447f9b183a54d45664894cb 6675fcb236cadf3f1dc6bdd7291fbc Préférences linguistiques
Michael – we’re off to a great start. I just received our latest February fundraising numbers, and I am excited to see that 2,109 Canadians have pitched in $179,472 to help us reach our goal of $350,000 before midnight tonight. Thank you.
These numbers are proof that Canadians just like yourself are joining together to help build something they believe in – the idea that we can not only build a different government, but a better government.
Stephen Harper has told Canadians to trust him – that only his Conservative Party that can lead our country through tough economic times.
Yet every day I hear stories from Canadians telling me that they are struggling. The truth of the matter is that under Stephen Harper and the Conservatives, the middle class is struggling.
There is a better way forward. There is a better team. There is a better plan. But Michael, we can’t do it without you. Will you help us give Canadians the better government they deserve?
Your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=953fb77ed9a54612ca724ae393e589952bfcc2f679333301a6 e43faa647c80ad289afe8f48fb67ef Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4b491eababa7b4933319f6cfcbc62dd547cb16c74137d00665 e74e1a37b0cf103659d52931fa98b8 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5d8b1945bdf1f164d82d0083fb2bb2c63a4ec1610f58ca391f 3419a5e703dba5f2951cb2b4485173 Préférences linguistiques
Hope and optimism, Michael – this is what I feel every single time I see the Canadian Flag. And I am thankful. Thankful that I can pass these feelings on to my kids. So that over time, as they grow, they come to understand that as Canadians, we uphold a strong tradition of honesty and openness that is respected and admired across the world.
Michael, we are so fortunate to live in this beautiful country, and share it with such a generous and caring people. As a mother, and as an MP, I believe it is our duty to ensure that generations of Canadians to come are also filled with hope, optimism and pride each time they see the Canadian Flag.
But we can’t leave that to chance. We must work hard to make our country better. And if you can’t be out there knocking on doors or making the phone calls, the dollars you raise can power the hard work of those who are.
That’s why, this week, as we celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag, we’re asking you to help support our national field team which is working hard inviting Canadians to choose a better government -- one that shares their progressive values.
Michael, your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now, before midnight tonight.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5d8b1945bdf1f164cb6192b68a54d9e99691cbc99d6a74de22 23aa412fa3b99c3a48f5dcc0843678 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Chrystia Freeland MP, Toronto Centre
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: CRITICAL: Tonight's deadline​​
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0a45bb0116cb285f3603ee832b82576a0af5bdff9c4a8cc78a 067cee1e465bcad59d00b890ca3524Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0a45bb0116cb285f5bbfd2593b9e5f581693ff1814265936fc bd2bd917a6a49d4c9bb1e55d36aa26 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0a45bb0116cb285f5b29a96888fcef1eb4ffc0a60b5b0136f2 82243c08df25a7b8727f9fec12c9c3 Préférences linguistiques
Michael, I’ll keep this short -- it’s all about heart We need it to build a stronger movement than the Conservatives. We need it to reach and rally more Canadians nationwide. And Michael, to do all that, we need you to have the heart to give now -- in these early and important months of 2015.
Michael -- give right now and join 2,994 Canadians who have donated $244,034 to our February fundraising drive.
Please review your recent contribution history:
Donor name:Michael Your February Fundraising Drive donation status: PENDING Total donated nationally in 2015: $0.00 (You have $1500 in contribution room left in 2015).
Your most recent one time donation: $10.00 in 2014
Your contribution right now will help build a winning election campaign.
Thank you for your last donation of $10 in 2014 -- you’ve made an incredible difference. But even in our strongest quarter the Conservatives outraised us. That’s why I’m asking you to match your last donation right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0a45bb0116cb285f1156166b8f42d3151ec63363cab47a112e ad7c27bcd0e6b2ec212812c36c0f30 Donate $10 →
We’re going to need as many Canadians as possible to give as early as possible this year -- including you.
February 15 marks the 50th anniversary of the Canadian flag. To show our pride, we’ll be celebrating with hundreds of Canadians at a major Flag Day rally in Mississauga, Ontario.
As a thank you, and to mark the occasion, everyone who donates to this fundraising drive will receive a signed digital photo from the rally celebrating this historic anniversary.
Thank you.
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
February 7 - 11, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | February 13, 9 AM - Midnight ET

message.subject: WATCH LIVE: Flag Day Rally with Justin Trudeau and the Rt. Hon. Jean Chrétien
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=faae1cbc062ab672d3747a8eea9ed9e3eb15573550c5d3acca 53bc41b65cdb6b4e67b0c7bd13cc5fSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc18b0e3a3c5cd713aa61f2743e8a233c036 b3a2bc407851c5ba05fa44933ec658 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc1014a5c7891af5f993c56d5a07f20b44fb 582146a08e7709d0e601bba7dd567d Préférences linguistiques
Today marks the 50th birthday of the Canadian Flag. In just a few moments we will be kicking off the country’s largest celebration with Justin Trudeau and Jean Chrétien. Michael, you can watch live.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc34ffc4fbea80a8dd83a79b0b1ba0864bbf 11b649396f8feac78571e39550907a Watch Now → Having trouble viewing on mobile?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc06f89cf550ab28cd357486c69017f8d3fa 601c2d1a1f6e1b41a79ebc9181d7e1 Go Here
In 1996 I had the privilege of competing for Canada in the marathon at the Summer Olympics in Atlanta.
I will never forget the sense of pride I felt for my country when I crossed the finish line wearing the Maple Leaf after that grueling 42.2 kilometer race.
Our nation’s flag stands for fairness and opportunity.
Throughout my eight years as a Member of the Ontario Provincial Parliament I worked hard to abide by these values, bring Canadians together, and help build a better community for us all.
Now, as the Team Trudeau candidate for Mississauga East–Cooksville, I’ll be working hard to continue this important task at the federal level.
To people around the world, our Maple Leaf is truly symbolic of how dedicated and hard working Canadians are.
That’s why today we are celebrating all these values with Justin Trudeau and the Rt. Hon. Jean Chrétien in Mississauga.
Will you join us for this unforgettable event Michael? Here are the details:
What: Flag Day Rally with Justin Trudeau and the Rt. Hon. Jean Chrétien
When: TODAY at 1:40PM (ET)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc34ffc4fbea80a8dd83a79b0b1ba0864bbf 11b649396f8feac78571e39550907a Tune In Now →
If you haven’t had a chance, you can still join the #MyFlag campaign and http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfccd8debf0a6d8a57b13c1baaa04c16f0dfa2 ce6573da3899a94b11fdd1354177b1 tell Canada what our Maple Leaf means to you. Thank you.
Peter Fonseca Liberal Candidate for Mississauga East—Cooksville
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc56e37e49e1164e1667569ee332d64eff24 2d9f70cd4b200148946fb64f4f6054 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfccde904c6d065fab6980d7360509045cd57c 4431d7b356e465bc2556aa79bb90fa Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=30f8b8074214cfcc7ccd17848cfb4b661f5e112b23a4986f3b fe5ecf212c75b595ecdae20b8872b9 here to view our policy.

message.subject: NEW POLL: Important issues this month
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ab1d9fde4972b7fc2bb50657bcf94138e4a6a481cbea8ab22 2558d256402e236d7f1977484146c2Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ab1d9fde4972b7f5f66a284dad8a6d623587bc9c7e8127f8f fe27d38a8b4380aa9a2793cdbdaf3c Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ab1d9fde4972b7f20a0ab115a09e43bd8d9f336e593cd573a 7a5d825e3a6d5dab100df24744d008 Préférences linguistiques
CBC cuts. A delayed budget amid increased Conservative ad-spending. A Supreme Court ruling on physician assisted death. The issues before Canadians this February hit the pocketbook, and touch our sense of who we are as Canadians.
Already, over 7,300 Canadians have shaped the conversation on Facebook on these key topics, and Michael, I’m very interested to hear which of these makes the discussion around your dinner table.
That’s why I’m asking you to take our short poll on February’s most important issues. It’s quick and it lets you weigh in on the debates that are top of mind for Canadians, right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ab1d9fde4972b7fcaded11946b3fa2975b455c559564bf7ed ebcb01b833f519cf9daf6caef28cbb TAKE THE POLL NOW →
Michael, sharing your thoughts on these critical matters is even more important this year because you’ll be helping drive positive change for Canada.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ab1d9fde4972b7f753a3c22aba1391fb6a16fcd3d19e13d40 d4534a747d0483706507b4f8eafe08 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: Still thinking, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8aa52de10535ce24a6395cd971b60636b24eb91032eaad3aa4 6d5d9f81c29a199ba9339e7fda31b8Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8aa52de10535ce242dc80a8590ed9df04a4357048574965fe7 1e3ca9575d54a973be5d1cee191501 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8aa52de10535ce241ac5bd9a7f871581bd053c8d23726da37e 43064655487437b168c2021749ad56 Préférences linguistiques
Michael, I really want to hear your thoughts on important issues such as climate change, national security and income splitting. Already 18,114 Canadians have spoken on these key topics and I know your voice will make the debate stronger.
That’s why I’m asking you to take our short poll on February’s most important issues, before midnight tonight. It’s quick and it lets you weigh in on the debates that are top of mind for Canadians, right now.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8aa52de10535ce24464c733f2c7bddd2757b0d40a747c77205 d659aef09c10941a0a63147d86d29d TAKE THE POLL NOW →
This year more than ever, your voice in these conversations is going to help us deliver a better government for Canada.
I’ll be looking out for your response, Michael
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8aa52de10535ce24edbb389430ab2d8c0cf8bc5ef8855d5ad3 c70e319088e9206f23f46f3db723ef Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: Trending at LPC: February 2015
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e9fde6c462f9a8fb60fd0570dcd84cf94aaf b5991ff6db89bf80d9fc79073582f9 >From the Leader's Desk
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e97f036a30dc8b3ab1f580a02dfd6da74d62 198cdfb1c4ef31127effddc37f94ac Michael -- I’m optimistic about Canada’s future, and you should be too.
This month we made an important announcement.In a speech in Calgary on February 6, I announced that a future Liberal government will take a medicare approach to fighting climate change and reducing greenhouse gas emissions in Canada.
We need federal leadership when it comes to energy and the environment -- nothing is more important to the Canadian economy than getting this right. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e9eca6198a585608ca4c8961be54db9fd8ad 3c33ebd0254c97165021e03ae3a3e7 Watch the full speech →
And, on February 15, I had the great honour of celebrating the 50th anniversary of our national flag with the Rt. Hon. Jean Chrétien and nearly 2,000 proud Canadians, at our Flag Day Rally in Mississauga. I invite you to view photos from this historic day.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e97f036a30dc8b3ab1f580a02dfd6da74d62 198cdfb1c4ef31127effddc37f94ac View Photos →

What's New at LPC http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e971fc74900071520ac3e4a03dd01bb08b7b 5b03b68cb70a11a7d1787bcadaeca1 Building the team http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e971fc74900071520ac3e4a03dd01bb08b7b 5b03b68cb70a11a7d1787bcadaeca1
February 22 Day of Action You made our #DayOfAction possible!
Want to know what change looks like? It looks like hundreds of volunteers working hard to meet Canadians like they did on Feb 22, 2015.
View the photos from this incredible day.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e971fc74900071520ac3e4a03dd01bb08b7b 5b03b68cb70a11a7d1787bcadaeca1 Photos →Road to Victory in 2015 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e91d5c10a6e0ccf7d221976e85dc6a95743f cb1a5bd167bf21ec7da7ce4228114f 233 days to the fixed election date http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e91d5c10a6e0ccf7d221976e85dc6a95743f cb1a5bd167bf21ec7da7ce4228114f Over 200 Team Trudeau candidates! Amazing! We now have over 200 Team Trudeau candidates nominated for the 2015 election. Learn more about the talented people on our team.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e91d5c10a6e0ccf7d221976e85dc6a95743f cb1a5bd167bf21ec7da7ce4228114f Learn More → In Case You Missed ItRecent items from the Liberal blog to view and share

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e9f1bfaabbd96d027fd1b157e15694d2f71e 3cc5ad5c56a5923abca8b790e07757 Justin Trudeau on the Liberal Opposition Day motion on physician-assisted dying Earlier this month, the Supreme Court of Canada issued a landmark judgment, striking down the ban on physician-assisted death. Their decision was not only unanimous – it was unambiguous.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=03bfa7088a09d9e9f1bfaabbd96d027fd1b157e15694d2f71e 3cc5ad5c56a5923abca8b790e07757

Climate change, national security and income splitting. This year more than ever, your voice in these key conversations is going to help us deliver a better government for Canada.

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=47cfff9e6fad58034650bff286f1152ed3b650c2364d909dc7 15237f3559f847430fb97c91b3c5e1 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=47cfff9e6fad58033c8e7bcd32c4d7882df3d1e09c1627e991 c3cc5dff8f4d48bc7fa081fb17f4ab Préférences linguistiques
Today is a very important day, Michael. Today is International Women’s Day -- a day to honour, celebrate and fight for the women and girls in our lives.
On this day I am reminded of how very lucky I am. I am reminded of the countless women who came before me, who fought for equality, and have made all of our lives better.
Today, I am reminded of how far we have come, but also how far we still have to go.
However, I am also reminded of the tragic stories of women and girls from around the world living under oppression, who are denied basic rights, and live in constant fear of abuse.
Here in Canada, women remain underpaid and under-represented. Many are at risk of domestic violence, and Indigenous women and girls continue to disappear.
But I know that together, we can change our country for the better. We can make Canada an example to the world, a place where girls and boys, men and women, are truly equals.
Today, I’m asking you to join with me and mark International Women’s Day by recognizing an exceptional woman in your community. A woman who demonstrates to everyone around her that we can do better, that we can build a better future for our daughters, granddaughters, and all Canadians.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=47cfff9e6fad5803a037d65333f1d337a09e29673c285641be ac19ad21a7c47cf96759f3ed92e99f Recognize Her Leadership →
When you recognize a woman showing leadership in your community, we will share your message with her, and invite her to join with us, as we continue to build a Canada that Canadians can be truly proud of.
With gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=47cfff9e6fad580332d927e50b9e6910672deafcde35436862 c44a68a130067fd719bab28f1444e6 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=47cfff9e6fad580328657c2c9c561afc3b6abe23bc61315d64 dc972ff78695a39edfd3f7d9964cc6 Unsubscribe

message.subject: I'm about to take the stage, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e6413b293e160e5d088f3ad86ae48bf58c7b57a e8b6cbded662bd535276fb804606a9Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e641398466a716ac8bcf4d5ffeec73bdde70318 484408ed70e350595269f3bf12fb88 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e6413d63f5a13af10beb4c88f9dbe77ec378d64 e37c8e05568644832742c656d32e0f Préférences linguistiques
In just a few minutes, I will be taking the stage to deliver an important speech to Canadians. Michael, I want you to have the opportunity to be there with me.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e64136e7bce84ba820ba4d7902616af9c3819d7 be242b463607c4705b608b24b06575 Watch My Speech LIVE → Having trouble viewing on mobile?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e64130f2c3321914389e4798018bf98c138ce92 1ad10fae82fd1536caf5b4e95cdf24 Go Here
I will be speaking about something that is important to all of us: Canadian liberty. Liberty defines our country. It is respect for liberty that makes us truly Canadian.
Canada is a diverse society, and it is this diversity that is at the very heart of who we are. The differences that exist between us are precisely what makes our country strong.
Regrettably, you may have heard a different message coming from Stephen Harper and the Conservative Party. They have been promoting an agenda of fear, division, and exclusion that seeks to harden the divisions between people whose views differ from their own.
But this is not my way, nor do I believe that this is the Canadian way.
Leading this country should mean working to bring Canadians together, not dividing them against one another. This is my vision, and with your help we can make it a reality.
This is why I want you to join with me at 7:30 ET, and hear what an inclusive Canada means to me.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e64136e7bce84ba820ba4d7902616af9c3819d7 be242b463607c4705b608b24b06575 Tune In Now → Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ce0310cd3c1e641389e867bcc4f5ec967c0ee9ba4aa728f85c 823fff842e87a4de760aab3c60a389 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: What Justin Trudeau said last night
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c5fca43ff9296e9a8cf3a2c448f313cc46d145a427fbed2d9 0605e964193e9953855310e5a142fbSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c5fca43ff9296e9756e09673fcf16691292a5833ef2d63b6d 4999bb7a889fe1a5fe4819771648fb Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c5fca43ff9296e90be08bfed8f67f565fc3fefef1745b6158 67193d4652b280e619a941f8771fc2 Préférences linguistiques
I am exceptionally proud today, to be a Liberal and a Canadian. And Michael, I want you to know exactly why that is, because I know that you too will be moved.
Last night Justin Trudeau gave an important speech on Canadian liberty. In it he talked about how Canadian society and democracy are strengthened because of our individual differences. An especially proud moment for me was when he asked the critical question, “What ever happened to a free society’s requirement that we can disagree with a person’s choices, but must defend their right to make them?”
Whether it is our religion, sexual orientation, cultural background, gender, language, or any other, our differences make Canada stronger, in every way. This is not only a Liberal value, it is the Canadian way.
Michael, there is only one leader who is actively defending this most fundamental characteristic of our Canadian identity. That leader is Justin Trudeau.
In fact, Mr. Harper and the Conservative government are promoting fear, division and exclusion at every possible turn -- tearing at the very fabric of Canadian democracy and threatening our individual liberties.
So Michael, I want to ask you an important question. Do you believe that the shared values of liberty, freedom and diversity on which Canada is built, are the values that should define our country now and for generations to come?
If you do, I’m asking you to fight for our shared values and please donate now to defend liberty in Canada.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c5fca43ff9296e9cd411a7c1a12d591d842128bf12a0336bc 043fd4460f0d791b25fe0741d2a07b DONATE NOW
Thank you.
Chrystia Freeland MP, Toronto Centre
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c5fca43ff9296e9de66304f41f593afc1aea5249797700edd c407367dec36510e01cd71f5fe3154 Watch the speech
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
