message.subject: Your slogan here:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f265bd321c75489276dc31805e95d286b742 1aeeeae9378df79e3f17de3c5f6b67Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f23ad12b8215f8fa098112ef7d227af47317 b9c6fe9c338e76fccfd27b1849aff1 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f2780ccc510be204a27da6e816bbb4a250b8 f9231c9ca16fce1764134af7af8f7b Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f2c1462e274c56ae60748b0306b6b14e6e69 949049c217898786d653f865f565db
Michael, you’ve made extraordinary things happen in our movement for change in Canada.
Now, we’re giving you 3 challenges to help make this our biggest March EVER.
Complete a challenge and you’ll earn unique rewards!
Are you ready?
CHALLENGE #1 — SPEAK OUT FOR CHANGE
T-SHIRT SLOGAN CHALLENGE
Design the change you want to see in Canada.
We know you have ideas – great ideas. And our newest Liberal t-shirt is missing one thing – a GREAT slogan.
That’s where you come in Michael! We want your T-SHIRT SLOGAN ideas by midnight tomorrow!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f2c1462e274c56ae60748b0306b6b14e6e69 949049c217898786d653f865f565db
The top three finalists will go to a nationwide vote and Canada will select the winner!
INSPIRED? http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f2c1462e274c56ae60748b0306b6b14e6e69 949049c217898786d653f865f565db ENTER YOUR SLOGAN NOW!
It’s free to enter and the more slogan entries we get, the more rewards you unlock!
If your design wins, you’ll get a free t-shirt and congratulatory phone call from Justin Trudeau! (Plus the satisfaction of knowing Canadians across the country are wearing YOUR t-shirt!)
Michael, what are you waiting for?
You have less than 48 hours and we can’t wait to see what you have to say!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f2c1462e274c56ae60748b0306b6b14e6e69 949049c217898786d653f865f565db ENTER YOUR SLOGAN NOW!
Thank you.
Christina Topp Senior Director of Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada
PS. Can’t wait to get the winning t-shirt? After your enter, donate $100 or more to reserve your t-shirt and get one hot off the press!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ffdbc9c4750a18f22ddfffe4a4120244e2b43695acac4a3544 6f1ed60afb5fb04cfa66e23c9596e6 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: Michael, got one yet?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790e1da53fffae13a4fd669430c35d51ee557 27cf4d98496c040b2becc73afa253fSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c7905ae117b89733f9758c8fe8849119c2e211 b62a8794f4df99939df6f6015656c7 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c79051b19dbf1a0382fda0192c705c7a330006 13735c175df34a0b35af5abd7ae425 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790bfd3f6411652551b5a8bf4c4a88b6b9f22 b5e6a8fcefe0f5d57d094c122d3923
Michael, this is going to be the best t-shirt!
I knew Canadians were creative, but the Liberals taking our T-shirt Slogan Challenge are simply genius!
Our entire digital team here at the National office is buzzing with excitement reading through the thousands of fantastic t-shirt slogans pouring in from across Canada.
As the Graphic Designer here at LPC, I’ve already started mocking up some of the submissions! Even though I’ve seen so many amazing slogans come across my desk that I can’t keep up, I’m still uber excited to see your idea, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790bfd3f6411652551b5a8bf4c4a88b6b9f22 b5e6a8fcefe0f5d57d094c122d3923
Get your t-shirt slogan in the books before midnight tonight!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790bfd3f6411652551b5a8bf4c4a88b6b9f22 b5e6a8fcefe0f5d57d094c122d3923 ENTER YOUR SLOGAN NOW!
The top three finalists will go to a nationwide vote and Canada will select the winner!
It’s free to enter and the more slogan entries we get, the more rewards you unlock. In fact, we’ve already received over 3,000 submissions and unlocked a great reward for everyone -- INCREDIBLE!
If your design wins, you’ll get a free t-shirt and congratulatory phone call from Justin Trudeau! (Plus the satisfaction of knowing Canadians across the country are wearing YOUR t-shirt!)
Michael, we can’t wait to see your idea!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790bfd3f6411652551b5a8bf4c4a88b6b9f22 b5e6a8fcefe0f5d57d094c122d3923 ENTER YOUR SLOGAN NOW!
Thank you.
Darrell Dean Graphic Designer, Liberal Party of Canada
PS. Can’t wait to get the winning t-shirt? After your enter, donate $100 or more to reserve your t-shirt and get one hot off the press!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c7904e47b964517cfabcfb71d910016c286fdd 9c774127409556a93c09324aa6219b Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c790383c5172251665bd7b090cd4d6ed557e8e 7a3aba10a9b01c136f169dece3e378 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c79044fdec3b947e802bbb064fec47b2b4129f 91f2bb5a809eaebca525b007debb11 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3e8a49a6b798c79091b65b5e9f7ee559a436c4a2797eff440c 3b4d5d689e7bd047bc665d89077978 here to view our policy.
20150312DDJB - DD - 3CFC - 2 - A - ACTIVE - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Michael, which t-shirt will you wear?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=19882fe68541f4b36c59bf16794e104ae03c18636355ca4ad2 1560ac4c01b4378b1d725a0ff95065Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=19882fe68541f4b321b357d9414bef1a0536a349ef539ee698 cb3fb4a3e74655756132947f70e374 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653b0079612390cde8c9b321b2512d4f55d7f5 278162b031370f13bc6e3b537e6cc8 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653be3535aaed8584fc0a7edfbdcf217433a1f 027029250ad13698ba16f530690c6c
Michael, we challenged you for your best Liberal t-shirt slogan ideas and boy did you deliver!
Thousands of AMAZING slogans came in from across the country, and you really made it tough to select just three -- thank you!
So, Canada, now it’s time for YOU to decide the winner!
Find out which slogans made the top three, and vote on your favourite before midnight on Monday, March 16.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653be3535aaed8584fc0a7edfbdcf217433a1f 027029250ad13698ba16f530690c6c
The more votes we get, the more rewards you unlock. And we’ve already unlocked one great reward for everyone!
Next up, we’re are giving out 10 free t-shirts to lucky voters for every 10,000 votes we get.
Michael, the clock is ticking. Have your say on the t-shirt Canadians will be wearing this spring to show their support!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653be3535aaed8584fc0a7edfbdcf217433a1f 027029250ad13698ba16f530690c6c VOTE NOW!
Thank you.
Liberal Party of Canada
PS. Can’t wait to get the winning t-shirt? After your vote, donate $100 or more and get one hot off the press!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653b2f9fd2dfad86025ad6d3334f635a2b3d46 09aee3fff6bca9cf11c986f7d8601e Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f1ab507fac52653b9e1ff585976842fba9960a1bc7df976b70 cceda9c09323e99efa874c000d7a91 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Rise and shine, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf23632712b16e3ff33e95c09e1af9bcdf3fe fd2c4bb1e6aa0278008139cc2f19b6Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf21e3718bf57ef535bc82d9e4f715cd3d62c 4ceddac6075b82be53701b8a1743c3 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf2bb2f28162e03d74067b7c8ea25148c14e8 b5ddcb0c66205b8b307933404397ac Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf2cf378228bf8eda006f648ecdbcd5604dc5 60b9527e5a47aeeac12c8092f2deb4
Rise and shine, Michael! Because, right now Team Trudeau volunteers are hitting the pavement across Canada with one single purpose -- to connect with voters in their communities. And they need our support. Let’s back them up with the support they need to mobilize our teams across the country. To keep their spirits high while they are out talking to voters, we’ll be updating the Community Team Leaders so they know just how many Canadians are backing their hard work!
Michael, if you believe in growing our movement one voter at a time, give now, and help us raise $25,000 for today’s Day of Action.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf2cf378228bf8eda006f648ecdbcd5604dc5 60b9527e5a47aeeac12c8092f2deb4 DONATE TO BACK OUR VOLUNTEERS
If we hit our goal of $25,000 by midnight tonight, wewill create a special video to thank all our Team Trudeau donors and volunteers.
Hard-working, passionate and committed, our volunteers are out there, doing everything they can to grow our movement -- let’s show them some love.
Rise to the challenge Michael, become a Team Trudeau backer today!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf2cf378228bf8eda006f648ecdbcd5604dc5 60b9527e5a47aeeac12c8092f2deb4 DONATE TO BACK OUR VOLUNTEERS
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf269724fcaf4593f9b76b530349c941afad3 e40d632c77ffc83c68f127502e57fc Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf23f40c4b3eaf273a7e38518c966dd1a4571 486898be587a4881e5af6a9036a371 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f16ae5805c3c2cf2adedd16db9e6d23ed258f8a82fd6381c25 c9f05614dc9c4f8b76abd6e9dcdeac here to view our policy.
20150321KT - KT - 3CFC - 8 - EN

message.subject: You earned this, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a871066790929a1c0aa9696c1c8057b9e97aa563 d91ede83360959b5195e511db2e062Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a871064867701926d9082464c1e889ce5fbec5d5 bf8c2269daddd6551b1a98cada6fcd Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a871066db085178e8c679f8430f41fca6c09e98f 1645f8e63017eab9c309133417a50e Préférences linguistiques
Last Saturday, over 2,000 volunteers hit the streets across Canada in a National Day of Action.
They started 23,205 conversations with Canadians and spread our positive message that the middle class can have a real and fair chance to succeed.
It was an incredible effort, and I want to thank the team for all their hard work.
Each individual action is a small, but crucial part of the much larger goal of preparing a better government in 2015 -- a government that respects individual liberty and seeks to bring Canadians together, not divide them against one another.
And that’s why the work of our Team Trudeau volunteers is so inspiring. It’s proof that hope and hard work is the only way we know how to win. One doorstep at a time. One phone call at a time. One vote at a time. Every Canadian matters.
Over the past few weeks, I know your achievements have unlocked a number of rewards, and I am excited to be participating in some of them. I will be making a congratulatory phone call to the young man from Toronto who submitted a winning T-shirt slogan. I’ll be recording a video of my top volunteering tips, and soon I’ll be joining one of our hard working volunteers to drive change on the doorstep.
Today, as a reward for submitting so many t-shirt slogans, and to thank everyone who has participated in this month’s challenges for change, I want to make this special reward available to everyone -- digital wallpaper featuring the winning T-shirt slogan!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a87106503ed7247df250b37766579221b04c2f50 bede859013a69f13c09d26c79bfeb3 Download your mobile or desktop wallpaper
Every action matters. It might be big, or it might be small, but no matter what way you are contributing, it always makes a difference.
Thank you for being part of the change, Michael.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a871064e1b053d591bdd6669e413e2644ae03819 b0316491b2f6440d1746e4549bd66c Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a871068c6a7265495f051e37bd49e04a8f06cae6 556a6d8518ff9102b541c11fd60e45 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4656082288a87106997d7d66b99d98b4f9e117433d4e1c011c 8f69c69a232e44f88a823102c36320 Unsubscribe

message.subject: Today's motion on the war in Iraq​ and Syria
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368be74343bdd0cf639f78b224e12e259ac0f 2e2bfd17cfa3efd688a2a1babf5cacSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a1336835538fc304be6e850c5b3fd9687ae00894 8e46ff924f4db869a81d14ab1ad680 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368ce597b25e7582358ea5b8d091a862b7f53 0b7929d0a573231060c50882447fcc Préférences linguistiques
This morning in the House of Commons, the Prime Minister proposed to extend and deepen Canada’s involvement in the war in Iraq, and expand the mission to include Syria.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368e0af14480cb5f48daea247cdd90382bfe4 2ed48a93bb809a07b1a99c27859c36
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368e0af14480cb5f48daea247cdd90382bfe4 2ed48a93bb809a07b1a99c27859c36 Watch, Then Add Your Name → We now know that our initial 30-day non-combat “advise and assist” effort became a six-month long engagement, and then evolved into one where Canadian troops were active on the front lines, regularly engaging in direct combat.
We in the Liberal Party have never been opposed to our Canadian Armed Forces employing the lethal force of which they are capable when it clearly serves Canada’s national interest to do so.
But in every case that national interest must be clearly and rationally articulated. The mission designed to uphold that interest must have transparent objectives and a responsible plan to achieve them.
Involvement in direct combat in this war does not serve Canada’s interests. Nor will it provide a constructive solution to the catastrophic humanitarian crisis in the region. For these reasons, we cannot support the proposed mission extension and expansion.
Last fall we said that we would not support the Prime Minister’s motion to go to war in Iraq because he failed to offer a clear and responsible plan.
The four core principles we articulated then still stand today.
- One, Canada has a role to play in confronting humanitarian crises in the world.
- Two, when a government considers deploying our men and women in uniform, there must be a clear mission and a clear role for Canada.
- Three, that the case for deploying our forces must be made openly and transparently, based on clear and reliable, dispassionately presented facts.
- Four, Canada’s role must reflect the broad scope of Canadian capabilities and how best we can help.
We expressed grave concern that the Prime Minister intended to involve Canada in a longer, deeper combat engagement.
Today, we know those concerns were well-founded.
Canadians need to know what this Prime Minister is getting them into.
The United Nations tells us that after four years of brutal conflict, more than half of the Syrian population have been driven out of their homes.
The Syrian people have for years been oppressed and terrorized by their own government, under the rule of Bashar al-Assad. This is a man who has used chemical weapons on his own citizens, and whose regime is responsible for torturing and killing hundreds of thousands of people.
We cannot support a mission that could very well result in Assad consolidating his grip on power in Syria.
Furthermore, the Minister of Foreign Affairs explicitly compared this war to Afghanistan, stating that “[we are] in this for the longer term.”
In Afghanistan, the “longer term” meant a decade.
The government is proposing an unfocused, unending mission for the Canadian Forces that we cannot support.
Let me be clear: Canada has a role to play in the campaign against ISIL. But that role must serve our national interests, and what is being proposed today by the Prime Minister does not meet that test.
Canada has a clear interest in training Iraqi forces to fight and destroy ISIL. We can – and should – do this training away from the front lines, as our allies are doing.
On the ground, we should provide more help through a well-funded and well-planned humanitarian aid effort.
Here at home, we should expand our refugee targets and give more victims of war the opportunity to start a new life in Canada.
Let there be no doubt that our men and women in uniform have our full support as they continue their dangerous work, in this volatile part of the world.
However, the government is asking Canadians to support deepening our involvement in the war in Iraq, and to expand that involvement into a combat mission in Syria.
And because of this, the Liberal Party of Canada will not support this government’s motion.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368e0af14480cb5f48daea247cdd90382bfe4 2ed48a93bb809a07b1a99c27859c36 Watch, Then Add Your Name → Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368115e23ab0b87a7fe72a75226c9b4b41316 f575e84ab296239701389126612953 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=11bc875ad5a13368df001a2869e14e07f4c65cab5f2f4c361c 57726b13bf8646ce22f50e80ab190b Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.

message.subject: Michael, look at what you’ve accomplished
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e46e1b4672273ec4248cb2d80a6804ef2a89 892bf1254652fad8e0741e3150864cSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e438c29819404dad80a1ea6cf26d1902266a 371dd7c85e39f107690fe4eac51139 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e4e45087a0d6498a9ffd40445202a4f2b66e f2aaa9e8a2c069a94758ac7fd1c076 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e4deca6b1c65d9a225c2616fb318fa034df6 5d2d81601d20daffe076adc3605aaf
Wow. Just wow, Michael. Let me show you what you’ve accomplished so far.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e4deca6b1c65d9a225c2616fb318fa034df6 5d2d81601d20daffe076adc3605aaf
Now it's time for one more challenge -- the BIGGEST -- and you’re not going to believe the amazing rewards we have in store for you if you decide to be part of it. (Hint: read all the way to the end to learn more!)
CHALLENGE #3 — FUND CHANGE
Michael, we need YOU to help us raise $500,000 to fight for change in Canada before the books close on the first fundraising quarter of 2015 next Tuesday, March 31 at midnight.
All donations will go toward critical initiatives like the targeted French-language ad campaign launched just this week in target markets across Quebec and parts of Canada.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e41462219db68c8f5f84361febd3f0885d0c 50093e245bf64b0c09815194883926 Donate $10 →
Ok -- NOW IT’S TIME to talk about the rewards. And they are AMAZING!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e41462219db68c8f5f84361febd3f0885d0c 50093e245bf64b0c09815194883926
And now for the grand prize -- one we can ALL share! If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
Michael, this is it. Show Justin Trudeau you're ready to fight for the Canada you believe in. Show him you’re PART OF THE CHANGE!
Thank you.
Darrell Dean Graphic Designer, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e42179ed236f41e342d807f61b1b286899ab 3d07eb774cfbf46eb8ea0ee5c264c3 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e4f7fc00c6599745b8f286d1db4af0420f03 372ab460564d878a9404ad318a265a Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e0d24733129649e4bff0fed0c04721bed7f6aba40fa22137aa 8afbf470aa21b2d075e5a3a808098b here to view our policy.
20150324DD - DD - Email 1 - PROS-PLUS - EN

message.subject: Read this quote, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268ff44db6fc6a786924262f70a0603ac91cd8 055e70087a9304f1a1676dc45a6c05Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268f24fe6e3118b0cf6134466c0b11ed3f13b2 daf4a3f238e7ac677a19f8caa6a0be Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268f856c57c4eb2b20c5a2722dd8e9866d4661 c708f445bbcb48a091c4b806317ea8 Préférences linguistiques
We have them worried Michael, but they're pushing harder than ever. And that's exactly why we can't slow down.
Read this excerpt from a recent Conservative fundraising email then let’s do everything we can to gain even more ground on them early in this all-important election year.
As the Conservative Party’s Executive Director, I cannot forget to tell you that the end of winter also means the end of our first fiscal quarter. It’s the first time this year that we publish our fundraising results.
In the last quarter, the Liberals were hot on our heels.
Will you help us keep a cash advantage over the Liberals by making your 2015 gift today?...
...Our analysis tells us that the Liberals are seeing increasingly positive success in their fundraising efforts.
Michael, we need YOU to help us raise $500,000 to fight for change in Canada before the books close on the first fundraising quarter of 2015 next Tuesday, March 31 at midnight.
All donations will go toward critical initiatives like the targeted French-language ad campaign launched just this week in target markets across Quebec and parts of Canada.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268fe28b22c7fcc3d15271e94c53beb5ebc652 d27f080f62f509e89e2796c7d62985 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268ff5b4f388ce0d3eb19c20af3f74bed5771c fb113f476faf320c155cb23ae8c4c6
And if we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
Michael, this is it. Show Justin Trudeau you're ready to fight for the Canada you believe in. Show him you’re PART OF THE CHANGE!
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d6285a05c3c6268f83f8326047387ab70fecb3b57b591afb06 9e0391b4aca55a7df9b84a587bb5f1 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Hot on their heels
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c75007e2ac26c6ae849cb2611bf4818a5d5 efaaba6c7fa44763f555db195c28f6Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c63f1ee8320045e4ba2d1ef8d367cd5e4bf a08201dabdff069436acb80b9ac383 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c79cc67f0ec6d032df67fe9114b55344a72 d2bc8a3cf722af235e4bf535ae1fa5 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c578582fd8c9e7b2effcae646d08a409b0a 07cff10338d94581e94cb21bbcb542
Michael, we’re waiting on you to unlock a great reward for everyone.
1,776 Canadians have contributed $156,949 in our 3rd Challenge for Change - incredible! But we still need your help to keep the pressure on the Conservatives. We're hot on their heels, and we can't ease up now!
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: 20 September 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
**Your 2015 donor history record is for this exact email address. If you made a recent online contribution, or contributed by check or by mail, this may not be reflected in your 2015 donor history – thank you for your support!
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c022f5e8d930d8ace6ff7a3fe13a3d5709f fffac109cfebbddc33ff7f8b01d58e Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e67f79c47e7b6b1c022f5e8d930d8ace6ff7a3fe13a3d5709f fffac109cfebbddc33ff7f8b01d58e
And if we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
Thank you,
Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Tremendous
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5cea6a13b77c1aecd8ad508e7ce6b41fa7d5 7840688ba3f50f7f76482f3f10d919Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5c361d10b04efc58ef3a4fa49a13b0dadd03 ec073690899cc075b21f60eb983f01 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5cde915aaf7b84fe4277b0cc90a778dec690 3f7442542062daa18d13c269585cde Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5cce805de9044e255ab4febacb1e9d81c64e 432afa73b075a2808721c922edf601
127,781 actions so far in March, Michael.
T-shirt slogan submissions and votes, volunteer sign ups, conversations with Canadians, donations and so much more.
I have been keeping a close watch on the support Canadians are showing for our Challenges for Change campaign and I am profoundly grateful that you’ve been a part of this inspiring show of support.
Collectively, these actions show me something even greater than the individual achievements.
They show me heart and potential. And they show me that our movement is gaining tremendous momentum when we need it the most -- now, early enough in the election year to allow us to develop the smartest, strongest and most positive campaign we possibly can.
With the election fast approaching, and the Conservatives promoting fear, division and mistrust at every possible turn, your support is vital to helping me build a vision for government that brings Canadians together, and strengthens the bonds between them.
Michael, help us raise $500,000 to fight for change in Canada before the books close on the first fundraising quarter of 2015 next Tuesday, March 31 at midnight.
All donations will go toward critical initiatives like the targeted French-language ad campaign launched just this week in target markets across Quebec and parts of Canada.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5c8e998ab4588dab495876153db0ea979861 08a2689f44278542d79604f43a7640 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5ce4d5af7913e86e524d6a67a64ceb4dc150 c1380ad62146e657d3ad0835888bde
And if we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with me later this spring!
Hard working Canadians like you have been digging deep and working even harder this year to help build a government that is honest, inclusive and accepting.
Michael, stand with me now, and show your support when it matters the most.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
.
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5cc8e0786b85f2277c5eaaea334056517a45 441f7f5c85f52aedcadc7d6bc3bc76 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5c085db5123ebacc47b70616361233c3290d 672fa0dae2502f605e72ccdfa4d8eb Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c55041a27a87c5c514c72255696286dd846698926241ada6e 89e9267e78704dd3f20383d91e9089 here to view our policy.
20150327JT - JT - Email 4 - PROS-PLUS - EN

message.subject: Get your limited edition Justin Trudeau sketch!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb678497a1eec53f300cfbeecbf6f11707925 ff998ac089e1f114ac6e85bc0166b0Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb6fa291ef946a6aea2c4ae58fc6413c79082 7f59f19cd24665a12bd0c889b9fd9e Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb676f7abc7f823290779123a0028b34d33cf 4f1f8866fcce504f6b76c35f9d4701 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb68c7d0564d2a4b6f4487d518ac464c934e0 e9fe7e92103dcaaf9034e17f929fe9
“Even more rewards”, Michael! That’s straight out of a great message I received from Justin Trudeau.
He is so thrilled with the support Canadians have shown for our 3 Challenges for Change campaign, that he challenged us to find even more ways to reward you. And we have!
We’ve already raised $235,548 this month as we try to raise $500,000 before midnight March 31. If we can get to $350,000 in the next 3 days EVERY March donor will get a beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard!
Take a look, here is a shot of him buying his art supplies:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb68c7d0564d2a4b6f4487d518ac464c934e0 e9fe7e92103dcaaf9034e17f929fe9
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb6d26fdf3b7b3f9b3769aaca2631b8661135 18206487a42e901e75e6b0cb07ef5a Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can be a Challenge #3 winner!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb6d26fdf3b7b3f9b3769aaca2631b8661135 18206487a42e901e75e6b0cb07ef5a
And now for the grand prize -- one we can ALL share! If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
And if we cross the $350,000 mark by Monday at midnight, EVERY March donor will get a beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard!
Michael, show Justin Trudeau you are up to the challenge and ready to fight for the Canada we believe in!
Thank You.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2153ed27927c1cb678238c2769fa397c0f77c167c620a1d342 ff717e08ec0ea7fa288543930c6cc7 here to view our policy.

message.subject: You see this?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1b6bd9749918c95976ca41b269ee85d2953 fc2a578f45f08c6601fb8e0031d2a1Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1e1470dd291b99c6bbd6d28e8ecdd58e1bb 7cb23afbeae1f57afbd1ffde36e8f8 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1e57e01c711022e70042b71575752012a81 6c0fdf5d49c3bcd55a26175a36b528 Préférences linguistiques
Heads-up Michael. We can't forget this.
There are less than 96 hours leftin our fundraising drive -- we need you to give now and help close the gap.
We don’t know where the Conservatives are at this quarter, but we do know this is what happened at the end of Q4 last year:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1a70d9420112ee2c8315f6bfa4ba9dac138 919431fcc356ae62f9a2d5a17757dd
We can't let this happen again. Help close the gap now, Michael.
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: 20 September 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
**Your 2015 donor history record is for this exact email address. If you made a recent online contribution, or contributed by check or by mail, this may not be reflected in your 2015 donor history – thank you for your support!
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1594ba0ccb1896045a4cc1e8f31c3f3509e 191d13ae8f372362a6973c41334f90 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1e77ddf127ef6c5bbe5ab4febb2eae0be60 8e565a3ffcece8be61539f82dc4aaf
If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
And if we cross the $350,000 mark by Monday at midnight, EVERY March donor will get a beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard!
We already have 2,753 Canadians who have pitched in $253,921 -- but the clock is ticking and time is running out to be a part of what’s happened during this extraordinary month.
Michael, be part of the change.
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1f7338e0b1f9010b8bae0778e158a5a6013 e6807f2b9dc16cc08bd1984c999159 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1c3a7306c7925e4e32412901594d1ba585e 6fb0662e61511cde15c5a81aae2414 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ee6ca793b210a0f1c46491bbedc979642634b3b54a7b76141b 7dc6360388ce8c3506a745751776ca here to view our policy.
20150329KTDG - KTDG - Email 7 - PROS PLUS - EN

message.subject: Can you check this, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e8619e53089a523da1e34b2d7dace3ef2f83e5f 628280ca201a8b600f5cee5e4969e4Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e8619115c6a0ffaa985f85680952efff8c72fb0 ff30728cf07e728c83ac1132025db2 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e8619c212b8955c76683c40ff25f65ea3ea1ad6 b377b6065e5ae057a6e09307256ce7 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e86190f0c4d5c612e7a2495dd4da01c8d06cfee d09e37905ed6c82805f9eb582469e1
Less than 2 days left and so many rewards on the table -- we can’t believe you’re not IN yet, Michael. Are our records off?
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: 20 September 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
**Your 2015 donor history record is for this exact email address. If you made a recent online contribution, or contributed by check or by mail, this may not be reflected in your 2015 donor history – thank you for your support!
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e86197aa0f1ee84b02585b9d8764b4f65750fdf 33e9f90d34422677d31a768d9d32f8 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can be a Challenge #3 winner!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e86197aa0f1ee84b02585b9d8764b4f65750fdf 33e9f90d34422677d31a768d9d32f8
And now for the grand prize -- one we can ALL share! If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight March 31, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
And if we cross the $350,000 mark by midnight tonight, EVERY March donor will get a beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard!
Join the 3,485 Canadians who have contributed $333,582 so far this fundraising drive. Be part of the change, Michael.
Thank you,
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e86196e882c7e7656dbca3fbc8716e860b2b162 1c97a01e50bf2618b0fcc23596d198 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e8619b43da4b85fb2b5d4d80c527d0a41e2f68d 0a5ebbab2dcdf40a67f3d8c95e772f Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=70e2f04bb33e86192ce0d5fa2a379f3af37e2937aba2bec924 c76fdb8d956e7a507f4b8e553643ef here to view our policy.
20150330JB - JB - Email 11 - PROS PLUS - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: Values
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf7530ba54dec1d695e06d4bdf43fdb7c47ee f11ee1f27474fd6df1bf3f40fd74afSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf77e774423b9c1931e647f92c1f6c10d3760 6262c158cfe55cc5492bd48b4fe43b Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf78fb79b1fbbf482a1c3fc557e6c7c1d87e3 68043e2d35b8e4eda768ba63e66a12 Préférences linguistiques
What’s at stake for Canada, Michael?
More than any other, this question pushes me to work harder than ever before. And it’s why I have been asking the same of you in this all-important election year -- as we work to build a more open and inclusive government for Canada.
We are at a pivotal moment in history where our actions right now, and every day leading up to the election, can directly impact our country’s character, our place in the world, and the daily lives of every single Canadian.
Michael, our work, our hope and our conviction today will allow us to give Canada back to Canadians. They will allow us to fight harder than ever against a government that threatens our individual liberties by promoting fear and mistrust. They will allow us to stand up strong against a government that values secrecy over openness and rewards the richest Canadians over our hard working middle class.
And the greatest thing we can achieve with our hope and hard work is to give Canadians an inclusive, optimistic and ambitious vision of our country -- a Canada for everyone.
That’s what’s at stake, Michael. And it’s why I’m calling on you to work harder than ever before and take action now, when it counts the most.
Help us raise $500,000 to fight for change in Canada before the books close on the first fundraising quarter of 2015 at midnight on Tuesday.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf705f39f7a03f78e770bb1d4509f0eef4314 408a0898f3a608e62acaaa8ea26cbc Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf7d733a18ab9e4835a4926fb1666927e8391 28b65d9525897a55c367f45a1115f6
And if we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight Tuesday, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with me later this spring!
Stand with me now Michael, and we will give Canada back to Canadians.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e70b570e36b9acf76bfa27977d7a845ebbeb8be5d8d3f76a43 be0de88535f8aadd0633f461d01963 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Can't stop now, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c9486dedcb965135b9e366bdce819dd8e63b9 6bc0806aad6694ea291738c0eb7035Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c94c53e55d5edfaad2c7068c25b576ffe56f8 36a0cd41b137600f6a01134f7b64a3 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c9462c28e2a08f5230e866690126e23695e87 7c8d71952ff5e5879e9108e9e655bb Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c948ba37d1929257ec2683a4391241f3edeef 17290187cf4c86faef93bcc26657f4
We did it, Michael, but we can’t stop now! We blew past $350,000 yesterday -- meaning everyone who donates this month, including today, will get this beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard, once it's complete.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c948ba37d1929257ec2683a4391241f3edeef 17290187cf4c86faef93bcc26657f4
But with just 16 hours left before the books close on the first fundraising quarter, we still haven’t hit our $500,000 goal.
Michael, will you join the 4,171 Canadians who have donated $395,021 so far and help make this our biggest March ever?
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c947d16508240df1a512282dc95b5bc95b576 92fe1610ca228c696d2de557186e87 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can be a Challenge #3 winner!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ad16dd26e3bf9c947d16508240df1a512282dc95b5bc95b576 92fe1610ca228c696d2de557186e87
And now for the grand prize -- one we can ALL share! If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight TONIGHT, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
We can’t do this without you -- and midnight is fast approaching.
Thank You,
Christina Topp Senior Director of Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET

message.subject: Too much at stake, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0198bfa59bc25975f232f3ac66299e664eb2dd0ff8cc38a6b1 19dbf92d85dacaea6ee9d2d51dd5fcSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0198bfa59bc259755e9fd8db27b6fc251146133eaef6d4a90b 7acf937080af0de652676effd196c0 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0198bfa59bc25975cd5ac24055812de7ee621cfb15ec7d1ed0 93a6f1381b0f8538fc57893bf501cd Préférences linguistiques
Recently, Justin Trudeau gave a major speech on Canadian liberty, standing up to Mr. Harper’s shameful politics of fear. He stood up to Mr. Harper again last week, speaking out against deepening, lengthening and expanding Canada’s involvement in Iraq, to include the Syrian Civil War.
These speeches reminded me that my Liberal government also never let the Conservatives debase Canadian values. And we certainly never let them drag us into a decade-long war in Iraq.
I stared them down, again and again, when their choices called into question who we are as Canadians at home and abroad.
This is why, when Justin Trudeau speaks, I am hopeful for the future.
The values he articulates -- diversity, inclusion, equality -- are the bedrock of Canadian society. They are the values of the Canadian flag that he and I celebrated last month.
Meanwhile, Mr. Harper, has a different message -- of fear, division and distrust -- the very forces that weaken the bonds between Canadians.
Our values and international reputation were won with great effort and through many hard-fought victories. The Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms, a woman’s right to choose, and the legalization of gay marriage. Saying no to the last war in Iraq, and leading the way on Kyoto.
We must not take these achievements for granted. Each and every Canadian must stand up to defend our rights and liberties, our values, and our place in the world. That includes you and me, Michael.
That’s why I’m asking you to pitch in for Canada. For our values, the Liberal Party and for Justin Trudeau.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0198bfa59bc25975cebaf5aa85603c23ab516fb1f8b2a2a8b3 2efa521d4ec63cb7f596d6287542a4 Donate $10 →
Thank you,
The Right Honourable Jean Chrétien
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
March 23 - 27, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 28 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | March 30, 9 AM - 7 PM ET | March 31, 9 AM to Midnight ET

20150331JC - JC - Email 14 - PROS PLUS - EN
</HTML>

message.subject: URGENT: Did you know?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e75228579bfeac0f39b8fcade8551d8e011cd5b2fd6523918 56c6840c636e49615d4fe7da1f306dSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e75228579bfeac03eec48706f2559b9ff30e2ed3f8fcd7469 0e52fc9b1be0528c401d0cd2f249ff Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e75228579bfeac07d78997c13b9e3f61d5ea09c17b4957bbf 9a9c9453b88f156a7e41d022570024 Préférences linguistiques
This is the big one, Michael.
Less than 7 hours left in the most critical fundraising deadline this year and I wanted to make sure you saw this message from Right Honourable Jean Chrétien to Liberals, sent just hours ago.
Have a look and then join the 4,870 Canadians who have donated $474,475 toward our goal to raise $500,000 before the books close on the first fundraising quarter of 2015 at midnight tonight.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e75228579bfeac0345a9a5b8f53219b339d98429572c61902 d6244f309085f8d2180dc4e906bc38 Donate $10 →
There is simply too much at stake, Michael -- and we need you with us.
Thank you.
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
--- Original Message ---
From: Jean Chrétien
To: Katie Telford
Subject: Too much at stake, Katie
Recently, Justin Trudeau gave a major speech on Canadian liberty, standing up to Mr. Harper’s shameful politics of fear.
He stood up to Mr. Harper again last week, speaking out against deepening, lengthening and expanding Canada’s involvement in Iraq, to include the Syrian Civil War.
These speeches reminded me that my Liberal government also never let the Conservatives debase Canadian values. And we certainly never let them drag us into a decade-long war in Iraq.
I stared them down, again and again, when their choices called into question who we are as Canadians at home and abroad.
This is why, when Justin Trudeau speaks, I am hopeful for the future.
The values he articulates -- diversity, inclusion, equality -- are the bedrock of Canadian society. They are the values of the Canadian flag that he and I celebrated last month.
Meanwhile, Mr. Harper, has a different message -- of fear, division and distrust -- the very forces that weaken the bonds between Canadians.
Our values and international reputation were won with great effort and through many hard-fought victories. The Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms, a woman’s right to choose, and the legalization of gay marriage. Saying no to the last war in Iraq, and leading the way on Kyoto.
We must not take these achievements for granted. Each and every Canadian must stand up to defend our rights and liberties, our values, and our place in the world. That includes you and me.
That’s why I’m asking you to pitch in for Canada. For our values, the Liberal Party and for Justin Trudeau.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9e75228579bfeac0dbf3d24caafafd997da0c8e5c71560feea 422e7a7accc8e7ceb7b8dc8f4c0dda Donate now→
Thank you, The Right Honourable Jean Chrétien
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)

message.subject: One thing missing: Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4eadc2a2bfd113d9c0ca9d5595258f22d4f5 04db87119d097b84a44f80697f44baSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4e9baf4aeb9194f2da7fef48bc7e51b954ff 5b1a56380d706c4da707b8a676e02d Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4edab5dd2844bf1281acb01afa5c44dbb8a0 f41eb4494ce2b1311b76d69dff6156 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4ecb02c5b1d05439a6a5e19d99abfbbf5849 f4acd782c64cb1a6f914eb335060c4
There seems to be something missing from our records Michael – YOU. 5,182 donors are in. This is your LAST CHANCE to join them.
Set our records straight before midnight tonight Michael – you only have a few hours left!
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: 20 September 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
**Your 2015 donor history record is for this exact email address. If you made a recent online contribution, or contributed by check or by mail, this may not be reflected in your 2015 donor history – thank you for your support!
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you! We need you to match that donation now to ensure we have the funds we need to elect Justin Trudeau Prime Minister when the election is called.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4ee24f8090a13e189f2fefd351128784c184 a1c44137824096a44c3ce6fa4d9b87 Donate $10 →
Remember, everyone can win!
First off, everyone who donates $100 or more, will receive the winningT-shirt from Challenge #1.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4e14477b4137342941a41717bb3b38df771e a476085011db3a430045187acdc13c
If we hit our goal of $500,000 by midnight tonight, every donor will be invited to a telephone Town Hall with Justin Trudeau later this spring!
And, because we crossed our goal of $350,000 by Monday at midnight, EVERY March donor will get a beautiful, limited-edition original Justin Trudeau sketch as a postcard! The sketch, a work in progress, is entitled “Canadian Liberty”. It depicts the Canadian Museum for Human Rights in Winnipeg, a building dedicated to advancing human rights learning and discovery, and helping Canadians to forge a new era of global human rights leadership.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a303f5060a07ed4ecb02c5b1d05439a6a5e19d99abfbbf5849 f4acd782c64cb1a6f914eb335060c4
Be part of the change, Michael.
Thank you,
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)

message.subject: You accomplished this, Michael
message.text:

Justin Trudeau recorded a video sharing his top volunteering tips!

message.subject: A message for you from the President
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?j=feef1c7676630c&m=fe95137275640d7971&ls=fe60107675670 c757516&l=ff5d177872&s=fe5516777c6402747111&jb=ff5c177972&ju=
Simple Liberal Email Template
http://pages.action.liberal.ca/page.aspx?QS=38dfbe491fab00ea6733665cfdb1d2f96217d2fde 8f6f2a037ead9174f798b4d Version française
https://action.liberal.ca/fr/profile/update/?vp=103536128&ep=liberal@mikesmit.com Préférences linguistiques
Later today, the Conservatives will release their budget featuring a $2-billion tax break for the rich.
That's not fair, and won’t help middle class Canadians.
Which is why we want to remind you we’re working hard to get election ready.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ca3b9d3a771a2d4de59a1683374e993dcbcb97fd94304bc8c4 52e649e4e10156fda7686758239009
But don’t take it from me, take it from the President.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ca3b9d3a771a2d4de59a1683374e993dcbcb97fd94304bc8c4 52e649e4e10156fda7686758239009 Watch Anna Gainey's message now →
(and then tell us you're in!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ca3b9d3a771a2d4dee70b7ef08fd6dd193d6d793433d1afd71 4a8d9acb63f684f0dd158a74600650 Donate Now ⇒

Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ca3b9d3a771a2d4d50202045ccce625712077fde470895d6da feb7c218a3ea02b268fad93dabcbdc here to view our policy.

message.subject: Here's a better plan →
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f4b91b678c67dca4c7242c462c88a5348a69227a89ef59712d da715c41e665fc52893bdc70fbe462
Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f4b91b678c67dca49b9b49828bde9e6fa34d7a4680925b37d5 77305aedabe6130e7db07897947fb5 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f4b91b678c67dca4f0cbdd868a0eb3479d3775b7913daef95b 38363a6c9a89d625de1b603ae5d657 Préférences linguistiques
Two days ago Stephen Harper delivered his 10th budget – and it gives the most to Canadians who need it the least.
After 10 years in power, it is clear that the Conservatives have no real plan for jobs and growth for the middle class. Amongst stagnant incomes and 7 years of deficits, Stephen Harper's priority continues to be a $2 billion tax break for the rich.
Michael, it's time for a better plan.
When the middle class is strong and spending money the economy grows, and all Canadians benefit.
A Liberal government is committed to investing in jobs and growth for the middle class. We will make investments that will produce real growth, particularly through infrastructure, trade, post-secondary education, and skills and innovation.
To accomplish this we will cancel Stephen Harper's $2 billion tax break for those who need it least.
We will reverse the Conservative's decision to double the limit on tax-free saving accounts at the expense of tens of thousands of dollars in Old Age Security for seniors. The increased limit does nothing for the middle class, and only helps the rich.
Does this sound like the plan for you, Michael? It won’t happen on its own, we need you to pitch in.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f4b91b678c67dca4ac9ca0f92d2de251ca33fb3a10e5223c3e 9cc465fd3426e7fb99a8462ac8febc Donate $3 today to help make our plan a reality →
It’s going to take a lot of hard work Michael, but I'm excited to announce that we will be sharing more of our economic plan with you soon. Together we can we can deliver the government Canadians deserve.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f4b91b678c67dca474477da8b212997ec7180f031e233d66f6 c6c8f0b9632218b3de6ea6f94fd58a Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Did you see this last night?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fee84bae690951efd6859b37e979788b513c 4e85e3fbd38c57ed78c0f8e64d0a70
Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fe5c2670c047585f84b796eb6b6be2c3e189 5b6f098da5e0a184e97e4976979272 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fea611909d91889a3503f0ee823c311c9039 f07e4072c7bc223c09e5507f512d85 Préférences linguistiques
Do you know how much you’ve paid for Conservative ads, Michael? $750 million over the last 9 years.
That’s three quarters of a billion of your hard earned tax dollars footing the bill. Which is why last night we fought back with our own ad -- a message that tells you what you have a right to know.
Everyone is talking about it this morning -- but if you missed it, you can watch it here.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fedb130da45dcf3bdea0a5dbea5c9ceb61ba 9734f4aec39872cf5503e91df622b1
(Hockey Fans out West – watch for the ad tonight!)
Rest assured that a Liberal government will shut down Stephen Harper’s taxpayer- funded partisan ad machine.
Between high-priced ads and a budget centred around a $2-billion tax break for the rich, it is clear where this government’s priority lies -- and it is not middle class Canadians.
We’re getting ready to share more details of our plan focused on helping the middle class through investments in infrastructure, trade, post-secondary education, and skills and innovation.
But Michael, we need your support to fight back against the Conservatives and their wasteful spending, and get our message out from coast to coast to coast.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fedb130da45dcf3bdea0a5dbea5c9ceb61ba 9734f4aec39872cf5503e91df622b1 Donate and fight back →
Thank you,
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7766f2a1d351b1fe93821600d71f3f5007fca6337ad2226045 8f0d042e52180f4f895659e5415a84 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: Trending at LPC: April 2015
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f8277576520678cd26bf8af9927040dda4816 0ddf6753b2a792ff517c93916de13f >From the Leader's Desk
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f821bdbeda31ea98bf96ccea051b3b5dad7d9 8f9b40896c269e6a79c4df4b6d310f On April 21, Stephen Harper delivered his 10th budget. It came as no surprise to the Liberal Caucus that this budget gives the most to those who need it least, and has no plan for economic growth.
A Liberal government will create jobs and growth for the middle class, and those working hard to join it. We will cancel Stephen Harper's unfair $2 billion tax break for the rich, of which 85 percent of Canadians will never see a dime.
Liberals have a better plan – one that will make investments that produce real growth, particularly through infrastructure, trade, post-secondary education, and skills and innovation.
We are focused on strengthening the heart of our economy, the middle class.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f821bdbeda31ea98bf96ccea051b3b5dad7d9 8f9b40896c269e6a79c4df4b6d310f If this is the plan for you add your name to mine →
Together we can build the better government that Canadians deserve.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82771e6c0283e210d45b21d7c0a53bf7623b e0b15fcb684315163baff817fe62c6

National Volunteer Week 2015 We ♥ our volunteers
The Liberal Party of Canada is powered by our volunteers.Their stories are inspiring and we wanted to share them.
Our hardworking volunteers show us that a better way forward is possible.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82e91eefccf9e18d922fc35faa6298254810 fbb0472e7a0a643e6692333f0c8ee8 Read Stories →Road to Victory in 2015 http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f822f29a1f56614948da9d036a3063c3fade9 02be5dec9e5904876d4a0851f22549 175 days to the fixed election date http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f822f29a1f56614948da9d036a3063c3fade9 02be5dec9e5904876d4a0851f22549 A message from the President We want to remind you we’re working hard to get election ready.
Watch this message from Anna Gainey, President of the Liberal Party of Canada.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f822f29a1f56614948da9d036a3063c3fade9 02be5dec9e5904876d4a0851f22549 Watch Now → In Case You Missed ItRecent items from the Liberal blog to view and share
NEW TV AD
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82371aa9ede84877d1782b6b9b6b6dc44b52 13c6d435997437ca868e7c58767bee Call on the government to stop the wasteful, partisan ads Mr. Harper is wasting your money on partisan ads during the hockey playoffs. Watch our ad, then sign the petition if you’ve had enough.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82371aa9ede84877d1782b6b9b6b6dc44b52 13c6d435997437ca868e7c58767bee

NEW POLL
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82bfc33513ee4b85b1fd8ccc31a469f26422 a3bd432551a5aa4cb570a77265f76b Respond to Budget 2015
Stephen Harper’s 10th budget has no plan for economic growth. We’ve heard from the experts, we’ve heard from the Conservatives, and now we want to hear from you. Take our budget 2015 poll.
PETITION
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f826e0f9bc87d9bc1ccd180f62f82c6eb5696 4d68978b0aa427a5c3e4b06816dcf2 Liberals stand up for transgender rights Gender equality must be recognized as a basic human right. Call on the Conservatives in the Senate to immediately end the discrimination against transgender Canadians.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f826e0f9bc87d9bc1ccd180f62f82c6eb5696 4d68978b0aa427a5c3e4b06816dcf2

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f82938b10d8aeb954b09fe06149880dd1577a efe3532d323739e0c016d31938d3bc A better plan for Canada’s Economy
After nearly 10 years in power the Harper government has failed to achieve meaningful economic growth. Conservative economic leadership is a myth. See it debunked.
PICTURES
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3a515c6d2b897f8268444492a16f79752236c75b8716aeacb8 4af1ab90acbc03004d569e2755ea23 Justin Trudeau meets with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi Check out these wonderful pictures from the meeting between Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Liberal Leader Justin Trudeau. Happily, his daughter Ella-Grace was also able to be there.

Effective January 1, 2015, you can donate up to $1,500 per year nationally and an additional $1,500 per year at the riding level. The maximum possible tax credit remains $650.00.

message.subject: Grateful
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bb86b0120383d9a3c551237096cc83d913aae7c630379f6c68 859b9dc7f4606acd025a8e14ac82ad
Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bb86b0120383d9a30fe88ecc2ef2c6dfd44fa9ce2493feccc3 bb663c269e9181e834c42d1055f954 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bb86b0120383d9a34aa9f1a08a5b7b7dd57543fd3640c07d67 61062adf25a272fba5cf89f03a7b82 Préférences linguistiques
I am so very grateful, Michael.
Thanks to the generosity of our donors – Canadians just like you – helped start this election year off strong, raising $3,872,929from 34,508 donors in Q1-- our best Q1 ever!
It might come down to the wire (and keep me up all night) but I always know Canadians like you Michael will come through in the end.
In order to keep fighting for the middle class and those working hard to join it, we need to gain more ground on the Conservatives -- starting right now -- before they make their results public, tomorrow.
Michael, the books close on April tomorrow at midnight.Can we count on you to help...
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2b499d643dcdcf43bae58baadaaa58c6a2bbe93bfb26ce7923 7e29c9534ecd27f81c105b0dae8faa Close that gap by $3? →
In less than six months you and I will be heading to the polls to elect our next government. While Stephen Harper is focused on giving a $2-billion tax break to the rich, Justin Trudeau is working hard for middle class and those seeking to join it. It’s up to us Michael, to give Canadians a new leader, and better government – one that we can all be proud of.
Thank you,
Christina Topp Senior Director of Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
| April 29 - May 1, 9 AM - 5 PM ET |
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2b499d643dcdcf438db1ec4edc02f5ebc916586af748b14b88 81b4006cd767fbcfa4c860eeb221b5 Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2b499d643dcdcf43c785ebfcc1f03abf49313cec6fe1f6fb40 1c90c4a37fc51392c64039d79a911b Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2b499d643dcdcf43446a0ade31accfaba6a4e66df6956730c7 04e3815ffdb00fdd3e4de49555b650 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2b499d643dcdcf435329293875b56160034dad468b0a483b81 59ed976411cfe17354051e3bd4726c here to view our policy.

message.subject: POLICY DETAILS: Our plan for fairness
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd567d5fb3214ed210f15012cd5341b86a1e ff4a133d41337d13fde71ded76da9c
Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29ddc81295d462af258a5d96632f0127ae2efc a4ae69dd4f1fee9bd33b9e47f3804c Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29ddbbefa21efcc612b9632e8a00c33222fc19 1dd9abcd9c116a426aeb6af0dc6ec3 Préférences linguistiques
I want to share the details of my new plan for fairness with you, Michael.
That plan, announced just a few hours ago, is an important part of the 2015 Liberal election platform, and will:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd65d64cf4c555dce5ccb4eb1a40efce6442 d83d7ea22218bf23482f5c9591337c
Give middle class families more money to help with the high costs of raising their kids.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd65d64cf4c555dce5ccb4eb1a40efce6442 d83d7ea22218bf23482f5c9591337c
Give middle class Canadians a tax break, by making our taxes fairer.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd65d64cf4c555dce5ccb4eb1a40efce6442 d83d7ea22218bf23482f5c9591337c
Cancel income splitting and other tax breaks for the wealthy.
Canada's middle class, and those working hard to join it, are at the heart of the Canadian economy. Our economy can only grow when the heart is strong.
That is why my plan for fairness is such an important part of the Liberal platform. Middle class Canadians are working hard to provide for their children, but Mr. Harper is not providing the help that they need. Instead, he gives a $2 billion tax break that favours the wealthy. That's just not fair, Michael. And it doesn’t have to be that way.
Every Canadian deserves a real and fair chance at success. But with our current taxes, that just isn't happening right now. I want to make our system more fair.
And while Stephen Harper offers tax breaks for the wealthy, we’re going to give a tax break to middle class Canadians while asking the wealthiest Canadians to give a little more.
This is my plan. Want to learn how it works?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd422f1c476df8ad6f896c4c48590541b88b 165a84c4ace791301e2523a932dbca Learn about the plan →
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd39573653afbbc5f58315dc1efd559860e2 8aee1d3a104fac017927e06b96e429 Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd7430d1d8ffd7273d4c00cd9ffe61bef3bc adcad50749388c0ad6ded811b25f1d Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd2e8bf3ed6bb8e659d70c73580f4082671a d37d790f415eb8559214c6f692baaf Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e33c7399cd5d29dd0128d454822f41021df07c6cca8e35b620 0569ccb7b1be20d62cfd1207ef35af here to view our policy.

message.subject: Want to learn how our new policy works?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a98a8a7dc4497a293420d4745b3f057e0b8dadc1e3d019b035 c142782c5458c4eed5ebca80252bf8

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=a98a8a7dc4497a291668b3f30aa10f1d96b359da9fc1ee3d0b 170bdb482ab3d5bcd367bf2364c793 Préférences linguistiques
Michael
Yesterday we announced our plan for #fairness for the middle class, and those working hard to join it.

message.subject: Ask Justin Trudeau
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dcefff0cb74aeec09dddcbbec39ec97d67a8d 37f79732ae779abe6a0314891b9ad6
Simple Liberal Email Template

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce562249c13e6ad6c8e7232e712b9b209e5d fdf2090e15ab5c99c5a03431e6fca5 Préférences linguistiques
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce2534c1371b6a71853889bc347db80fd819 22008236fbb4e8396628605a233704

Is this the best number to reach you, Michael?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce2534c1371b6a71853889bc347db80fd819 22008236fbb4e8396628605a233704 (902) 292-2285
(If not, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce2534c1371b6a71853889bc347db80fd819 22008236fbb4e8396628605a233704 click here to update it so you don’t miss out!)
If you prefer not to participate in this town hall, please click http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce2534c1371b6a71853889bc347db80fd819 22008236fbb4e8396628605a233704 here.
Thank you very much for your generous support, Michael.
This is your chance to ask Justin Trudeau about our new plan for Fairness for the middle class -- LIVE!
With the announcement of our #fairness plan for the middle class, we want give as many Canadians a chance to participate in the town hall as possible. Please forward this email to a friend and ask them to donate using this link,and they’ll be invited to join the Town Hall Meeting too!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=629b372b907b6dce0b691b284bf8d8c57ac1b754e39d04f554 5ffe8f3a4551fa1f2b84469eba7953 www.lpc.ca/donate ⇒

message.subject: 🕖 TICK TOCK: Don't miss out!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eff01be56b1914a81717bd7eb70ad35fe8d9382767beb30c 31eb3068b0136c71ffedc99c662461Simple Liberal Email Template

Hey Michael – you need to act now!
What are you up to this weekend?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eff01be56b1914020e709a72c00e43076aab638ddbb1f584 34ed0a0b46d1bb410b9c2e99b88ab0
Got some free time on Saturday or Sunday?
Your team in South Shore--St. Margarets is looking for your help.
This is your last chance to sign up for the May Weekend of Action!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eff01be56b1914020e709a72c00e43076aab638ddbb1f584 34ed0a0b46d1bb410b9c2e99b88ab0
(And we'll get in touch to give you the details!)
Thanks,
Richard Maksymetz Senior Director, LPC Campaign Mobilization

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eff01be56b191456c4148afd625166e022d4059c8b2885b8 f21bb969332bc4c3e0a5b82305bdf2 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e7eff01be56b1914807fe9af861a5499728d31111e1beafcf8 4fbd2442282c74284d6c698e028ba4 Unsubscribe

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=828fd1d8250a3cc17322be73ae389bf0f65c3096d4f8dcf734 c13d501da3763bdc28354b2ac722b5 Préférences linguistiques
URGENT – WE NEED YOUR HELP TO FIGHT BACK
Michael – this is what I woke up to at 6:30 am. Not a government plan to help the hardest working Canadians but yet another Conservative TV attack ad blitz against Justin Trudeau. And we know more like these are coming from the Conservatives – lots more.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=828fd1d8250a3cc1dcf4b385089f1576497cdb968e84a90be2 b921b246d97b09b02d17355ecf369d
Michael, the Conservatives are focused on Justin Trudeau while Justin Trudeau is focused on Canadians – and he has a real plan for fairness to help those who need it the most.
That’s why I’m calling on you to chip in right now -- fight back against these attack ads and help get Justin Trudeau’s plan for #fairness for the middle class out to as many Canadians as we possibly can.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=828fd1d8250a3cc1bcc860fc1ddcb1156b6e8b50cc8824da71 a59e709725bddcf96d635b3bff4f3b Donate $3 and Fight Back →
You could change the lives of millions and millions of Canadians – those who need the most help – for the better, Michael.
But we have to right act now – are you with us?
Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=828fd1d8250a3cc1c9016336b0934f4b850144bf01cf0d7996 a8471da38fe911eeb65107912a38e6 Donate Now ⇒

message.subject: 📺 True Story
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6d2ce5c7a9cd00be1cd34459f781a638200e142550e73af438 eb797901523f1d091afa4276cd5214 Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6d2ce5c7a9cd00be01f8594907db2a0dfb336c00cae20a9c75 ab8f9dce7d1006fda25b0a6c01e19c Version française
