Michael, meet the Rose family.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6d2ce5c7a9cd00bef7156f849b673233ed7a18e8a796333344 597d7ceb62125443335a9bbe7fa810
Like middle class families across the country, they’ve had to make some tough choices in the last 10 years, under Stephen Harper.
Saving enough to retire, paying off personal debt, and putting aside money for their children’s education, has become harder than ever.
But it just doesn’t have to be this way. Our new ad presents a real plan for fairness.
And you can help Justin Trudeau change things for millions and millions of Canadians.
Watch this sneak preview -- and then share the ad -- help take the #fairness ad campaign to Canadians from coast to coast to coast.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6d2ce5c7a9cd00bef7156f849b673233ed7a18e8a796333344 597d7ceb62125443335a9bbe7fa810 Watch& Share →
Canada was built on fairness and it’s been missing in the last 10 years under Stephen Harper.
Help restore it and make our country stronger.

message.subject: A Canadian story:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c48de9745dddd7f72eb95aeceb3db8cefe99d da910e6b5485c7af6b6782192f8778Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c481ee1bbc759985dd223b9d4651fbf369365 06b5a1970eef5617fff8e597014d0f Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c48e0965685491aab932a607fb350c5f8ded5 f4eb130603214748fbca41b3604e25 Préférences linguistiques
Michael, I want to share a story with you.
It’s about the Rose family -- a family of five, bubbling with the energy and optimism that comes with having young kids. I had the great pleasure of meeting them last year and they are featured in our new ad.
While Richard and Maria are working harder than ever to make a good life for their children, like families across our country, they are also worried that it just isn’t enough.
I hearso many stories like theirs, and I want to tell you, life shouldn’t be have to be about daily tough decisions and sacrifices, just to make ends meet.
With my plan for fairness, Canadians who have been cast to the sidelines by the Conservative government for over 10 years will receive real help to make life work.
Which is why I want your help now more than ever. Together, we need to make sure every single Canadian knows about our plan for fairness. And in order to do that we have a strategy to get our #fairness ad broadcast in as many communities across the country as possible.
Michael, can I count on you to chip in and help raise $250,000 by midnight May 31 so that millions morepeople will see our ad, bringing us closer than ever to making #fairness a reality?
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c4887e9fcb22672dce815daf719830769a781 bd1f4101cc594d5d11fd641386bfa1 Donate $10 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c48b6cdd1c3d1d9028cec88ce8d77ba77ccd6 ffcb36939683bc6eba2b86930ea90f Donate $200 →
(When you do you’ll be placed on the official record of 2015 donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian history!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7b27820cf0210c482ef418887622751ecc31f126281a863ad2 ce5acf2e2b860995d71aa5c93c5d81 Donate what you can →
After you give, please share your story with me. You could be featured on liberal.ca and I’ll personally call three families to talk about their story.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?

message.subject: Baseless
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604fabc649ccf2ccc54d4589a3b06fc89d4629 a47d6034d171f42500a41702934573Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604fd3521cfef1a126cf03037bda0d8a8c62fc 987c28ff22d349a7cc8c5bb7e3dba6 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604f5737301206e36a9efa11f36a632db50f2c 05d25aed5463e58f5923bbcc5e483f Préférences linguistiques
Michael, the attacks just keep coming.
Earlier this week "Working Canadians" --a Conservative-aligned, anti-union group that supports Conservative union-busting legislation and seeks to weaken Canada’s labour movement -- released two radio ads attacking Justin Trudeau.
One of their ads even claims that “You and I give to charities,” but “Justin Trudeau takes from them.”
I don’t have to tell you how absurd and baseless that statement is.
But this is what we're up against. Not just the Conservative party and their attack- ad machine but also Conservative-aligned special interest groups willing to say anything to tear down Justin Trudeau, our plan for fairness, and the movement you’re building.
Michael, we need you to pitch in and help us fight back with more TV ads. Our plan will restore fairness for the middle class, and those working hard to join it.
- We will cut the middle class tax rate by seven percent. - We'll also give more to help parents with the cost of raising their kids. - We can afford to do more for the people who need it, by doing less for the people who don’t. After nearly a decade in power, Stephen Harper and the Conservatives are willing to tear Canadians apart with attack ads spreading fear, division, and mistrust. They’re willing to do anything to keep power.
But that’s not going to stop us -- because we’ve got you.
Your donation today will help our Fairness TV ad campaign reach as many Canadians as possible, and drown out these negative, baseless, and misleading attacks.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604fd1929f7bb220bfc4998b6ea3bdc78a275d e2b111a46c2b6b6ce202ace6e48837 Donate $10 →

(When you do you’ll get on the official 2015 record of Justin Trudeau donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian History!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604fccf804b5e5a2300225f806c0c0909818bd c2b7d7def730a76efdabf361e567b8 Donate what you can →
After you give, please share your story with us. When you do you’ll be featured on liberal.ca and Justin Trudeau will personally call three lucky families to talk about their story.
Thank you,
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f41e091abbd604fba8e8f5d574b84e921ec9298f35e60edfe 198e87b8c8e481f05725ad2bb0eeb6

message.subject: 📊 You see this?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=49d7cf58db4a565490ee545c85994ba62ecd557a7ab3d2d1bb 3ebb6705835c6f3b643a60e71523caSimple Liberal Email Template

See this gap, Michael?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=49d7cf58db4a56540e109d534c1c7dbb5b95347a87a4abcf34 c9639fdbae1901eb4af05d729c1057
What’s more the Conservatives are spending hundreds of thousands of your tax dollars* on partisan ads – with yet another attack ad blitz on Justin Trudeau this week.
Justin Trudeau is focused on Canadians and has a real plan for fairness to help those who need it the most -- Canada’s middle class and those working hard to join it.
Michael, it’s time to make sure every Canadian knows about it.
I want to see you join the 1,062 Canadians who have chipped in $77,189 to get our new #fairness ad broadcasted far and wide across the country.
Chip in and help raise $250,000 by midnight May 31 so that millions more people will see our ad, bringing us be closer than ever to making #fairness a reality.
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: September 20, 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=49d7cf58db4a5654109638472de0ff79bd69e125fe95eb435b ca2c391bf3e54a8353049d0bf91b8f Donate $10 →

(When you do you’ll get on the official 2015 record of Justin Trudeau donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian History!)

After you give, please share your story with us. When you do you’ll be featured on liberal.ca and You could even receive a phone call from Justin Trudeau to talk about their story.
Thank You,
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
PS: A Liberal government would put an end to tax-payer funded partisan ads and implement rules to govern political advertising!

message.subject: URGENT: Something is missing!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab3774dd2c0f5dbd92fd6b2aceee5703bb1b3cdccffb251171 78299323d35de0067b2fe477357ef9Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab3774dd2c0f5dbd4c1e4d89961ac389e00b29463d5c19568f 2e3b5a2e116a797305fd6c7b529615 Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab3774dd2c0f5dbdfa32a671ea7d98876d99a3e1ecc3a8d423 94a0a3504314246730aafc050014e9 Préférences linguistiques
48 Hours left to help fight the latest attack ad!
The more Canadians we reach with our plan for fairness and our #fairness ad campaign the closer we get to helping Canada’s middle class and those working hard to join it.
Yet at the end of a decade of power, the Conservatives are pushing harder than ever – and they launched not one but two attacks on Justin Trudeau this week. That’s why I need you to step up and fight for the millions of Canadians who need the most help.
But our latest donor list is missing one thing.
Your name, Michael.
1,282 Canadians have chipped in $97,260 in our fundraising drive to get our #fairness message out to Canadians from coast to coast to coast. But we won’t hit our goal of $250,000 by midnight tomorrow without you!
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: September 20, 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab3774dd2c0f5dbd41a7feb9dccd029ed391b428804a390137 aa9c8122a8f23cb6014eed6a70b0f3 Donate $10 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e98c51f0439f9be3155c3bda67d5025292109920aab8b52add 88027ddb00c742a05085711dd696b2 Donate $200 →
(When you do you’ll get on the official 2015 record of Justin Trudeau donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian History!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e98c51f0439f9be351cf7cca0875443f52edf1fc22a4b3a1eb 414d6d45148807940f3f55dbe26173 Donate what you can →
After you give, please share your story with us. When you do you’ll be featured on liberal.ca and Justin Trudeau will personally call three lucky families to talk about their story.
Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e98c51f0439f9be3e678a8c757f8137eba4b46cc1f67f6025c 633e8870c13e6400a02bcfcef40ca3
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
May 26 - 28, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | May 29 - 31, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e98c51f0439f9be3d276847253695810602e63fcc5c62bd730 e1bba4691355bc7d4f088636af8da9 Donate Now ⇒

We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e98c51f0439f9be392a3bc6611d33c272b4ac90f1886241bfa 9f26cf3169b53b4071e7f9b746761b here to view our policy.

message.subject: Are you with me, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf84293492ebae31d0e670c8b0f5dc53ec26c13a4d8 da5a1321180f6f448de49941c72d0eSimple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf8429349a76555cda4dee17af1fd9c103cb9883fea b8d22d69c4d78100998d1445b59aab Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf8429349c0e8f21c163e4f27e6b33ba785c9d5db46 9d113053fd19549062358fb711780d Préférences linguistiques
Michael,can I count on youto chip in and help raise $250,000 by midnight tonight so that millions more people will see our new #fairness ad, bringing us closer than ever to making our plan for fairness a reality?
The Conservatives’ negative ads are focused on me, while I remain focused on Canadians -- and I have real plan for fairness to help those who need it the most.
With our midnight deadline fast approaching, I’m calling on you to help take our plan for fairness to communities across Canada.
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf8429349219394c622ef40ae0318749d947cfbba6e f8d2eb6876b2e99d6de0bfdf3c94d8 Donate $10 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf842934916948d61c6495833c851306a83bc313bcc 22953d3278d76cc1eae5ca343a5774 Donate $200 →
(When you do you’ll get on the official 2015 record of Justin Trudeau donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian History!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf8429349eff650bfa5b0b8281c3b20756b59b6c3ea 84e97a0bc59892ff0fe369083d18b1 Donate what you can →
I’m so grateful 1,716 Canadians have already donated $139,702 in response to emails like this one. Michael, I hope you’ll join them.
And after you give, please share your story with me. You could be be featured on liberal.ca and I will personally call three people to talk with me about their story.
Thank You.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf8429349e25ae72e512f22474cfc4cfa3df914f3c2 255ec18b4c2c71090588b3b2abad31
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
May 26 - 28, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | May 29 - 31, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=79cc5b9bf84293495ab15222cfc516152e3c39cead6e3a3870 f2fd15503b3d1548664c0313a2cf26 Donate Now ⇒

But we're waiting on you, Michael
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: September 20, 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.

message.subject: Just noticed something
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9a4e88cb49e087ef63e0603f791685dc211 5f5472b3bd6f66998b70eec2bed067Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9d1f558fc617ccdb923fe513087cfa683fd 754ebf71c04ba7b39eeea8b755660d Version française
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d93e9bcc2112718f426ae86ff495a4a10da1 9e744de39945f5aacafa686dac2cb1 Préférences linguistiques
It’s deadline night!
And in these final hours I love looking through the names of our donors as Canadians rally to help us reach our fundraising goals before the big deadline.
But I can't help notice there seems to be one name missing:
Michael Smit
2,411 Canadians are in to help take Justin Trudeau's plan for fairness and our new #fairness ad from coast to coast to coast -- and this is your LAST CHANCE to join them.
Set our records straight before midnight Michael!
Please review your recent contribution history for the 2015 election year:
Donor name:Michael Your election year donor status: PENDING Your most recent one time donation: September 20, 2014 Total donated nationally in 2015: $0
In 2014 you donated $10 -- thank you very much. But the Conservative fundraising machine is working non-stop and we just can’t let up. Not now. In fact we need you more than ever -- match that donation now to help take our plan for #fairness to Canadians everywhere, Michael.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9165c90ed7b4ed5f30b597ca066188c2883 0cf42039a622ef5f94c7133a3a1cb4 Donate $10 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9c3c7cd165b8f8e555d1af9b531855f20b4 b28c88255105983ddf9f6c82276b21 Donate $200 →
(When you do you’ll get on the official 2015 record of Justin Trudeau donors in this momentous election year -- be a part of Canadian History!)
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9be4e26a9fde6c6ccaf418f6fd5be67acd8 6d0532d956227cf117c80d5c6379c1 Donate what you can →
After you give, please share your story with us. You could be be featured on liberal.ca and Justin Trudeau will personally call three people to talk about their story.
Thank You.
Jeremy Broadhurst National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d9d3e6b984df8b7b184f1a8602643016217e e90a49b993cc0c96ac33ad7c730832
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
May 26 - 28, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | May 29 - 31, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d92bfb58ad872d96eff25c18b579f042d306 6515e3e02886f9db5a7660481bbbb5 Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 81 Metcalfe St. Suite - 600 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d0d2726a5b4156d91be12ef26c9ddc8027c78b5412fefc8b4f cc2437c5f0f2b52b7713b0d2453776 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Trending at LPC: May 2015
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=71b1061e100871869c7171756b780af54adfe8b73c9f0ea0ba 5ff66a5f23cbcd8ebbcd32cb56d03d >From the Leader's Desk
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=71b1061e100871867444a118c79793ea0a62ab6e785c0c2f5f 2f2d56c8b19e842287605e29d9e481 This has been an exciting month, Michael.
On May 4th we shared two big parts of our plan to stand up for middle class Canadians and those working hard to join them. I announced a key part of our platform – a plan to bring back fairness and to strengthen the heart of the Canadian economy.
First, we’ll cut the middle class tax rate by seven percent. That's a $3 billion tax cut for the people who need it most.
Second, we'll give more to help parents with the cost of raising their kids. We’ll create a new Canada Child Benefit – one that’s bigger, fair, monthly, and tax-free.
We can afford to do more for the people who need it, by doing less for the people who don’t.
Every Canadian deserves a real and fair chance at success. I invite you to learn more how our plan for fairness works, and how it can benefit your family:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=71b1061e100871867444a118c79793ea0a62ab6e785c0c2f5f 2f2d56c8b19e842287605e29d9e481 Find out more →

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=065d508e2e20c8f857e5571c064d923db6aa9128bd70d02b85 f59bb43889220d0ba37fe0b9d0a6d8 Simple Liberal Email Template
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=065d508e2e20c8f8ffb71456e58416da37052842f0af3089b5 1f9e47885b9c9dc3f24ebc587ace07 Version francaise
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=065d508e2e20c8f86b6a2538c8167190c7a6c433be63847809 ebc3531d35a6224b3abea37a973abf Preferences linguistiques
Jean-Claude is a father of 3 children and is getting ready for his retirement. But he is worried that under the Harper government, the Canadian values he grew up with have been eroded - he no longer sees a country he wants to leave to his children. Ginette and her husband help their son and daughter-in-law save money by providing lunch to their grandchildren on school days.
Carol is working hard to support her daughter who is struggling to find work after her small business closed.
These are just some of the stories that hundreds of Canadians shared with me over the past week. Families like these deserve a plan for fairness that helps them succeed and build a positive future for their children and grandchildren. Their stories are echoed by so many more families across the country.
I thank them for sharing this small piece of their lives with me, and I look forward to speaking with them soon.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=065d508e2e20c8f80d7c6cd6167444f7213067082275aeb88e b9bc862383b1b2e9e45eabd0593075 You can read their stories and more here →
Michael, I would also like to thank the 3,034 Canadians who contributed $266,141 to our May fundraising campaign, helping spread our message of fairness across the country.
Your continued support is so important - especially with just a few short months before the election. Together, we can restore hope and fairness to Canada.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=065d508e2e20c8f89a85389e3ff0763c0cc5e80a2447ee81d2 b728bf1ec1553646530e4a294bb8ca Donate Now ⇒
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: New policy: Real Change
message.text:
Michael -- Busy day. Just back from the kids’ end of year school show, and found some more time to write.
It’s striking. Everywhere I go, Canadians like you tell me they want to see change. Real, meaningful, authentic change that starts with our government, and the people who represent you.
To me, that means doing different things, AND doing things differently. I’m so very proud of our Party for doing exactly that.
Earlier today, I announced the next set of our Liberal commitments, a comprehensive plan to restore democracy in our country, and faith in government for all Canadians.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b0f15dc36b62e8d11fee4d3b19612241ba1dece194cd4313e f52e3697eae143b54244e49c2f2908 REAL CHANGE: A TRANSPARENT, OPEN GOVERNMENT FOR CANADA is a sweeping agenda for change. Real Change.
It was inspired by Canadians like you, it includes you and I invite you to http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b0f15dc36b62e8d11fee4d3b19612241ba1dece194cd4313e f52e3697eae143b54244e49c2f2908 learn more about it now . And in the spirit of openness, I hope you will also tell me what you think.
At its heart, Real Change is a very simple idea -- that transparent government is good government. It’s more effective, it’s more reflective of today’s Canada and above all it's more representative of Canadians, their communities, their families and their lives.
>From more open, citizen-centered government to evidence-and science-based decision making, to fairer elections and giving your community its voice back in Ottawa, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b0f15dc36b62e8d11fee4d3b19612241ba1dece194cd4313e f52e3697eae143b54244e49c2f2908 REAL CHANGE is a roadmap to counter a decade of Conservative secrecy, unprecedented concentration of power and negative political tactics. We’ve done this by putting Canadians right where they should be -- at the very centre of our democracy and the centre of our plan.
I’m incredibly optimistic, that by putting Canadians first, we will deliver real change for the entire country. Michael, will you help me make http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8b0f15dc36b62e8d11fee4d3b19612241ba1dece194cd4313e f52e3697eae143b54244e49c2f2908 Real Change even stronger by adding your voice, today?
Thank you,
J

Call for Applications:ï¿½Atlantic Field Team Fellowship Programï¿½
Are you ready to take on the challenge of being part of the next generation of community leaders?
The Liberal Party of Canada is looking for passionate Canadians to take part in the innovative Field Team Fellowship Program.ï¿½
This unique, one month intensive program is designed to train and develop individuals to become highly effective political organizers in their community.ï¿½ï¿½ ï¿½ Successful candidates for the LPC Field Team Fellowship program will take part in four webinar courses over a four week period, along with an evaluation following each course, and participate on at least four Team Trudeau volunteer actions on a local Liberal campaign team.ï¿½ï¿½ ï¿½ Along with being trained in the latest tactics and strategies for political organizing, all successful candidates who fulfil the requirements of the Field Team Fellowship program will receive an official certificate of completion.ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ ï¿½ Clickï¿½hereï¿½for more information and to submit your application online.ï¿½ ï¿½ Regards,
Atlantic Field Teamï¿½
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com Update profile | Unsubscribe ï¿½ Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch. To contact the Liberal Party of Canada (New Brunswick), please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 715, Brunswick Street, Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3B 1H8. Authorized by the Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
ï¿½
ï¿½ ï¿½ Appel de candidatures: Programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain de l'Atlantique
ï¿½tes-vous prï¿½ts ï¿½ faire partie de la prochaine gï¿½nï¿½ration de leaders?ï¿½
Le Parti Libï¿½ral du Canada est ï¿½ la recherche de Canadiens passionnï¿½s pour prendre part au programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain.ï¿½
Ce programme unique de quatre semaines est conï¿½u pour former et perfectionner les individus afin qu'ils deviennent organisateurs politiques efficaces dans leurs communautï¿½.
Les candidats choisis pour le programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain du PLC prendront part aux quatre sessions de formation en ligne sur une pï¿½riode de quatre semaines, en plus d'une ï¿½valuation aprï¿½s chaque cours et participeront ï¿½ au moins quatre ï¿½vï¿½nements bï¿½nï¿½voles d'une campagne libï¿½rale locale de l'ï¿½quipe Trudeau.ï¿½
En plus de recevoir une formation dans les tactiques et stratï¿½gies d'organisation politique les plus rï¿½centes, tous les candidats ayant rï¿½ussi le programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain obtiendront un certificat d'accomplissement officiel.ï¿½
Cliquezï¿½iciï¿½pour obtenir de plus amples renseignements et vous inscrire au programme.ï¿½
Au plaisir,
L'ï¿½quipe en terrain de l'Atlantique
ï¿½
Ce courriel a ï¿½tï¿½ envoyï¿½ ï¿½ :ï¿½liberal@mikesmit.com Mettre ï¿½ jour votre profileï¿½|ï¿½Dï¿½sinscription Des nouvelles transmises par courriel, comme celles-ci, sont pour nous le moyen le plus efficace de rester en contact. Pour communiquer avec le Parti libï¿½ral du Canada (Nouveau-Brunswick), veuillez rï¿½pondre ï¿½ ce courriel. Adresse postale :ï¿½715, rue Brunswick, Fredericton, Nouveau-Brunswick, E3B 1H8.ï¿½Autorisï¿½ par l'Agence libï¿½rale fï¿½dï¿½rale du Canada, agent enregistrï¿½ pour le Parti libï¿½ral du Canada.ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½

message.subject: Rappel - Appel de candidatures / Reminder - Call for Applications
message.text:
ï¿½English text below
Rappel : La date limite pour s'inscrire est le 10 juillet 2015. Appel de candidatures : Programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain deï¿½l'Atlantique
Le Parti Libï¿½ral du Canada est ï¿½ la recherche de Canadiens passionnï¿½s pour prendre part au programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain.ï¿½
Ce programme unique de quatre semaines est conï¿½u pour former et perfectionner les individus afin qu'ils deviennent organisateurs politiques efficaces dans leurs communautï¿½.
Les candidats choisis pour le programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain du PLC prendront part aux quatre sessions de formation en ligne sur une pï¿½riode de quatre semaines, en plus d'une ï¿½valuation aprï¿½s chaque cours et participeront ï¿½ au moins quatre ï¿½vï¿½nements bï¿½nï¿½voles d'une campagne libï¿½rale locale de l'ï¿½quipe Trudeau.ï¿½
En plus de recevoir une formation dans les tactiques et stratï¿½gies d'organisation politique les plus rï¿½centes, tous les candidats ayant rï¿½ussi le programme de stage pour l'ï¿½quipe en terrain obtiendront un certificat d'accomplissement officiel.ï¿½
Cliquezï¿½iciï¿½pour obtenir de plus amples renseignements et vous inscrire au programme.ï¿½
Au plaisir,
L'ï¿½quipe en terrain de l'Atlantique
Ce courriel a ï¿½tï¿½ envoyï¿½ ï¿½ :ï¿½liberal@mikesmit.com Mettre ï¿½ jour votre profileï¿½|ï¿½Dï¿½sinscription Des nouvelles transmises par courriel, comme celles-ci, sont pour nous le moyen le plus efficace de rester en contact. Pour communiquer avec le Parti libï¿½ral du Canada (Nouveau-Brunswick), veuillez rï¿½pondre ï¿½ ce courriel. Adresse postale :ï¿½715, rue Brunswick, Fredericton, Nouveau-Brunswick, E3B 1H8.ï¿½Autorisï¿½ par l'Agence libï¿½rale fï¿½dï¿½rale du Canada, agent enregistrï¿½ pour le Parti libï¿½ral du Canada.ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
ï¿½
ï¿½
Reminder:ï¿½Application Deadline is July 10, 2015.ï¿½ Callï¿½forï¿½Applications:ï¿½Atlantic Field Team Fellowship Programï¿½
Are you ready to take on the challenge of being part of the next generation of community leaders?
The Liberal Party of Canada is looking for passionate Canadians to take part in the innovative Field Team Fellowship Program.
This unique, one month intensive program is designed to train and develop individuals to become highly effective political organizers in their community. ï¿½
ï¿½
Successful candidates for the LPC Field Team Fellowship program will take part in four webinar courses over a four week period, along with an evaluation following each course, and participate on at least four Team Trudeau volunteer actions on a local Liberal campaign team. ï¿½
ï¿½
Along with being trained in the latest tactics and strategies for political organizing, all successful candidates who fulfil the requirements of the Field Team Fellowship program will receive an official certificate of completion. ï¿½ ï¿½
ï¿½
Clickï¿½hereï¿½for more information and to submit your application online.ï¿½
ï¿½
Regards,
Atlantic Field Teamï¿½
This email was sent to:ï¿½liberal@mikesmit.com Update profileï¿½|ï¿½Unsubscribe ï¿½ Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch. To contact the Liberal Party of Canada (New Brunswick), please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 715, Brunswick Street, Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3B 1H8. Authorized by the Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
ï¿½
ï¿½

message.subject: The reviews are in
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ec65ae788921d9de5dbb300a052ce3510fa5906c8fd0003622 c9e46b9711e444c70e91e7575f3aad
THE REVIEWS ARE IN:
MICHEL DAVID, LE DEVOIR:
"Mr. Trudeau truly dominated the debate."
(Translation, Radio-Canada, September 17, 2015)
ALAN FREEMAN, IPOLITICS.CA:
"Trudeau just proved he’s in this race for a reason… He was loud. He interrupted. He was repetitive and, at times, even out of breath. But in the end, Justin Trudeau was the most effective performer in last night’s leaders’ debate on the economy."
(ipolitics.ca, September 18, 2015)
CAMPBELL CLARK, GLOBE AND MAIL:
"Mr. Trudeau was on offence, a bundle of energy driving home the message: he pushed his way onto the camera with repeated underlining of his interventionist message about stimulus spending - even playing the negative aspect to drive it home."
(Globe and Mail, September 18, 2015)
ROBERT FIFE, CTV:
"[Trudeau] was the most combative, and the other leaders were simply not able to knock him off his game. I’d give a slight edge to Trudeau."
(CTV National News, September 17, 2015)
MICHAEL
The pundits have had their say.
NOW HAVE YOURS

message.subject: Michael, say yes
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0f73a105ac3904be15b30d718dc7bc9587c0 27c99bf3941433afa0388d36910290
Our momentum is building every single day.
But our work isn't done. Not even close.
With just critical weeks left, we need to know if we can count you among those Canadians who will vote for real change.
We’re asking 10,000 Canadians to answer this question -- by midnight Friday, October 9.
Will you stand with Justin Trudeau?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0f35415fb6cf257ba2580f80d54935ebe763 18370ba0c06f94017cafe84cbfdf87 Yes, I'm voting Liberal
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0f9c41171bf85caebf9466dc39390fab3001 3accbd7f4b44c7a7dff96faaba7013 I need to know more
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0ff4c4b386ca085e86bd8a852869835184f0 dc1009cdc1f75c1f9cc3f982b21f96 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0ff4c4b386ca085e86bd8a852869835184f0 dc1009cdc1f75c1f9cc3f982b21f96 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please reply to this email. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
The Liberal Party of Canada has chosen oneID to make it easier and more secure to donate. oneID is a digital identity provider that securely stores your information, makes it available when you choose, and oneID cannot see or access your information. You can use the information in your oneID to donate and to manage usernames and passwords across all your devices. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0f5ae1d9f91139121fadfab8580448cc40de cd91a8837b07b07e411c38ede3b0bf Go here to manage your information in oneID. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0f94e46c74ed451ce1ea9f3ec0fe00f6f731 429631d74e91fa3b927cd38d70efbc Go here to learn more about oneID and its security. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0fe2e590c21a072af60b640b4c74bfddecfb 3d40de12f00f99d6887d844060075b Go here to delete your oneID account.If you need more information about oneID, want to manage or delete your oneID account, please call 1-888-542-3725 for assistance.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5ac743ea0af49d0fad46c3c5f2bc07fb4795045ca76ffbb05d 764687ff155ffdc71ecd82e0756651 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Justin Trudeau wants this number
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8f151e2222374fc624a7952e241cf19902ef57b2be123d622b 43da317278cbd4ec0faa48556ab1c2
Hi Michael, this will be quick.
At midnight tonight, I need to send Justin Trudeau an important number. Exactly how many Canadians have said -- Yes, I am voting Liberal -- in the past 3 days.
19,158 Canadians have responded. Hundreds more every single minute. But in order for us to hit 25,000 responses by midnight -- we need your answer.
So how about you Michael?
Will you be voting Liberal?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c0394af542280a99ebf050caba3fd67b5d993eacd1519b358 429f1e14edb4f2736837ebe8181351 Yes, I'm voting Liberal
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4c0394af542280a92409189c4345b4ee74e225b04f1c7d7227 d11fcf88256d5521618ec7bbf99a6e I need to know more
Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Fight right to the end
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d004fa052c386a17500a7172ae6710ff906b8c5bb283450ed4 270d5016da4e8ca89f584fca81bae5
They have no other plan, Michael. Just two days to Election Day, and we expect the Conservatives to spend big on more negative ads. They’ll be everywhere – tv, radio, print, online. Their smear tactics are all they’ve got left and they’re throwing all their money into their attacks. Right as Canadians get ready to vote.
Our strategy – stand with Justin Trudeau and fight our hardest for the real change Canada needs – now.
Thousands of Canadians chipped into our last fundraising push to help get our positive message to millions more Canadians in these final days.
But I didn’t see your name on our election week donor list. Now’s the time to change that. Check your record, then chip in – any amount you can afford – to help us fight Harper right to the very end. And win this on October 19.
2015 ELECTION RECORD
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this election: $0
What you can do to drive RealCHANGE: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6ade2c8487926f89dfa19b3dce840e443b93854346909135d9 6588e955fa61475ff6148d715c6ba0 Make a donation now!
Just 2 days left.

Thank you,
Christina Topp Senior Director of Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Important voting question
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9ae87dad6597198f1a20a76f5e264b147f132e843c678595a1 2dc92f682206e15fb42a4ef813135c
I want the very next Yes to come from you, Michael. Millions have already voted in this important election.And Canadians from every corner of the country have said, Yes, I stand with Justin Trudeau. But you haven’t responded, yet.
Knowing you’ll vote for real change -- investment in jobs and growth for the middle class -- is how we win on Election Day -- and stop Harper for good.
Every vote matters, so please check your Real Change record. Then take a second to answer the most important question facing our country, right now.
Your RealCHANGERecord
Supporter: Michael
Your response: NO RESPONSE RECORDED -- 2 Days to Election Day!
How you can drive RealCHANGE: Answer this important question:
Will you be voting Liberal on Monday?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9ae87dad6597198f3be58f94823a0e05cb5cd15f8c58c7dd09 a28c0c869ee8de661027b9e5642d5d Yes, I'm voting Liberal
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9ae87dad6597198fb29fa5c01f152253eab06fb1a562ffec10 b5970b179e8218a84d18349819fe04 I need to know more
Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: You can make a difference
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0cba7780a13760d7b6bed7e1d1837b357b5af79a3d7a5d3e33 26177f4d461a95e51588d5db1a9669
Michael –
Stay focused and keep working hard. That's what we need to do to win this.
And if we do that tomorrow, we can deliver real change, and bring an end to the Harper Decade.
Want to be part of it? Here's what we need you to do:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0cba7780a13760d7a85bde55330a7743daf15440797c115759 4ef9f7a950195f6ccd80e53dd415f3
Watch this message from Justin Trudeau, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0cba7780a13760d7a85bde55330a7743daf15440797c115759 4ef9f7a950195f6ccd80e53dd415f3 and then sign up for a GOTV event in your community. Every hour you can give will make sure more Liberal votes make it into ballot boxes – and bring us that much closer to victory.
Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Thank you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74e9e09e49913a72ab072c2b2192fe9eb7cb505a2763349f9d 794391b18ce65699c5ef10a46fb542
Michael, Sophie and I have something we want to say to you: thank you.
Real change has come to Canada, and it's because of you.
Your knocks and calls. Your donations. Your support on social media. And most importantly, your votes.
>From every last candidate, to every last volunteer, donor and supporter, remember: I didn’t make history today. You did.
For three years, we had a very old-fashioned strategy. We met and talked with as many Canadians as we could. And we listened.
We beat fear with hope. We beat cynicism with hard work.
We beat negative, divisive politics with a positive vision that brings Canadians together.
Most of all, we defeated the idea that Canadians should be satisfied with less. That good enough is good enough, and that better just isn’t possible.
Well my friends. This is Canada. And in Canada... Better is always possible.
You built this platform. You built this movement. You told us what you need to be successful. You told us what kind of government you want, and we built the plan to make it happen.
Tomorrow, we start on our next challenge: achieving real change for the middle class. And Canadians are counting on us to deliver.
Thank you again for all your hope and hard work. We can't tell you how much we appreciate it.
Justin and Sophie

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74d5d8d904206c861c574948d0a710f5b45d340645abab23bc 319cf01664cfd22587950dc2b8b4ba
Michael, thank you for making our historic win possible.
This moment belongs to you. And to all the Canadians you fought for over the past three years.
With your hope and hard work, your optimism, and with your incredible generosity -- you grew our positive movement.And you did it day by day, one donation at a time.Your contributions helped get our message out to millions more Canadians. Allowed Justin Trudeau to visit more communities across our great country. Supported tens of thousands of hard-working volunteers across Canada. And enabled us to give it our all -- every day of this 78-day campaign.
By standing with Justin Trudeau and the Liberal Party of Canada every step of the way, you have brought real change to Canada.And with the support of Canadians like you, we will work even harder to achieve our goals to make a real and positive difference in the lives of millions of Canadians.
As our deep thanks for your commitment to our movement, I'd like to share this video of Prime Minister-designate Justin Trudeau's rally in Ottawa -- this afternoon. It was an incredibly moving moment, which would not have been possible without you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74d5d8d904206c86bb78f802ac70a48d84c2d6331e2384ea0f 1e3cccabd83b7d0651f3ee4a752d61
Thank you again for all your hope, hard work and support.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Simply incredible, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede3b0dd62650083530027b3f1392d6405a0c4 d3bac0f36d7bccb9be1610eb87a74b
Michael, we did it.
It was a long, hard fought campaign, but with a lot of hope and hard work, we elected a majority Liberal government, and Justin Trudeauas our prime minister!
And when it mattered most, 50,479 Canadians came together and raised $7,282,890 for our best fundraising quarter ever. Simply incredible. Thank you.
Even when the polls and pundits had us in third place, you stuck with us. Knowing that we had your strong, unwavering support helped us deliver our positive message and vision for Canada - and helped us counter the barrage of negative attacks coming from both the NDP and CPC.
But according to news reports both parties had millions more to attack us with, setting record-breaking fundraising quarters of their own.
This election was the longest and most expensive campaign we’ve ever run –over $40 million spent nationally alone. We did what we set out to do, but now we need your help to ensure we end the year without any long-term debt. That’s why we need you to help us finish October strong with a donation right now.
Remember, better is always possible - even in fundraising!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede3b722dd873b7389b7496287451e52455da3 0f4726a6cf65c38f995c8caf4598c2 Give $5 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede3cff80cfb2ce3e87328cb17a41b41c322f6 73bcd723122fed37e8ddcfe7521e20 Give $25 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede34603fe783cdac1d6432a2180ab90dd03d6 c2dd208dd268b9293c550b205f9cb4 Give $50 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede370f706dc50469c02853ead565a8b6f2299 db4111589748ad72169ea7fa3b7981 Give $100 →
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede37f02340acae278266050a10f100e39d596 70e8da825a686afb9125fbfeb11b4d Give $200 →
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c44b0488510ede3494b830034148b8c2e3a35b0634414d4d9 ca6071e8a7215f98a1fb1c7704eb76 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Senior Director of Fundraising, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Join our team
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad36d727e302e6c101f8bf2e0577208b6a3bf 85be21d796647c0d4b8440d841ffb1
Michael –
To deliver on our promise to make real change happen, I need Canadians who believe in our plan and believe in our team standing shoulder-to-shoulder with me. I need your creativity. Your ideas. Your energy. Your leadership.
We are looking to build a team of diverse, passionate, and hard-working Canadians willing to serve their country as exempt staff in political offices in Canada's new government. Please let us know you are interested by applying online here:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad3bae26d3cfddcc9f2540d3a46f6993195ff 0282e6cc2798e9136b475436b561d7 Apply now →
Together, we can build this country into something extraordinary, because this is Canada. And in Canada... better is always possible.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Prime Minister-designate
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad34d9dfbcee70d0013225cd0f7993e49f875 2b9ca3087c013841b0a0cf7bdc23e7 Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad3f57d6e785a342b548af32d1c5ff5c5b26f c8dcf7ebb74781d74b8ec12530cc93 Version française

The Liberal Party of Canada has chosen oneID to make it easier and more secure to donate. oneID is a digital identity provider that securely stores your information, makes it available when you choose, and oneID cannot see or access your information. You can use the information in your oneID to donate and to manage usernames and passwords across all your devices. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad32540f6698e74bfa9e8c715345860734002 a90d309d8763fc0c481751b43cc5c7 Go here to manage your information in oneID. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad3d7b4f7b99e65356d3f449e7d5cecceda5d ad619a60c29230452580fc511ffdd3 Go here to learn more about oneID and its security. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=dd30740896237ad3ef71b54a9f71b8049e50508807282b5ae0 a18b0d849d70bf6563a745ea12471c Go here to delete your oneID account.If you need more information about oneID, want to manage or delete your oneID account, please call 1-888-542-3725 for assistance.

message.subject: This might scare you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ebd008cea134407e4fe49dbaa65aae03f31e4effdc076923fd 75dc8529323de2e3b94cb044136679
Michael –
By now you may have heard that I love to talk about numbers.
But it’s Halloween, and the numbers I’m going to share may scare you.
Here’s one: $10-million. That’s how much the Conservative Party of Canada raised in the third quarter of 2015.
Here’s another: $9-million. That’s what the NDP raised over the same time period.
And us? We broke every fundraising record the Liberal Party of Canada has ever known to raise $7.3-million in just 3 months, but we still got out-raised.
We may have come from third-place to elect Justin Trudeau prime minister of a historic majority Liberal government that is going to bring real change for Canadians.
We may have had the best team of over 80,000 dedicated, hard-working volunteers (thank you for everything you all did!)
And we may have had the most loyal, generous donor-base of 50,479 Canadians (thank you for always believing we could do it!)
But with the Conservatives already fundraising against us -- as their latest fundraising email put it, “to build a formidable opposition to Justin Trudeau’s Liberals” -- we can’t stand still for one moment. We need to keep strengthening this movement we’ve built.
That’s why we need you to help us finish October strong with a donation right now.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Thank you,
Katie Telford National Campaign Co-chair, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Before I put the kids to bed
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=61eff162f5335e743994345cd576e0073f166e76d2e3550787 9045f957c5227754bf3833563a4d7b
Michael,as I write to you, evening is falling outside our new home, Rideau Cottage, on the grounds of Rideau Hall in Ottawa.
A few minutes from now, Sophie and I will put Xavier and Ella-Grace to bed (Hadrien is already fast asleep), but before I go, I want to share a few thoughts with you, to mark this moment.
Tomorrow, we take the next step in our journey together. I will be sworn in by the Governor General, and become Canada's 23rd prime minister. And I will announce the team of extraordinary Canadians who will serve as ministers in your new government.
This is all thanks to your support, and the support of millions of Canadians like you. Thank you.
On October 19, Canadians spoke loudly and clearly, that they want a government that will bring real change – in both the things that it does, and the way that it does them.
Our platform promised a new, ambitious plan for a strong and growing middle class. And you rightly expect us to fulfill that promise.
Which is why I am going to spend the next four years working harder than ever to deliver on what we promised.
Before the election, I also made a personal commitment to bring new leadership and a new tone to Ottawa. Sunny ways.
The new Canadian government will work together with our allies, with our provincial, municipal, and territorial partners so we can deliver the real, positive change that we promised you.
And we’ve already started. I just last week extended an invitation to provincial premiers, and opposition leaders to join me in Paris as part of the Canadian delegation to the United Nations Climate Change Conference at the end of this month.
Because being engaged on the international stage is important. It is critical for creating economic growth, good-paying jobs for the middle class, and prosperity for all Canadians. To that end – in addition to the climate change conference in Paris – I have confirmed that I will attend the G20 Leaders’ Summit in Turkey, the APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting in the Philippines and the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Malta.
But we’ll also be getting straight to work at home: The first bill introduced by our government will be a tax cut for the middle class so we can get started right away growing our economy, strengthening our middle class, and helping those working hard to join it.
I am deeply grateful to have this opportunity to serve you – and every Canadian across our great country. I am committed to leading an open, honest government that is accountable to Canadians, lives up to the highest ethical standards, brings our country together, and applies the utmost care and prudence in the handling of public funds.
Thank you for putting your trust in me, and our team. We will not let you down.
Justin Trudeau Prime Minister-designate
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=61eff162f5335e748b50cd7d441b5bac8f9f9f380e0681f564 c7914fadf0cae4d3e39a5e93fb13fa Donate →

message.subject: Today we remember
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd871c74dfbcb6967fc91670101f7291c7dd2c 7b1cc3996f8002f4a412f3d7efd5a5
Michael --
Shortly before my 22nd birthday, while riding in a friend’s car, I was hit in a drive-by shooting.
The bullet passed through my neck, and struck my spinal cord, leaving me quadriplegic and wheelchair-bound for the rest of my life.
Stories like mine -- a moment of extreme violence that changed a life forever -- are rare in civilian life.
But for the brave men and women in uniform we celebrate today, and the veterans who have served Canada proudly, such violence can be an everyday risk.
This Remembrance Day, I find myself reflecting on the extraordinary sacrifices of our Armed Forces. Their courage. Their commitment to keeping us safe. But also the hardships they face both while in uniform and after they come home.
I know our new government has much work to do to honour our sacred obligation to Canada’s veterans. That’s why I’m excited that as Minister of Veterans Affairs, I’ll be rolling out all of the commitments we made during the campaign in the weeks and months to come, such as:
- the right to choose life-long disability pensions -- in place of the unfair lump sum, after which a veteran gets cut off - a meaningful increase to the Earnings Loss Benefit -- the financial aid a veteran can apply for during their recovery process - a badly overdue program that, like the American GI bill, will pay for a veteran’s complete education, no matter what career they choose - increased support for families caring for a loved one dealing with the aftermath of war - re-opening those all-important Veterans Service Centres, hiring 400 new service delivery staff, and creating world class centres of excellence for veteran care, including PTSD. Above all, we will work to implement best practices and support veterans so they can receive the benefits and services they need when they return home.
When I was injured, I found the support I needed to rebuild my life and eventually go on to have a successful career in public life. In those moments I felt alone, there was always someone, somewhere I could turn to.
I want Canada’s servicemen and women, and Canada’s veterans to know they too are not alone, that all Canadians stand with them.
That’s why I’d like you to add your name to thank the members of Canada’s Armed Forces and veterans for their service and sacrifice.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd87d95ac753bc8c06123edac904e679ab6b70 92f63edafd1851b4be8b30a4610440 Add your name now →
Thank you,
Hon. Kent Hehr Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd87535960139f94f3ea7983c7f9d9f40e734b 4192d0f19a8e8ac5c1d8607b0e4c3d Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd879e84320ddc0967e75cd51d6853ca7b0729 3b33a15a3a802211be228dea218782 Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd87ee048ca6124ab1022d8af2faf1184b130e b7e4dfee4a97360afc9c1af074e9f2 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8fb5ae139ed3bd87ee048ca6124ab1022d8af2faf1184b130e b7e4dfee4a97360afc9c1af074e9f2 Unsubscribe

message.subject: Thank you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d4054990f71f32b4e4cb39f17fdcfc7a24f78 00bec3f6c83aa4f12a39e566a4e587
Michael -- Real change has come to Canada, and it's because of Canadians like you.
You want a government with a vision and an agenda for this country that is positive and ambitious and hopeful.
You want a government that works as hard as you do. One that is focused every minute of every day on growing the economy, creating jobs, and strengthening the middle class. One that is devoted to helping less fortunate Canadian families work their way into the middle class.
You want a Prime Minister who knows Canada is a country that is strong not in spite of our differences, but because of them. Who understands that openness and transparency means better, smarter decisions.
I promise you that I will lead that government. I will make that vision a reality. I will be that Prime Minister.
To get here, we beat fear with hope. We beat cynicism with hard work. And we beat negative, divisive politics with a positive vision that brings Canadians together.
Now I need Canadians who believe in our plan for real change, and in our team, standing shoulder-to-shoulder with me.
We can build this country into something extraordinary, because this is Canada. And in Canada….Better is always possible.
That’s why the first thing I want to do is get to know you better. Please take this quick survey-- and tell me which issues are most important to you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d406a8b9efd5002543bc092cd3270b05230d4 9261f3713c2fa157551b2a30464cda Get started →
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
Prime Minister of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d4025662312ac7c3ddf383329d88faabf7473 727014ea11e3358691168b06277150 Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d40ba3e7356e0e1aa46cb742cac81d220a14e f84448fec000a7e8f4d313e6a7a42f Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d40fda0371f9f711bf55be40bed744294ef6f c8f0e0a7835cec6eb17b51d87839cd Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d40fda0371f9f711bf55be40bed744294ef6f c8f0e0a7835cec6eb17b51d87839cd Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
The Liberal Party of Canada has chosen oneID to make it easier and more secure to donate. oneID is a digital identity provider that securely stores your information, makes it available when you choose, and oneID cannot see or access your information. You can use the information in your oneID to donate and to manage usernames and passwords across all your devices. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d4047c323a8266e580f620b26b1f72e903d0f b54be10f087db93c7998038d84afce Go here to manage your information in oneID. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d40d0a10577810cf3773768b0e24f680d095d 3a7cc1937934bfdb6c99bb4180cee8 Go here to learn more about oneID and its security. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d40f788d7c3888e46e4d60b2ae6f93041827a 9b559f5d4391b4ee40744a134a0a82 Go here to delete your oneID account.If you need more information about oneID, want to manage or delete your oneID account, please call 1-888-542-3725 for assistance.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=01d80d7e04ef2d4037fa5250970f7ea96d0c291b7bf89aed09 37e3a1d3ff53d530df761b0d84bb6f here to view our policy.

message.subject: I’d like to get to know you better
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3d9a0953ba2df893f4877c4e6d0a51f5ceea8cb1ad460f152e 8092604b5a22c758d801a917339118
Michael,
We started this journey, not in October 2015, but three years ago with a very old- fashioned strategy. We met and talked with as many Canadians as we could. And we listened.
You built this platform. You built this movement. You told us what you need to be successful. You told us what kind of government you want, and we built the plan to make it happen. In coffee shops and town halls, in church basements and in gurdwaras, you gathered. You spent time, together, with us. And you told us about the kind of country you want to build and leave to your children.
And together, one community at a time, powered by the tireless dedication of over 80,000 volunteers, and the generosity of Canadians like you, we earned the chance to bring real change to Canada.
Now we start a new journey.One in which your voice is important. And I’d like the chance to get to know you better.
That’s why I am inviting you to tell us which issues are most important to you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3d9a0953ba2df8934cd44ae48aa608ad971c2b786c581984b9 1fc4310735c143d6f55e22ab255310 Get started →
With gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire-Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Canada’s message at COP21
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b71430520776ad1ade792409488bdd1ccd5ada0d0ae8d80828 148f0983c33797ad2ea7d6a6a8b39f
Michael --
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b71430520776ad1a9c1d5bb4d470d05c23ce043005c03ed116 2b4aa95fd84bf7614785e979c2c900 Children born today aren’t responsible for climate change.
But they, and their children, are the ones who will have to live with its consequences – from extreme weather, drought and floods, to increased disease.
Climate change is real and we no longer have time to debate it. The clock is ticking for us to do something about it.
That’s why Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and I met with the Premiers yesterday.
Our goal was to gather, share views, and craft a united Canadian message to take to Paris: that Canada is serious about climate change.
We saw it last Sunday with Alberta, who announced a plan to price carbon, just like British Columbia has. And we’ve seen it from Ontario and Quebec, who signed on last year to a cap and trade system with California.
When we meet again to set a national target within 90 days of COP21, it won’t be through a one-size-fits all solution. It will consist of all the creative approaches our provincial and territorial partners put forward. And above all, our approach will be based on science.
There is no denying that the time to act has long passed. Governments both Conservative and Liberal have given too little in terms of concrete action. With each passing year it becomes more difficult to achieve meaningful reduction within the relevant time frame.
The bottom line is this. No country can solve this alone. Nor can any province or territory. But our children and grandchildren will feel the consequences if we fail.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b71430520776ad1a9c1d5bb4d470d05c23ce043005c03ed116 2b4aa95fd84bf7614785e979c2c900
Which is why I’m turning to you. It’s not just the federal government and provinces and territories that must rally together before we all head to Paris. It is all Canadians.
Please add your name to stand with the Prime Minister and Premiers heading to COP21 -- and tell them you’re ready to do your part to fight climate change.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b71430520776ad1a9c1d5bb4d470d05c23ce043005c03ed116 2b4aa95fd84bf7614785e979c2c900 Add your name now →
Thank you,
Hon. Catherine McKenna Minister of the Environment and Climate Change
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Canadian stories
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9fbc6aac0e5081374dcd10e3bcf113a430f733379a259a760b 0eb68df1c97f312aa623c989792051
Michael --
There are a thousand stories I could share with you from the campaign. But I want you to think about one thing in particular – the diversity of experiences that make up our great country. From rural communities to the heart of our cities, and everywhere in between, you shared your unique and inspiring stories with me.
Now, you and your fellow citizens have chosen a new government. A government that deeply believes in that diversity. We know in our bones that Canada was built by people from all corners of the world, who worship every faith, who belong to every culture, who speak every language.
We believe in our hearts that this country’s unique diversity is a blessing bestowed upon us by previous generations of Canadians.
Canadians who stared down prejudice and fought discrimination in all its forms. We know that our enviable, inclusive society didn't happen by accident, and it won’t continue without effort. I’ve always known this. Canadians know it too.
Have faith in your fellow citizens my friends. They are kind and generous. They are open-minded and optimistic.
And they know in their hearts that in Canada, better is always possible.
This is the Canada I am building. And I want you to join me on this journey.
That’s why the first thing I want to do is get to know you better. Please take this quick survey-- and tell me which issues are most important to you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9fbc6aac0e508137a59a9e1949b5ec7164edba8a866e28bbc1 c32f8303dd0b3c8269250a7ea61ccf Get started →
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
Prime Minister of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: You, me, and all our MPs
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=da47140078c2452aaa9cd524b319a7c1a85edfc17af8a73ddd 49c5015320b82189e22e9122f671f7
The annual Liberal Caucus Holiday Party is always a great time, Michael.
It’s a chance for Liberal MPs and our staffs to come together, celebrate, and sometimes even hit the dance floor.
But this year’s party is going to be extra special: We’re flying one lucky supporter and his or her guest to Ottawa, December 9, to join us -- and hotel and airfare are on us.
It’s going to be an extraordinary time to be in the heart of the action in Ottawa during the first weeks of this Liberal government.
I’ll just be back from four international trips including the Paris Climate conference.
Our new Cabinet Ministers will be hard at work on the priorities you voted for on October 19.
And Liberal MPs will be hitting the ground running as Parliament sits for the first time since the election, just days after the Governor General will have delivered the Speech from the Throne.
If the chance to meet and mingle with me and Sophie, and the Cabinet Ministers and Liberal MPs bringing real change to Ottawa sounds like fun to you, please donate what you can, and then enter for the chance to be there.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Rt. Hon. Justin Trudeau Prime Minister of Canada

message.subject: Thanks, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=529615240dfa955fbc2b611bffd37dfa3647199c1abd0d35d3 f8be7440707be5b01f7a44b6f66a27
Thank you, Michael.
The holidays are a time for us to think about the things we’re grateful for, and you’re at the top of my list.
No matter how you showed your support this year -- with your vote, your time, your money, or simply by reading emails like this one -- you’ve had our back, and you’ve definitely had the Prime Minister’s back.
Promotions like this one -- airfare and hotel on us so a supporter and a guest can join Justin Trudeau and me, and all our Liberal MPs at the Liberal Caucus Holiday Party -- are how we give back. It’s our way of saying thank you.
But that’s not the only reason. In the last election, the Conservatives outspent us by $10-million. They likely out-raised us by $10-million, too. We can’t let that continue. It’s going to take everyone’s help to make sure we close the gap with the Conservatives, and end this year in a strong financial position.
So far, 2,010 Canadians have chipped in $98,396, and 1,457 have gone on to enter the promotion. But so far you’re not among them.
Please check your donation history below, chip in what you can, and then enter for the chance to come to the Liberal Caucus Holiday Party in Ottawa, on December 9.
2015 ELECTION YEAR RECORD
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this election year: $0
You can still be a part of history! Become an official election year donor(And for a chance to attend an exciting holiday celebration with the Prime Minister!)➜Make a donation now!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Anna Gainey President

message.subject: Wow, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=635471f57d3a0aaacd5b1f1d47265725f9a7e9b14d16176850 e88a707c6fedda3446158e63a6d1c3
I just pulled the numbers on this week’s fundraising campaign and they’re incredible.
2,585 have donated $138,894. And 2,026 have gone on to enter for the chance to attend the Liberal Caucus Holiday Party in Ottawa, December 9.
I’m hoping we can raise $250,000 by Sunday at midnight when this promotion ends -- but we definitely can’t make it if you don’t give.
It’s going to be an extraordinary time to be in the heart of the action in Ottawa during the first weeks of this Liberal government.
Don’t let the Conservatives out-raise us this quarter -- check your donation status, give what you can, and then enter for the chance to join us in Ottawa (and remember, airfare and hotel for you and a guest are on us).
2015 ELECTION YEAR RECORD
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this election year: $0
You can still be a part of history! Become an official election year donor(And for a chance to attend an exciting holiday celebration with the Prime Minister!)➜Make a donation now!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: challenge
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c6faf532f278969a178ddc6c5e339f80ee08b459962d08674 850c7df3cbde5ca1a866db4d70e7c4
Here’s our next big challenge, Michael --
The Conservative Party is the weakest it’s been in years in all regards but one: fundraising.
During the campaign they outspent us by $10-million. And out-raised us by $10-million.
They used that money to try and tear us down. It didn’t work. But if their fundraising advantage continues, they’ll try again -- with the same old attack ads and food fight politics.
So, this holiday season, let’s prove positive politics are here to stay.
Let’s show Canadians who voted for real change they can count on us. To make this movement stronger. To deliver real change. And close the fundraising gap so we never go through another 10 years, like the last 10 years.
Already, 2,828 Canadians have decided to be a part of it. They’ve chipped in $153,653.
Another 2,312 have gone on to enter the promotion for the chance to attend the 2015 Caucus Holiday Party in Ottawa, December 9.
But our goal is $250,000 by midnight tonight and we still haven’t heard from you.
Donate -- then enter the promotion (airfare and hotel are on us!) -- and help us close the gap, for good.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Dinner?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9edf9388d6c0f32435bc0124170d438deed2277d272814d90a 8506456ddbd34a668a1f8c5da138ba
Michael --
Part of my job as Minister of Finance is to stay connected with Canadians.
You’re on the front lines of our economy, and you have a lot of great ideas about how to create growth and opportunity.
That’s why I’m excited to announce I’ll be visiting the house of one lucky Canadian -- and it could be you.
And around your dinner table, along with four of your guests, we’ll do what so many Canadians do -- share a meal and talk.
I want to hear your ideas for boosting the economy, and how we can help Canadians save more money at the end of each month.
I want to know what the obstacles are to growing your small business, or the company you work in.
And I want to know what you think we can do to get more young and Indigenous people into the workforce.
Because when I hear a good idea, I take careful note of it.
This is what real change is all about -- it’s just you, me, your guests, and great conversation over a delicious meal. I can’t wait!
Anyone can have the chance to host this dinner party (don’t worry, we’ll take care of the cooking) and no donation is required. But I hope you'll chip in what you can, and then enter the promotion.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: Big hairy goal
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ae6bc9f2bb4c3d1183f90b4df0ecbe1bbb644362dc127f104c 7b72f11514ec4d4135dfc381dfa789
$1-million.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ae6bc9f2bb4c3d1101d7f37bc0681dd4ce9c26a4a1d225b50b 57378483260e1a39ee3cac7f5a05f7
That’s the big hairy number I’ve just circled on my office wall.
It’s also how much we have to raise by midnight on December 15 -- just to stay competitive with the Conservatives this quarter.
I’m saying -- let’s go for it!
It’s hard to believe, but the Conservatives are poised to out-raise us -- which means attack ads and smear politics could be back.
Yuck, right?!
If you’re like me, the thing you are loving about these first weeks with Justin Trudeau as Prime Minister, is how positive a place Canada has become.
To keep it that way, we need to close the fundraising gap so we never go through another 10 years, like the last 10 years.
That means we need to keep connecting with Canadians in all 338 ridings, invest in new technologies, and continue to work hard.
Fortunately, we’re off to a strong start! Last week 3,856 of you gave $244,458 -- meaning we’re already a quarter of the way to our goal.
I’ve also left some space on my wall so that the team can start writing the names of everyone who’s donating. I hope we get to write yours!
Please donate -- and scroll below to see our great holiday giveaways for donations of $150 and $250, or more.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: Deeply grateful
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ba1f6acde12219ac57e169c6949f295eec938ee7cd0503c7f2 29d400be0514c1af189bd7bc3b9b31
On behalf of Justin, Xavier, Ella-Grace and Hadrien, I offer you my family’s warmest holiday wishes.
You have helped make history this year. Because of your support, our work to deliver real change for Canadians has been celebrated around the world.
>From our historic election win to naming a cabinet -- equal in its strength and diversity.To welcoming the first of the Syrian refugees to their new homes in communities across Canada. And beginning the process to create a national public inquiry into missing and murdered Indigenous women and girls in Canada.Thank you so very much for making our extraordinary work possible.
I am deeply grateful for the faith you have placed in our Liberal team and in my husband. And for the heartfelt warmth you’ve extended to our family. There is much hard work ahead, and together we will continue to achieve the real change we want to see for our country.
As we head into 2016, let’s make sure we grow our commitment to our party. The new year will bring new challenges, and together we can lay groundwork not just for this year and next, but for years to come. Please give any amount you can afford now so we can invest in the tools, training and technology we need to keep our party strong.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ba1f6acde12219ac835b4c921707bb8dd1172eee59dbef14ad c0f2c534a75550ae936ec73ca6f712 Donate now ➜
With deep gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire Trudeau Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)December 26 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | December 30 - 31, 9 AM - 9 PM ET
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: ✏ To do in 2016:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5b5d645d0840c490d2289ac17d226de8e6f6f28cbbb67813bd 616f6adce6fb96398d24eff7378e02
Before you go any further, read this:
Did you know that by donating to the Liberal Party of Canada today you could receive as much as 75% back at tax time? But you only have until midnight Dec. 31 to make sure you get that credit!
With 2016 just 4 days away, we’re starting to make our resolutions list.
It’s been a big year, and we have even more we want to accomplish.Have a look!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5b5d645d0840c490b84a2db455629ae8c74036d0e975c84002 1010952bfc3185842ccf42f208b6ea
Want to get this done? Every single donation helps. Give now!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
