message.subject: 📊 Ours vs theirs
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed601d0dacc48701c3c1ac0682a7f9412043 be358072ebd5b13e32005bcc57db4e
Michael, every morning I take a look at my fundraising dashboard so I can chart our progress against that of the Conservatives.
But what I’m seeing now has me worried. Take a look:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed91f7aa40dea368e34226017d1035ff5e72 77f6365a96fbb1d04efde4d6bc9ba3
That’s right, based on my latest projections the Conservatives – despite their election defeat –could be on pace to out raise us by more than $1.5 million this quarter.
Just think how much of an edge that extra funding gives them. More money to buy air time for negative ads. More resources to spend spreading negative personal attacks on social media. (And they’re still at it even as you read this)!
This can’t wait any longer. Will you make a donation now to help close the gap before the end of 2015?
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeeddafbc8a7e67796bce2348a5fce897b09ac b0e83de8e76c844df3d881ef3322fc Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed1005f07e9f5b3bdb70cb60371f4a44a58b a4f6dfd4b6c9949ca5437dc806f87b Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed8b5ebf42e95d7bdc87058c43a051f3a69d 4ab93813165d58b9f491c37a244400 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed71ebff56594cca20cc96cb09e061ce1aab f775af59d33949f5c3e6a00964cc41 Give $100 ➜ That's just $25 after your tax credit!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeedd6b67b8b556ea2267d3c3a9afec94bb9a6 5f1999a1ddfbfa31508c7e82be8094 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed22a1f107f1fd932a69aba6d9b8db08ca00 cc46ae5ef1b686e94f89238206ccb6 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Acting National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)December 26 - 29, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | December 30 - 31, 9 AM - 9 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0bc1eeeffbbbfeed91f7aa40dea368e34226017d1035ff5e72 77f6365a96fbb1d04efde4d6bc9ba3 Donate now ➜

message.subject: Humbled
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2ea032327ff6878754ba1a50276bd9069e3da919411ffa6cbe 79dea8ec1e6cd7ac8a1f899d2728fc
Michael --
As the new year approaches, I want to take a moment to recognize what our Liberal government has achieved so far.
In November, Canadians were introduced to their impressive, talented, new cabinet made up of an equal number of women and men.
Our government restored the long-form census, and gave scientists and diplomats the right to speak freely again. And started to securely welcome 25,000 refugees to Canada.
It took the message that “Canada is back” to the world in high-profile international meetings from the G20 in Turkey, APEC in Manila, and the Commonwealth Leaders Summit in Malta.
And it showed that Canadians from all provinces and territories, as well as the federal government, can work together and speak as one in the fight against climate change, first as the premiers met here in Canada, and then on the world stage, at the Paris Climate Summit.
And earlier this month, in a Parliament, where a new Speaker, and a new tone reign, one of our party’s top election promises was passed: real change right now in the form of a middle class tax cut.
These are the values and the vision we fought so hard for. That is why your continued support of our movement is so important. And it’s why in the final days of December, with the election behind us, we are asking again; for a strong Party that fights for and engages Canadians on these important issues.
I know our goal is ambitious. But I also know we are equal to the task.
I’m turning to you. Can you help and chip in what you can? I thank you, humbly, for giving as generously as you can.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Stephen Bronfman

message.subject: Want to know why, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=9675224d008b9c2e8bf69ec9343ccfd8d47186373063197d08 a3307cd0d5ffaf2c981a7f695e3130
Hi, Michael --
Over the Christmas holidays, I was asked a specific question a few times. It got me thinking that many of our supporters might have the same question.
We won! So now that we have a Liberal government, why do we need to raise money?
It’s a good question. It’s an important question. And I want to take time to answer it.
The most valuable people in our party are our supporters; members, volunteers and donors. Your involvement, from input on surveys and polls, to volunteer shifts, to your generous donations, keep the Liberal Party of Canada strong and fighting for the real change that Canadians voted for.Without your support, we couldn’t grow our grassroots and community initiatives, train our hard-working volunteers, or make critical investments in the technologies and expertise to keep our party competitive.The real change we delivered on October 19 – well you know that took hard work – a lot of it. And without your help, our continued work to achieve real change is just not possible.
And then there’s the kicker. The Conservatives are pushing hard to raise enough money to defeat our Liberal government in 2019. Your help right now, allows us to lay the groundwork to keep our party strong, (and in fighting shape!) for years to come.
Your generous contributions in 2014 paved the way for our historic win. Will you help ensure our party remains every bit as strong heading into 2016?
2015 ELECTION YEAR RECORD
Please review your 2015 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this year: $0 --You have $1500 in contribution room left for this year!

Christina Topp Acting National Director, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Top three moments of 2015
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=57ebb28a98c4d7ec1322ba8a1b6f95b63feaa4307e40411674 3cc0a8265a2c3f28c7ff62f686b857
Michael --
There are many moments that stand out for our movement this year, but here are three of my favourites that all took place in a little over a month after our new Cabinet was sworn in.All of them demonstrate that real change is not only possible – it is here.
The first happened as soon as Cabinet was sworn in – the return of the long-form census and evidence-based decision making.
The second took place in Paris when a Canadian delegation – including premiers and opposition leaders – stood united to fight climate change.
And the third happened on December 9th.That’s when the first Syrian refugees touched down at Pearson International Airport in Toronto and were welcomed by a nation to their new home, Canada. Some were surprised that Prime Minister Justin Trudeau would be on hand. But where else would he be?
That moment, what those families felt -- and what Canadians felt watching as Justin Trudeau greeted them -- was the very idea Canada represents. A place where hope for a better future meets solid ground. A place where better is always possible.
None of these changes required complex bills or legislative amendments. They were simple acts reflecting core Canadian and Liberal values. And they happened because of the real change we fought for and won on October 19.
But don’t think for a minute that is it. We’re just getting started. And I think you won’t be surprised to hear our team has some big ideas for Canada. That means we have to keep our organization strong and start laying the groundwork today for the next campaign.
That’s why in the final hours of this momentous year - whatever your favourite moment has been since October 19th - I’m asking you to make your final donation of 2015.
Thank you for all your support in 2015. And thank you again for believing in real change. It feels good doesn’t it?
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Thank you and best wishes for the new year.
Christina Topp Acting National Director, Liberal Party of Canada

message.text:

At midnight tonight, Elections Canada closes the books on the fundraising quarter.
That means this is your last chance to donate in this historic year, not tomention maximize your 2015 tax credit.
You can still get up to $650 back at tax time.

With your help we can hit the ground running in 2016, investing in tools, training and technology to keep our party competitive for the challenges that lie ahead.

message.subject: Gone at midnight
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0f86ec9181b01382727b07f68d28187b7ff250c932a21e83b9 25dc0463c729bd4b79f783d1d4625d
Yes, Michael!
I’ve been getting hourly updates on our Q4 donor dashboard from Christina Topp today. And something extraordinary is happening. Canadians from every corner of the country are chipping in to help us close in on the Conservatives.
Take a look -- that gap is closing (but time is running out -- and fast)! LPC Fundraising Dashboard LPC Donors (Actual Q4)CPC Donors (Estimated Q4)Amount to close the gap: 55,63760,0004,363
But with just hours left to midnight, I noticed you haven’t donated to this final fundraising drive -- yet.
Don’t miss out on your unused tax credit for political donations. Have a look at your 2015 donor record and then join the 3,710 Canadians who have donated to this final fundraising drive of 2015.
2015 ELECTION YEAR RECORD
Please review your 2015 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this year: $0 --You have $1500 in contribution room left for this year!
Estimated 2015 tax savings: $0 -- don't miss out on getting up to $650 tax credits -- donate now!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

Thank you and have a safe and happy New Year.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)December 31, 9 AM - 9 PM ET
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC candidate it may not be reflected in this donor record. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=17bb1843f4896f5ff3df3192348acab39d3ce0166b04ce4375 743e0e5b62fbb2e35dd5adf84bdf57
At the end of every year I like to take a few moments to reflect on what we accomplished.
And this year, above all, we accomplished some incredible things together, Michael.
In January, the Liberal Party of Canada held just 36 seats in the House of Commons. We knew it was a tall task to build a campaign that would elect a Liberal government, but we also knew that with a lot of hard work (and more than a bit of hope!), that it was possible.
Over the course of the year, we nominated 338 fantastic Team Trudeau candidates from coast to coast to coast.
We then set out to organize the largest volunteer driven field organization in the history of Canadian politics. 80,000 Canadians joined Team Trudeau, and combined to make 8 million knocks and calls to Canadians across the country.
We broke party fundraising goals across the board. Over 90,000 Canadians chipped in what they could throughout the year to make sure that our ads were on the air, that rallies were organized, and our campaign plane was fueled and ready to fly.
On October 19, it all paid off. We now have 184 Liberal MPs from all walks of life sitting in the House of Commons, led by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.
That government is working harder than ever to deliver what we promised. A tax cut for our middle class, improved transparency, and a more sustainable economy for generations to come.
Now, in just a few short hours, 2015 will come to an end. But before it does, I’m asking you to take one more action.
Because the change that we delivered didn’t happen on its own, it took the generosity of Canadians like you to make it happen. So please, donate what you can afford now, so we can make next year, just as great as this year.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=17bb1843f4896f5fdf7d4393b042a03529441ddc21e81e407f 2800a2836beae2ff9de06d624d9bb1 Give $5 ➜

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=17bb1843f4896f5fef944c2d842db95a2ea0e0b7c40be7d2e6 9af7ab2780b5e39747a55f9600295c Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=17bb1843f4896f5f971a77b310429f0509b191c79d81eba394 fa05fc269c051d4b79939ed3c9dfc8 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Anna Gainey President
Liberal Party Of Canada Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)December 31, 9 AM - 9 PM ET

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=97302ee5a4fd37f6342a44cad2068dd8d76f4096900295865e c96642d967254567be77c92e60d1ac
It's 2016 --and I couldn't be happier.
Don't get me wrong, 2015 was an amazing year and you have my deepest thanks for your generosity and support. Together we made history -- bringing renewed optimism to Canadians in every corner of our country, and to all those we’ve welcomed to Canada over the last six weeks.
But we are in a new year now. And this year, more than any other, the hope of new beginnings is on my mind. I am inspired by the compassion and generosity of spirit that lives in communities all across this country. As prime minister, I see it everywhere I go. Over the holidays I saw it in in the hard-working people who worked and volunteered at homeless shelters and food banks. In the overflowing bins collecting toys for children, who deserve nothing in life but happiness and hope. And in the thousands of Canadians who have offered to sponsor families fleeing war in Syria and in other parts of the world. I am happy to share the news Canada welcomed its 10,000th refugee late Tuesday evening.
For our government’s part, that means doing more to support the middle class and all those working hard to join it. When I meet with Cabinet in St. Andrews-by-the-Sea, New Brunswick next week, we will review all that has been accomplished since November 2015 and discuss further plans to create jobs, strengthen the middle class, and grow an economy that works for all.
Soon after, I travel to Davos, Switzerland for the World Economic Forum annual meeting. There we’ll signal the return of a more positive, open, and innovative Canada to the international business community. In an increasingly interconnected global economy, Canada’s diversity and connections to the world are among our greatest economic assets, and will prove vital as we work to grow the middle class.
These are important, necessary first steps toward building a strong middle class. Because when our middle class is strong, growing, and successful, so is Canada. The coming year will be challenging, rewarding and full of hard work. Together we can achieve real and lasting change for years to come.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
Prime Minister of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Your Say: Budget 2016
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2888b0d831d1b771e25a9773e0908d9d6c9c15fe71ea6483b3 66a18323172bc22569725bb9a001f4
Michael --
As the MP for Mission — Matsqui — Fraser Canyon and in my career in business and as an active member of the Abbotsford Chamber of Commerce, I’ve seen the difference that open dialogue can make in achieving real change in a community.
That is why when we table our first budget in March, we want it to be built together with the input of Canadians from all across the country.
Our government knows that Canadians like you are on the front lines of our economy, every single day. And doing politics differently means listening to your concerns and your ideas.
On October 19, Canadians voted for a government that will deliver real change. That starts by making the right investments in our country. And for the first budget, we want to ensure you have a voice and can provide your input so we can make the right kind of investments for all Canadians.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2888b0d831d1b7716d1bc4c4549168df542fd5c74fcb7e5596 b8d600fccd31dd6e02dfd1d967dd1b While Finance Minister Bill Morneau is travelling the country to meet with Canadians, the Liberal Party of Canada is holding its own distinct consultation, and I want you to be a part of it.
We're asking you to take 5 minutes and complete our online Your Say: Budget 2016 consultation survey. In doing so, you'll make sure that your voice is heard when the government goes to draft the budget.
But you don't have much time to act. Next week we will be tallying up all the responses to share with you, then sending them directly to the Department of Finance in Ottawa.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2888b0d831d1b7716d1bc4c4549168df542fd5c74fcb7e5596 b8d600fccd31dd6e02dfd1d967dd1b Have your say now ➜
With your help -- and that of thousands of other Canadians -- we can deliver on an ambitious economic agenda that will create jobs, grow the economy, and ensure a thriving middle class after ten years of weak growth.
And above all, deliver the real change that you voted for.
Thank you,
Jati Sidhu, MP Mission — Matsqui — Fraser Canyon

message.subject: The first time ever
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a04750e88ec325ee23b8340a904a917d1914a55 9f10e692ee593080b19d06c38dc412
Michael, you've probably heard us say this too many times: 2015 was a great year.
But there is just one more amazing accomplishment I need to share with you. After this, I promise we won't talk about 2015 any more.
Are you ready for it? Here it is:
For the first time ever, we out-raised the Conservatives – and every other political party in Canada!
In the final quarter of 2015, 55,983 Canadians came together in support of real change, and helped raise a staggering $6,466,590!
That's such a strong finish to an amazing year, and something that I hope you are proud to be a part of, Michael. Because after years of hard work, it was supporters like you that made it happen.
On behalf of all of us at the Liberal Party, please accept our thanks for everything you did in 2015.
But 2016 is a new year, and there is a lot more work ahead of us.
For three years Justin Trudeau's motto was Hope and Hard Work. Just because we won the election doesn't mean that any of that hope goes away, or any of that hard work stops. In fact, Justin Trudeau is expecting us to work even harder than ever before.
Because we know that our opponents will be hungrier than ever, I'm counting on you, Michael, to help us start 2016 – the first full year as Canada’s governing party – strong.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a0475635c2a01fca373b1c670762e6daf365115 9c995716851f8a8f95888cf3542f0e Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a0475f64ad570aa525eda8fb909f48acd84295c 5891acd95c192b9c857e2d90cae1f4 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a04757e6c400bbbf9fdf13eb9062828c7afcacb a5ce66aa4d5c637a00ce549d8c4635 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a047557ebeb31296607ea4b59cd9c49fcefe39c 5d2e7ccc0af64237246ec051897ce0 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a0475163e0efd2a08b4cb97672f2030350c7e49 895d910c28bdc81ad71b8bf67a1c18 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a0475a232e647a50235eef49d65d0003b2ba2c8 e1e190a1b02dbde4a5beab2a39f226 www.liberal.ca/donate
Your investment early in the year will be put to use right away. We are working hard to continue to grow our volunteer teams, investing in the new technologies that will shape political campaigns in 2019, and building support for our Leader when the attack ads inevitably start up again.
And with political parties now powered entirely by the generosity of their donors, I can say with certainty, we can’t do it without you.
Thank you, and here's to an amazing 2016!
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=36f1c71b839a04753a700e745773403b22b2ee1e363ff0ffd5 962339a936126f502613996fe9fb2e Donate now ➜

message.subject: My favourites
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4ea69f18501ffb508925346fc48866b41422cfcf563e243d48 babe9680cbe9d1b0224573771dc4f1
February 12 marks 100 days in office for Justin Trudeau and the Liberal team.
It may not seem like long, Michael, but in that time real change has come to Canada in some very concrete ways.
I wish I could cover them all, but there are simply too many -- so I’ll stick with my favourites.
Who can forget, on his first day in office, when Prime Minister Justin Trudeau introduced a cabinet made up of 50% men, and 50% women, simply “Because it’s 2015.”
But that announcement was just the beginning:
- We restored the long-form census, so communities like yours can have access to the high quality data they need to best serve your needs. As a former census taker, I can say it’s a good feeling to know you’re playing an active part in government! - We immediately unmuzzled scientists and encouraged them to share their research with the world and actively participate in the scientific community. - We took steps to reform the Senate which is now accepting applications from Canadians across the country as part of a new, non-partisan, merit-based, selection process for new Senators. - And, last but not least, starting in 2016 taxes are going down for the middle class, while they’re going up for the wealthiest 1 percent, because when the middle class is strong, all of Canada is strong. So Michael, that's just a small glimpse of what real change looks like. It's been an exciting first 100 days, but there is so much more work to do. And that is why I am turning to you now.
Under Justin Trudeau’s leadership, we have re-imagined and rebuilt the Liberal Party of Canada into an organized, data-driven and people-centred movement.
But we can’t stop now -- and we can’t take anything for granted.
Our opponents are going to be more motivated than ever and will learn from our success. We need to be looking ahead, building on our strengths and identifying the next innovations for our campaign. All of which takes your financial support.
Will you help us celebrate the first 100 days of Real Change, by helping us meet our early February fundraising goal of $250,000?
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

2016 is shaping up to be an exciting year. And we're counting on dedicated supporters like you to be with us every step of the way.
Thank you,
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Raising the bar
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=960af0abd0ac0366d01b6257b091b54152b8bdb595b4369899 3cdb0b09527e4f887ad74cb0e47682
Hi Michael,
My name is Eva Nassif and last October 19 I was elected MP for the riding of Vimy, in Laval, my home city in Quebec for over 20 years. As incredible as that day was, there is one other that I will just never forget -- November 4, 2015. The day Prime Minister Trudeau raised the bar for governments around the world – by selecting a gender neutral Cabinet. His reason: Because it's 2015.
Amazing. And true. And a great step toward real change.
For me, as a Lebanese Canadian, a former nurse, a teacher and a certified translator, I was a member of the Laval Women’s Centre and of the Groupe Femmes, Politique et Démocratie -- and now as MP, breaking through barriers is not new. I now sit on the Standing Committee on the Status of Women. Yet that day, seeing an equal number of men and women taking their oaths of office as Cabinet Ministers, I felt prouder than ever of our Prime Minister, our country and of being Canadian.
Well now it’s 2016, Michael. And since November 4, our Liberal government has worked tirelessly to keep delivering the real change Canadians voted for.
But we have so much more we want to accomplish. More old and long-standing barriers to breakthrough.
And that’s why I’m asking you to give any amount you can afford right now.
If you are as proud of having as many talented women in our cabinet as talented men, help mark our government’s first 100 days of Real Change and get a strong start on the months to come.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=960af0abd0ac036617fab918fda2a33307ea5323ec176ab8c2 584b2eeb328d30ca4b72a0fe0a0cc8 Give $5 ➜

Thank you,

message.subject: All because of you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=67f852c7e6443bf3d02a8869ccdc93751c67d3d2331dfaed65 693b4c3445815908609ee845423ad5
Michael -- tomorrow marks 100 days for your Liberal government. And everything achieved in the past 100 days has been because of you. So today I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart.
I remember that first day so clearly; the sun was shining bright, so many of you were smiling. And the feeling that we were going to create something amazing and make this country better – together – was everywhere. It was a gift for me to be able to see you all there so happy! My kids were waiting for my husband and I towards the end, and as Ella-Grace ran into my arms I thought: everything we're trying to accomplish is to pave the way today and for the next generations to come.
You made that happen. And you’ve played a pivotal role in making it possible for our government to achieve so much. In helping make daily life better for millions of Canadians. And for all your hard work every step of the way -- thank you.
When Justin selected a gender neutral cabinet on November 4, the country knew this was going to be a different kind of government. And since then, we’ve seen our team working hard, showing politics can be done differently. Standing up for the millions of Canadians who were cast to the sidelines for over 10 years. And above all, governing with compassion -- making us all so very proud.
This kind of real and meaningful change takes hard work and support from the most important people in our country – you, the Canadian people. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=67f852c7e6443bf3365c3faad16cadcc22d4fb2d3f02eec6f8 f168a4501d3bda6012c8d5e228c80c So far in our fundraising drive, hundreds of Canadians have pledged to help our party keep doing its important work. I’m asking you to join them now, Michael.
Our government is just getting started. Meaning, there is much hard work ahead. And keeping our party strong in the days and months to come is going to be essential. Which is why I’m asking you to contribute to the Liberal Party of Canada today.
Everything we have accomplished was made possible thanks to dedicated individuals like you. People who had the foresight months and years ago to make a donation in support of our vision for Canada.
We still need your support. Help mark the first 100 days of Real Change by giving any amount you can afford right now.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

With gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire Trudeau

message.subject: More hard work, Michael!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04edb8be0741df5ee2c00a9e3de2cc75b205df e5c8493d6dd4003627983c4d2f123a
Michael, our hard work is only just beginning.
That goes for all of us – myself included. I may be President of the Liberal Party of Canada, but I'm also a volunteer. I'm also a mom, and a Canadian invested in our country's future.
Canadians put their trust in the Liberal Party of Canada, and made Justin Trudeau our Prime Minister. Now it's up to us to continue to grow our movement, and show them that they made the right choice.
So far we’re on the right track. The Liberal government has made positive and significant changes that I am truly proud of.
We cut income taxes for the middle class to help them better afford the high cost of raising their families. We demonstrated compassion for refugees in the face of fear and uncertainty. Most importantly, we have proven that so much more can be accomplished when we empower each other day in and day out.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04edc0bf41a543c0f40c3b26e655793a11ff6e 713f444133a64e579d2bf61f006657 Now I need your help to make sure that the Liberal Party is ready to continue building on the progress we’ve made, into 2016 and beyond.
Our people-centred movement works hard to keep Canadians informed and engaged. To do that, we need volunteers and staff across the country who are working day in and day out to connect with people in all corners of the country.
It takes the financial support of Canadians like you to make that happen.
That is why we’ve set our February fundraising goal at $250,000. Please make a donation now and help us reach it.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed0a06e56031690d5a6c800168cceca3dd64 0ba103f2d30d99971ea28e4d1f8c3b Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed5b15e78322afb6b0447b7690b78cf9850f 633ceb5baca904ae6026e6d184424e Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed243290aac66dcd33124d1e4d5fcf4a665a cbbd28db468ffcbc5824c9f12884b6 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed0f881e217f23e6d4a9f071df26dce1d5d7 cc1c526a5dfade2e1cbaae769953be Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed8447526b175b7d2edcfb5d689e332421fc dad41ad10711508cbb1cf5fb2a9cae Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed4ec1546476536e71cff5e89a5ad191a353 0a875009015088350f121c87c3ab95 www.liberal.ca/donate
Together, we can make this year a year of Real Change for all Canadians.
Thank you,
Anna Gainey President
Liberal Party Of Canada Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 11 & 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=afa63a65d87e04ed60607de417afaab05d760021da6dabba6e 2557cf3320c002a83b906421cb7fbf Donate now ➜

message.subject: A special message for Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7d7546bcd4e66eb4ad75a54a347357b0672 80e96e8029bf750966d0c2d869819e
Today marks my 100th day in office and I wanted to give you an update on how things are going, Michael.
But I also wanted to check in and let you know that every day I am thinking about you, and everyone who helped make all this possible.
If we’ve achieved positive change in the first 100 days, please know, I know it is because of you.
>From cutting taxes for the middle class and raising them for the wealthiest 1 percent, to restoring the long-form census, or introducing Canada’s first-ever gender neutral cabinet at the federal level -- and everything that will follow -- I know who I am keeping my promises to.
You trusted me, and our team, and gave generously, whether of your time, your dollars or your votes, when it mattered most.
Now, we are starting to see results. And this is only the beginning.
Over the next few months we will introduce our first budget, and begin the largest infrastructure investment in Canadian history. And we will continue to support Canada’s middle class.
This work is so important.
That’s why I need you to stay engaged. After 100 days, 365 days, and in the years to come.
None of this is possible without you, your trust and your generosity.
So I hope you will do what you can to help keep our movement strong -- and meeting our goals.
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau
Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7f8157fd585a655a34f2b827f52cc115ab9 77e707edbffaa2d13bc5f3e2e2723f PS: We've put together a short video looking back at the first 100 days in government. There is still a lot to do, but you can take a look back at what we've accomplished so far together.
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7bfbd878a1f4178dbeae9391375c021af51 49766b8fed79a0f914c366df8798df Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7f454dc2e161d93de15479f5cd1ea0c1e90 7b0a37ccbce51c1aa95948b7ccc242 Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7ab4b315338a5d270e28e97daa672866e4d 71f07883814597f810b163419a2fb4 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7ab4b315338a5d270e28e97daa672866e4d 71f07883814597f810b163419a2fb4 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3558a78891e3bbf7b3038a4ac96b7abc54b2074a7444b790aa 7f434abd46d2f556d39a65b67db65e here to view our policy.

message.subject: Did you see the Prime Minister’s email?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc07a0442005e399886a04b4535e6147bf350d f7b364b097495570fbd8ff379b2c62
Hey Michael --
I really hope you read our Leader’s message.
Because if you did, you now know what you need to do.
Please donate before midnight to help us reach our $250,000 February fundraising goal.
Show your support for our Prime Minister!
2016 SUPPORTER RECORD
Supporter: Michael
Total donated this year: $0
By donating any amount you can afford right now, you can mark the new Liberal government's first 100 days of Real Change. A win for all Canadians!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc0790b4505275c76d77fa038989ac0636a474 600ed414b937a14b06bc7517f182b1 Give $5 ➜

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc076d882ce6c6e05e89c9a3793e445416eee2 1b19d87e2322e5e7539157eb8182f8 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc070824288f5e8acce7942f3277a2722783c3 cd4d2143ffc27021451c29f9f1b86e Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc07f358e40a8a911ea5e9882c28a2730ae8a1 ccf1fd6d7d79e5722d5424f2be720e www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET | February 11 & 12, 9 AM - 7 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2f11eb7930ebdc078e7106d9714f0c7923dcb569567a70db42 1611b298d5ce0fef731a152b8d409c Donate now ➜
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: See you in Winnipeg, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc194c4dde41c83223796ca83ee102559e399a 669c51ab6e5259dc2046db00efb26a
Hi Michael -- picture this:
You -- with Liberal leader Justin Trudeau, and MPs and Liberals from across Canada at the Biennial Convention -- this May.
Over the weekend you will discuss the future for our country, our party, the Canadian economy, real change for the middle class, and progress for our communities. We will set our sights on the months and years to come with an agenda that is demanding, optimistic and hopeful.
Michael, this is a not-to-be missed opportunity to determine the future success of our party. And I really want you to be in Winnipeg with us May 26 to 29.
The February 29 deadline to sign up and signal your intent to stand as a delegate is approaching quickly! As a delegate you will attend workshops and sessions that help shape our movement -- and hear from keynote speakers who will provoke and inspire. Hundreds of Canadians have already signed up. And hundreds more are doing the same, right now.
To make planning easier, we’ve set up a page to help you learn more about the convention, including important dates, how to participate as a delegate, registration information and discounts to help plan your travel and accommodation.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc19341fb965145a42cb38fcabcc20563d190d 2b43a6aea606c0c59c5396acff1d3e Read the FAQs ➜
We look forward to seeing you in Winnipeg!
Stephen Kukucha
General Secretary, Winnipeg 2016 - Liberal Biennial Convention
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc19b9568c4d6cedd90d63bf716f36b411888c 5459756c56541f22f85a9e97df49f0 Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc19e6f3ad5c8bf29ae28bf009c42332455b80 2e6048b66de6d01f4edaead71927ef Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc1981fd59c6ddd884dc3e3ac1d1777ba6da6f 2a9d03c4cb4ec27920afc859dcc88b Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc1981fd59c6ddd884dc3e3ac1d1777ba6da6f 2a9d03c4cb4ec27920afc859dcc88b Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b5d486c50dbdfc1957c6e141ae4b7bcaaabd1d57115043ecd0 3f59c9c617f9f657740efd543d0fe5 here to view our policy.

message.subject: MICHAEL – IMPORTANT DETAILS ↪
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc0514584968be8df6fc0c290c304fc2a4e9233d4b82b 665f00779d28f77d7a701856da9af9Real Change - Ready to Share - Feburary 2016
Promoting Security and Stability:
The Prime Minister has announced a new course to address crises in Iraq and Syria and the surrounding region and better capitalize on our uniquely Canadian areas of expertise.
Get the details, then add your name: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc051458 49626904d6639a60c19c216cddc7d9a38c37769bbb9dcf2beb0c66394a9252a7b70
Justin Trudeau: 'The people terrorized by ISIL everyday don't need our vengeance. They need our help.' Share: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc051458496e6c51525ed3be6dafb5663a067227ec84b 4fa9cb770fa7c581668eba1f9cb9e8
100 Days in Office, And many more to come!
Can you believe it’s already been 100 days since Justin Trudeau was sworn in as prime minister? So much has been done – which accomplishment makes you the most proud?
Tell us!: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc0514584961743894673a7ef4172066693 bf84364991bb26d36f267bc17cbd7e2e5165c3a7
2016 Biennial Convention
The dates are set! The 2016 Liberal Biennial Convention will take place from May 26 to 29 – in Winnipeg! What is it? How does it work? Want to attend? Who will be there? Get the answers here:
Everything you need to know: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc0514584965c9ff f5f8e12ed5bdc6420c2c43ce586b9b1920f1536fa6bb171637c1333cb5e
More Summer Jobs for Students, Promise Delivered!
It's simple math, really: Take the current Canada summer jobs program, add an additional $113 M in funding and what do you get?
Get the answer: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc051458496ce266fa32740028be1 0bed00475c9a34de211b67eaaf37678ed4581b451e0416
The Results are In!
38,000 Canadians took our budget survey. How many of them were named Justin? What did they say should be the government’s top focus?
Dive in: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc051458496c8ea373de3bec53ce457c3ebc 6e70a22196362c2ddc161aff505c0608b3475ca
The Team: Eva Nassif
Putting a face to a name:
A Lebanese Canadian, former nurse, teacher and certified translator, Eva Nassif now serves as the MP for Vimy, and sits as a member of the Standing Committee on the Status of Women.
Read her full story: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc05145849667cc97b637f6f 7920008c8a7085a8d3af3f56faf392f102ec5fd748422704215
Going to convention? Grab the Liberal gear you need to stand out in the crowd!
Liberal selfie sticks? Yep, we have them too: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd4 5cc0514584963916cdfbb0dbf77b7113e6382246fa0f25a0a960b9e7d347eea6ad412b7607b2
Thanks for all your support! http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fbd45cc051458496632ae48f834e77b144c6ff555958336f8e aff6f20b71ebff51d9e76618586874
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: They haven’t changed a bit
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1ea257e51a2c6716d1f0e663673d7cbdaca2 e657be4b21b6003a0e890e398e9d20
May 27, 2017.
I only just started at the LPC National Office this week, but I've already circled that date on my calendar, Michael.
Because that's the day the Conservative Party of Canada will select Stephen Harper's successor.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1eeb6ab0c17a07f0dc5e3fffb8c48100094d f47d35e1275b724dc6bbdfb688ffe8 It may seemfar away, but we have to be ready for whatever the next Conservative leader throws at us. Will you help fight back and make a donation now?
Despite their election defeat, it’s clear that the Conservatives haven’t changed. The negative attacks continue, and their divisive rhetoric has not let up.
No matter what they might say, this is still very much Stephen Harper's Conservative party.
One of my Conservative counterparts has even gone on record claiming that he thinks that whoever they select on May 27, 2017, will be Canada's next prime minister.
We can't let that happen, Michael.
Justin Trudeau has an ambitious, positive plan for our country that supports the middle class, invests in jobs and growth, and brings Canadians together. We need you to have his back every step of the way.
Your early donation now will be put to work immediately, and will help stop the Conservatives from taking Canada backwards with their divisive and negative politics.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1e72b05ee41646d6782385cfbe1264ccf5be cc64fb4d81d204a16fe595dd8e97bc Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1e366f6b2fcb3705f3848366f46fe160811b 28bf2338242d86b8963743b7679a59 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1efd2c13fdb5a6fc5c7e3bc8e5c17783b6d3 ade7bc2edd7c258d3f17d00939f831 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1eb664ed7d9dd7079d9fc3f552d696412f7e 0be0a8e50dcee3c8ec43331879d080 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1efa5975d5702e1c535f69cdc0235775e2f9 4750daa6dc0366269778d6405ae9dd Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=2c86ea5821ddcb1e302386d317119d2f4ccc0743a645bf2822 40013a980b127702e5aeafcd38fbe0 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thanks for standing with us for the long haul, Michael.
Braeden Caley Senior Director of Communications, Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Conservative Bingo
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861faa1da88fab7ff383741ebce08009ae6177c 61d50c1031697a2e3eb48c3b158406
Contempt? Disrespect? Or just crossing out things that they don’t like?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa3fe7bcda9634d4db8ef2a118cd4594ee8c ecae857df3866f83019d124eba94ba
Michael, you’re looking at a bingo sheet that Conservative MP Kerry Doitte (and at least 3 other Conservative MPs!) played during question period this week.
It’s blatant disrespect for the concerns of millions of Canadians and Indigenous peoples, at a time when Canadians are counting on our MPs to be hard at work on their priorities.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa9553c645e1ad61008107d0ede013a664e5 5b4ef3dbd2d53a5c39ea887d0f1453 Send a message to the Conservatives: Make a donation right now and show that you won’t tolerate their negative and divisive politics.
After ten years of Stephen Harper’s Conservatives, middle class Canadians are struggling.
Justin Trudeau and the new Liberal Government have a clear plan to get our economy moving again, by investing now in infrastructure, jobs, and growth.
Even Conservatives have recognized that their jackpot of disrespect crossed the line.
If you’re with us, chip in now and help support our inclusive, positive plan to grow the middle class.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa1cbf4b0e8455102612b262c67a9742aeac a7ae00145353d7d258c9e4e5d74bd0 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861faf808baff4318f76e839a010defa04cc5a2 3f3ff6cd99e0adf855b33234040528 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa279ac2bbc3815dfe35be73383eb1acd5a8 089a94f8c0aaaa379e55fe0216d7f3 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa49d3c297ef3543651b7a92405a543ecae8 c94831f8daae75403552105e26d7fe Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fae25f0d8f91903a65326645d77f70a52e06 fd3356526c86d716f6de6261ab0371 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=ab054abbe31861fa98096c31ebeed1463fe948cce77215c2c0 a2fe0b7a258a0cc5b5d9d4d377b3f6 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thanks, Michael, we're really counting on you.
Braeden Caley Senior Director of Communications, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Washington, D.C., Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0f9d9e5039d4a93538d5219a7d158f92cf18 ba016ed4f8a64916fcb9094c6cb292
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0f61fe85eaa1ff4a3b459ffee16b0bf218df 90450b55accfd0021e652bdf674d6b
Michael, in two weeks’ time Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will travel to Washington, D.C. to meet with President Barack Obama.
This historic occasion marks an important renewal of Canada's critical relationship with the United States – one that is so central to our plan to make the economy work for Canada’s middle class and those working hard to join it.
And Michael, you could be in Washington, D.C. at the same time!
That’s because the Liberal Party of Canada will be sending one lucky Canadian and their guest to Washington, D.C., airfare and hotel included, for two Canada2020 events: a March 9 reception, and a luncheon speech Justin Trudeau is giving March 11.
No donation is required and anyone can enter at Liberal.ca to be a part of it. However please know that your support is just as important now as it ever has been, and we're pushing hard to meet our fundraising targets.
If you believe in the kind of leadership Justin Trudeau is bringing to Ottawa -- and Washington -- I hope you will consider donating what you can today. After you give, follow the link to enter the promotion.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0fef3729fa499ec9d5312a7c2fb31f1e0713 d8a8ac84d9a29471c6e7a888ad1a35 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0f2936a1068b815ee4a689a47f1e78df2720 010e2011b90bbab6fd8d86a05bfe80 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0fe9d3bfd697cb7d13cabcc03dd8b05122b9 fc8941a027cd34f03f6d2770631364 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0fa403a1737bde963f87946da0ea3f0a2aec c2e1ecb5626b69f0bb2e14430fa9b0 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0f0aef07618f7c009b154e41663aa2071fd9 0af040319da8cd1ca70adb6dd4ecf1 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=638fca69adaa7a0f44116bbebba06ca2f41adc056af13f8973 c9efbbc472f429a5dc68909a0d2681 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe3127eba0fe373ca6939c7029c0334f903cddfd3b85ef3fda 4e0bae054b29ca4e340d219eed9657 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe3127eba0fe373c1a88d10a7d2a165b57ee91bc81039671eb cec9644c8faaa1242c7b8b22e00171 here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe3127eba0fe373c1a88d10a7d2a165b57ee91bc81039671eb cec9644c8faaa1242c7b8b22e00171 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fe3127eba0fe373cf2f0b66486ae126f1d28501621fca6d03e d546e2012ff56053757ecc65998b21 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

message.subject: Not since 1997
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=81e5fb6c4881f0be96a37e115d6ac9ab9b74db33e7db17bd22 2ba9f011aae61006075c415b8fe90f
The last time a US president hosted a Canadian prime minister at the White House was in 1997! It was Jean Chrétien!
On March 10, President Obama will be hosting Justin Trudeau – and that's great news for middle class jobs and growth here at home!
We want you to be in Washington, D.C. when history is made.
We're flying one lucky winner and a guest to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events while Justin Trudeau is in town. Hotel and airefare on us!
Want to be there?
Yes! I want to win: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=81e5fb6c4881f0bec20f9ad68bc64e 366bc53ccce99f46ef45a4b5644426ac7950343281571a8822

Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=734772895d7db326b7762dfa980f94fcc002a164bc6f21427d d50c5d8aaaecebc86c76205a322828 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=734772895d7db3266bc586c0fc4bf96a10415980893348b457 2f878e0dfb45a37cae0ef69a1842aa here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=734772895d7db326af9762c9483d089f9778d78967c754ed72 b5f31acf4228d6b2d9496d334aa3d3
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=734772895d7db3266bc586c0fc4bf96a10415980893348b457 2f878e0dfb45a37cae0ef69a1842aa click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=734772895d7db326b0b2a5efd876f5c375f5ab0c119b1d00b3 a6eb0094d672eff337994e92982226 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.

message.subject: Really O’Leary?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b483e3eff25440e8ed2f2a1eb1d2598d5caf0e07f70303d009 c54b12af89d56e553e0a98052331a1
You may have noticed a few reality TV stars have recently made their political debut.
Canada, it seems, has conservative Kevin O’Leary.
Here’s what the host of the US deal-making show “Shark Tank” had to say about Justin Trudeau.
“Trudeau won't last 4 years as PM” - Huffington Post, Feb 26, 2016
And on a new budget that invests in growing the middle class?
“I’m going to tear that budget to pieces” – CBC, Feb 26, 2016
Sigh.
Don’t let reality TV stars import dysfunctional, food-fight politics – or the same economic policies that failed Canada for 10 years.
Justin Trudeau is investing now to build a strong economy that works for the middle class over the long term.
Donate to show your support -- then enter to win.
I’m with PMJT→ http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b483e3eff25440e8f2ee6d90f0018ab07ee 2ff65a8fc80a6ea334288b89d09d026ef76586606c6df

The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b483e3eff25440e86d908d8d92e08fd8fdf3decabbeffdca95 24caf6655064447707e09c32190712 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b483e3eff25440e8311836b546725d9ac56b42f7f41c94652f c3b486eb655d15952739964b2bfa92 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

message.subject: my first thought, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3ca3ee6d47848ea2c2403af7a7da47459c3ab5aeab52fafeac 95ff68b6e12f59efb2ee72ece47f17
Michael --
Every day I wake up with one thought on my mind.
What can I do today to make life better for Canadians. And how will I get the job done before I go home at night.
That’s my goal. Invest now in jobs and growth for the long term. And make our economy work better for the middle class, and those working hard to join it.
That’s what March is going to be all about. From our First Ministers’ meeting on climate change action next week, to my trip to Washington, D.C. the week after, and finally in the budget we release on March 22, the key to each of these big events is that they will demonstrate how my top priority is to build an economy that is an engine for long term economic growth for the middle class.
That will be the theme this March, next March and every March until we face the voters in 2019.
I cannot stress enough -- Canadians are sick of band-aid solutions. They voted for real change on October 19, 2015, and they’re counting on us to get the job done modernizing the economy. Four years from now, they want to see the foundation rebuilt. Not the same cracks patched over and over. That was the Conservative approach and it failed.
Michael, we would never have this opportunity to help revitalize our economy without the energy, time, and generosity of thousands of Canadians like you.
I’m so thankful for everything you’ve done to make it possible. And I hope I’ve made you proud so far.
Because my promise to you is that I will work hard every day as my way of saying thank you for your support -- past, present and future.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

Hi, Michael – just checking in to see if you saw Justin Trudeau's email?
Every time I read a message from him, I’m reminded why I believe in what we’re doing.
If you also feel inspired, you should give right now so we can keep building this movement.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Justin Trudeau
Subject: My promise to Michael
Date: Sunday, Feb 28, 2016
Michael --
Every day I wake up with one thought on my mind.
What can I do today to make life better for Canadians. And how will I get the job done before I go home at night.
That’s my goal. Invest now in jobs and growth for the long term. And make our economy work better for the middle class, and those working hard to join it.
That’s what March is going to be all about. From our First Ministers’ meeting on climate change action next week, to my trip to Washington, D.C. the week after, and finally in the budget we release on March 22, the key to each of these big events is that they will demonstrate how my top priority is to build an economy that is an engine for long term economic growth for the middle class.
That will be the theme this March, next March and every March until we face the voters in 2019.
I cannot stress enough -- Canadians are sick of band-aid solutions. They voted for real change on October 19, 2015, and they’re counting on us to get the job done modernizing the economy. Four years from now, they want to see the foundation rebuilt. Not the same cracks patched over and over. That was the Conservative approach and it failed.
Michael, we would never have this opportunity to help revitalize our economy without the energy, time, and generosity of thousands of Canadians like you.
I’m so thankful for everything you’ve done to make it possible. And I hope I’ve made you proud so far.
Because my promise to you is that I will work hard every day as my way of saying thank you for your support -- past, present and future.
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. message.subject: Michael, you get a do-over
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925adcf25dea10626a5b416a112afd7af70b4 8fb3887c41af9d9e55d07310fe6bcb
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb29251dbd9f2f103bf025a929e8c88f68e56588 8e0c71f35c5511bb252f86cc4f102d
Michael --
Last night, I was reviewing our February fundraising numbers when it dawned on me -- it’s a leap year!
While,as of last night, we hadn’t met our February goal, today, we get a do-over: one more day to make it all the way, and I’m not leaving anything to chance.
Take a look at the same February balance sheet I was reviewing, andthen chip in to help us hit our goal before midnight, tonight, February 29. February 2016 Digital Fundraising
Target:$250,000 Amount Raised:$187,566 Still Needed:$62,434
You’re in a position to change those numbers, and ensure the Liberal Party of Canada has the resources to keep electing Liberals who share our vision of investing now in jobs and growth to make our economy work for the middle class over the long term.
Oh, and after you give, enter the promotion for the chance to win a trip to Washington, D.C. for you and a guest to attend two Canada2020 events (hotel and airfare on us!)
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925a746027159d3988b33151ec6db06791191 d3c955da9f243cd531f32e4a2f1c41 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925ddb4d98c403cf6ef8bcbde256708cc8ee5 d17336ce6531c298a7aba313ef57ab Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925c768017dcf1b0e7f411b29e54726413bc1 ec3ee9e23d7957968479eee6cee72d Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb29256d0bf3c49fa0b8a3983dadd74e54816d92 142862f25c5363ffaa84a019976d29 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925fdcc96769b30f9c0c6c1f5e47644cc681f 0b94439b96c31d2cbf0f9959cef9fb Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925f203c70e82ebe51d42c4cd4e1a02f881be 03ee4c4da082c5c735806c12550ea2 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb292571987ab9cbe12bf8060855219e9dab1655 daf9eb9a2c7bdf1c1ac094002a3723 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925a647010f6b1fbe108734be29bb690b0676 6cfeb323fc740f718924cc5bc238c8 here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925a647010f6b1fbe108734be29bb690b0676 6cfeb323fc740f718924cc5bc238c8 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f2513ab557fb2925ddc729ddc35838f220a43d832ccc4f9149 e7f72adf28556f7587d744f39c8d7f click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

message.subject: Lunch? Sightseeing? You pick, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0441d5dbc502b6d5b5c9d15c45e1ea09a36786ec9eecabc2ea 1927cb9c36dde1a664d523c0e71bf8
Hey Michael.It's Anna Gainey, President of the Liberal Party of Canada.
Next week I’ll be in Washington, D.C. to attend the events hosted by Canada2020-- so if you and your guest win our promotion, let’s meet up!
But you can’t win, if you don’t enter.
So donate now to help us hit our February fundraising target -- then enter to win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events -- and we’ll hang out while you’re there!

“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0441d5dbc502b6d5da6ba2e94947d9bc54bb27b9808cfeb3d6 1804fcb3c6187379112e49e8b8bbf4 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0441d5dbc502b6d544ad3be1365cf370f2b6b43cf3f3b04f08 6a9a81ac39a59cd7d23f74c7def671 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion.
