The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. message.subject: Hey, Michael – question:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=35966df5dac5de5ea1751c3631019feeb11c3b35d842411e4ff c457985c3d5202f514eaf4d693622a348a9e322ee9cbdd7f1994e607de0f907da326bcce902fc68311209 8416ae07
How do you know Canada is back?
Because this guy is representing us positively on the world stage -- including in Washington D.C. next week.
You could also win a trip to Washington D.C. for two exciting Canada2020 events next week while Justin Trudeau is in town.
But you have less than 48 hours to enter! (Alert bar)
Donate -- then enter to win:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa089402c93495329e8f6b3532edd3c33100f504ce 4238ede20d7342ebc60ece15f5f242
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa089402f21cf1b362edc77592bb55240fcbad50b2 db9364eec35c40b974f954ee541ede Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa0894027e914c7991924bfc85e0b45eb29a915403 521ae461f72b1f0f2df3aff2b22a87 www.liberal.ca/donate
Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa0894028ee0cffe19b9d00224a6c43b6dc28d23e1 8b5ae44bfdc2ec2c46b69eb2e9c85e Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa089402c777070366e8d2a74869dfe5d16c62e2a6 606ae7d07137f8563f1abc813e0fcf here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa089402c777070366e8d2a74869dfe5d16c62e2a6 606ae7d07137f8563f1abc813e0fcf click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=bdf403e6aa089402257784dced3287ba16fc2aa28c19e291da a99ed98a7058c28f5f4e79ab73a7cb click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

message.subject: ☎ Talk to us, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4b9d50d98b4ecdc1fa7cda25987f671a69a3e692ef6ceec6eae 8e5049ad6b6ab2db798bd43c1f10fe8a2c76390b6240fd2d3f642c43774e10ee53c9cdd9e2acd9091428f 66659ef9
Are you a woman interested in learning more about politics?
Is your partner, daughter, sister or mother interested in getting involved?
This International Women’s Day, March 8, Liberal women -- MPs, staff and senior volunteers who work in politics -- will be gathered at LPC Headquarters after work to make phone calls to you, or that person you know.
They’ll be answering questions from Canadian women who want to know what it’s like to work in politics, what they wish they knew before they started, and how to take the next step.
If that sounds like an exciting conversation that you (or a woman you know) would like to have, sign up now or forward this email to a friend or family member who might be interested. We’re hoping to make 500 phone calls throughout the evening and yours could be one of them.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=41a3ecc7699025124452a8ffd0fec593fc2b1ee41599267a0e 6a2c273f5e5f76aec9d5b374e73c21 Yes - I want a call ➜
The Canadian women currently working in politics have accomplished some great things, especially in the Liberal Party of Canada.
>From a gender-neutral cabinet to the roles being played by our 88 women MPs we’re helping to break down barriers for Canadian women.
But there is so much left to do -- and I hope the conversations we have on March 8 will inspire the Canadian women we speak with to step forward, and become the next wave of women to fight for real change.
Talk to you March 8!
Anita Vandenbeld
MP, Ottawa West—Nepean
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: • We’re neighbours, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=64cd3eae6df66683a7411ac2ddd9d38fd8075261f81cd96953a b3d988e72071bf96f774d231f5c88bb09c3e09871461f362e3a8c05f939a4c3db8113620b9e0539cc971e df12066e
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd149d803873946ad082b3eec250b9fa6c20 ca7832ba7892d7e531ef67b6ac2c93
19 years, Michael --
The last time a Canadian Prime Minister was invited to the White House, it was 1997. Jean Chrétien was Prime Minister. Bill Clinton was President. And the relationship between Canada and America was strong.
That was no accident. President Clinton and Prime Minister Chrétien both understood that strong Canada-US relations are good for the economy.
That’s why it’s so positive that President Obama has invited Justin Trudeau to Washington, D.C. next week.
After ten years of bluster and neglect from the Conservatives, this is our chance to renew our relationship with the United States to make the economy work for Canada’s middle class and those who are working hard to join it.
It’s also a reminder that what happened on October 19 won’t happen again without your donation.
The Liberal Party of Canada is 100% funded by Canadians like you.And without your support today, we risk our ability to fight and win the next campaign. Only you can change that.
So donate what you can -- and after you give, enter to win a trip to Washington, D.C for two Canada2020 events.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd2dd6ec7861f5f4a63f3f0844454f5848ee 62072cf37291379bd7768d7b749207 Give $5 ➜

http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=10545730c00f8d65610f3d8c294152155eb3d735ca061e93b1 68135c25411d125567787a0fc3cd2b Give $200 ➜

Thank you,
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd438bd1348092a4d6a51252c0460df8922c e8cdac0c1a506d975136359b15ad43 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd1eee3df6f64160e5302eeefa3a2d15465f a5fb3f5672deea77aefddf2a497054 here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd1eee3df6f64160e5302eeefa3a2d15465f a5fb3f5672deea77aefddf2a497054 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6fe8f02cc999fadd412762ec857c3210cb70bc24dd027905ba 292b33bdab3c00f1c27f40bdfdefec click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

message.subject: Michael, where will you go?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=785071e67ba70d51065a4b62f1ed5ab3d094d277a1fccbbeb98 554141663159c4af14dbc3203f1b078af36f741c7691d01e0bd6089a451d940bd81c386e17c681fc458fd f1ab496d
We’ll put you on an airplane, and fly you to Washington, D.C.!
Tickets, Airfare, Accommodation, are all on us.
Where will you go?
The Capitol Building?
The National Mall?
No matter what sights you see, make sure that you save time to attend Justin Trudeau's speech!
He’ll be talking about how the Canada-US relationship helps our economy grow and work better for the middle class
If this sounds like the trip for you, make a donation
THEN ENTER TO WIN ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4f1be0caa9e28dd22ddd9d90cbc4c796e58cc77af1373d9655 c59a18a6ba48635d1c78554638705d

“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. message.subject: Update your 2016 record!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=7bf0f396cd21f809da879060d5b08ff2aee7746987bf0c3cd7a ddb6dc634dad98b74dc48e68ea0be5cf625efcbb1470b7272172e54fd2aec6ba4ccad9169552395fe2e73 d1aaea8d
Michael --
Midnight is coming fast, and so many Canadians are rallying together right now to show their support in this fundraising campaign.
Here’s the gap we’re hoping to close by midnight tonight, but if we’re going to make it, I need your help:
Tonight’s Fundraising Goal Target:$25,000 Amount Raised:$13,XXX Still Needed:$12,XXX
After you give, enter to win a trip to Washington, D.C for two great Canada2020 events.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cfb3ddcb7126e0936591115073ebfd16cf10b87aee0d81091b 53ae545d3c1f424abf8a91c07ebd3a
Thank you for working hard to keep our party strong in 2016. Remember, the Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by the generosity of grassroots donors like you!
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cfb3ddcb7126e0930b5f01191e135ea5ee966e61e66c60bbc9 8ebc2b34f611071a6d366eec958478 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cfb3ddcb7126e093f4155f088bdfda4a4d372d700c33dead29 adecd24e7c94db6df357368f71a861 here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cfb3ddcb7126e093f4155f088bdfda4a4d372d700c33dead29 adecd24e7c94db6df357368f71a861 click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cfb3ddcb7126e093fef6e58952c4cfbe60508de16d133152b5 609fedf3209268b2ad73fa833fd6e8 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.

from.name: Anna Gainey (On behalf of Justin Trudeau)

message.subject: A special thank you
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=220ce14a883c8a5e840f5a6b44e560f9169792818f5589de7a4 edd466463327362a1ca6b386210407ea0892e07fd59967d139520ba1c8904927f506617eed4fec5b2cd50 aefa6a5b
Michael -- I got this note from Justin Trudeau this morning with a big thanks to you!
Have a look.
Hi Anna -- in case we don’t have a chance to talk before my trip to D.C. next week, wanted to drop you a quick line. I heard from Christina that thousands of Canadians have chipped in as part of this fundraising campaign. I’m so grateful! Please pass on my heartfelt thanks to each and every one of our supporters, donors and volunteers.
This special invitation -- the first of its kind from the White House in 19 years -- belongs to every single Canadian who has supported real change – and I want them to know how much I appreciate their ongoing support!
J
Michael, you could be in Washington next week too. With me -- sightseeing or grabbing lunch, and most importantly attending two Canada 2020 events. But you have less than 12 hours to enter!
Donate what you can-- and after you give, enter to win a trip to Washington, D.C.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74362b733512c8aaed27c57da01ce1126866ade68231cfee17 fa43152e34f0c000786f13e6c58732 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74362b733512c8aa11ad2bb76131fbc123dfe4e7bedc8a9254 44a706e16910e9d0e69afbbd87ef91 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74362b733512c8aa46aa9a961b0374c7a40c451553d2faaf80 be9971871faf5bd3ceedf9411fad9d Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74362b733512c8aae7b65dc3761c09ab23ffa6872a20adc46e c8d0184659cbc4130d350915b72b96 Give $100 ➜

“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=74362b733512c8aa1eb644ffa1f320226f444e1bdf2435a057 4547e43f1aa9c7c049d63a9e3002b8 go here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. message.subject: ⚠️ Deadline
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=3904e021664e40cce3097421c1dca5ea7b59642f7439e75bfb0 910af393e96fb214fb3779bcdc42695f3e7fbba33c263b8095fcfad688b06855aa11626e9b69b43d19cae 017bb963
Time is running out to win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
But your promotion status is still:
PENDING
We won’t remind you again -- this is your last chance to enter: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c35fb3fc4190eb 88d1da2d80262a1cd656e3ce2d857ca184f8221131afa9622e1ac21dcc6c54388
Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events
- Promotion is open to all Canadians and ends March 3, 2016. - http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c35fb3fc4190eb8cd53cd71cd95d0e4a16c552ba0515e49f2 b80402f71670278b6e797f7c5a2c44 Make a donation here and then enter - You can also enter http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c35fb3fc4190eb865152c601b7d62e965e164edbbdd29905a 7686b5a618dbc829d2dddf6f6dfa9f here without making a contribution - See terms & conditions below.
“The “Win a trip to Washington, D.C. for two Canada2020 events” Promotion– Summary of Promotion Rules: No purchase, payment, or contribution necessary to enter or win. Contributing to the Liberal Party of Canada (“LPC”) will not increase chances of winning. The promotion begins on 12:00 am Eastern Time February 24, 2016 and closes on 11:59 pm Pacific Time March 3, 2016, and no entries submitted after that date will be accepted. One (1) winner will receive the following prize package: Two (2) tickets to attend a March 9 Canada2020 reception and two (2) tickets to attend a March 11 Canada2020 luncheon speech by Justin Trudeau in Washington, D.C., round trip transportation or airline tickets for winner and winner’s guest from a single major international airport within Canada to Washington, D.C., and up to four (4) nights hotel accommodation at an approximate total value of up to CDN$5,000 for the Trip. The Promotion Organizer will also determine, in its sole discretion, the date, location, duration, attendees, and all other relevant details of the Trip. To enter the promotion, complete and submit this online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Entrance into this promotion constitutes permission for the LPC to use the participants’ names, cities and provinces/territories of residence and likenesses for purposes of advertising and publicity in any and all media now or hereafter known throughout the world in perpetuity, without further compensation, notification, or permission, unless prohibited by law. Odds of winning the Prize are dependent on the total number of entries to the promotion.
The Potential Winner will be selected by draw by an employee of the LPC at noon Eastern Time March 4, 2016, in Ottawa, Ontario, and must correctly answer a skill- testing question in order to be declared the Winner. This promotion is open to all Canadian citizens and permanent residents currently living in Canada who have reached the age of majority in their respective province/territory, and who are eligible for travel to the United States, as of the date the promotion closes, and for the duration of the Trip. The Winner and the Winner’s guest are responsible for ensuring all eligibility requirements for U.S. travel are met, including, but not limited to, possession of a valid passport, or permanent resident card, adequate travel, health or life insurance and related costs for all of the above. The promotion is not open to: officers and employees of The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, including its provincial/territorial associations; and their immediate family members. This promotion is void where prohibited. To enter the Promotion, http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c35fb3fc4190eb865152c601b7d62e965e164edbbdd29905a 7686b5a618dbc829d2dddf6f6dfa9f click here and complete and submit an online entry before the Promotion Closing Date. Please http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c35fb3fc4190eb84f1f798b42f7d3d6607c600b1bc208afd1 ba82c8cad9d877b3cd614368cf5be2 click here to read the detailed Promotion Rules, which participants must agree to in order to participate in the promotion. Promotion Organizer: The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada as chief agent for the LPC, 920 - 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8.
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Michael: say you support the new, Canada-wide Climate Change Action Plan
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=417a0774e69ef8a0ce5aa0a968d5b10a2f6d6da7ed33bacd384 a0746ca186a67490c76c17fe11d99655080135fc7d7f3c76a4728285dad2b005d3505878151c0f2fe14c8 b1eb8cd0
Justin Trudeau and Canada's Premiers have a new plan to promote
CLEAN GROWTH and PROTECT OUR ENVIRONMENT
We need to work together to fight climate change and grow our economy.
Are you in?
Yes! I’m in to fight climate change: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=fda66fe28e638 fa407a18832af259cc519d554ea2e7a18a943ccf44bc25305d54f61d0dd852fc5d8

message.subject: I’m looking very forward to this:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b441212e798872998b3fb4310f4c2f4038cb5cbcce47f08375e 5300a153eed563ead165b2cec9c95259fef26c53117fefcba4c3038e18e55d6b365a79caaa540e43a1e41 e67910a7
Michael -- for me, one of the most important days of the year is International Women’s Day.
It's a day whose symbolism should be celebrated every day!
In my work with women and girls, I have seen first-hand that the world becomes a better and stronger place when we see women succeed. As a mother, I also firmly believe this to be true. And I’m incredibly proud to live in a country that is being upheld as a model for gender parity in our cabinet, around the world. But as much as we have achieved, as far as we’ve come, we have much farther to go.
That’s why this year I’m looking forward to our International Women’s Day campaign, so very much.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=de202bc01c6215cdf7f04385e0531d84e6076f2a1c6d20ffd9 a6508d611c5b73cf17c0700d3bc330 We have something incredibly special planned -- and I’m inviting you to be a part of it. On March 8, Liberal women -- MPs, staff and senior volunteers who work in politics -- will be gathered at LPC Headquarters after work to make phone calls to anyone who wants to know what it’s like to be a woman working in politics today, how to get involved, and how to take the next step.
If this sounds like an exciting conversation that you (or a woman you know) would like to have, please sign up now or forward this email to a friend or family member who might be interested.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=de202bc01c6215cdf7f04385e0531d84e6076f2a1c6d20ffd9 a6508d611c5b73cf17c0700d3bc330 Yes - I want a call ➜
As we celebrate the contributions and accomplishments of the women and girls in our lives, I hope you will join me in also looking at what’s ahead. The next barriers we will break, our goals, and the work it takes to achieve those goals. We’re helping to build a better country -- by getting even more women involved in our political process.
With gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Your first job in politics, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=eaf4c09e1bc9d0b0f6d849bd8a557f5a5e1f3624a2cd7d22d09 8559df4518ad2fb298009b65fc3571f655e79a27ccf085a29880d4036ae48d9e80eee106105bdd3115876 0ec41d2f
Michael --
I still remember my first job on Parliament Hill.
It was with former York Centre Member of Parliament Ken Dryden and it helped shape the person I am today.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=be6fd28c1efac5c1ef8ca18a16c64c4ad3269816f7dad02e3f f1d0a1ae910783559b9d68eaebd26e That’s why I’m so excited to announce the 2016 Summer Leadership Program, a summer job initiative that will offer a number of Canadians of all ages the same kind of experience I had.
If it seems like we’re opening up political Ottawa to offer this opportunity as widely as possible, don’t be surprised -- that’s exactly what we’re doing.
Your Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has made a personal commitment to bring new leadership and a new tone to Ottawa, and, this summer, that new leadership could be yours.
And that means looking for a diverse set of Canadians from coast-to-coast-to-coast to come join our team this summer as members of our Summer Leadership Program.
As a paid, full-time participant in Ottawa over the summer, you will join the same hard-working, passionate, innovative, collaborative, and data-driven team giving it all they’ve got to bring Real Change to Canada.
Whether it’s working with our Liberal team on Parliament Hill, or joining the team at LPC HQ, or one of our provincial offices, your fresh, innovative ideas will help us shape the foundations of the hard work of what comes next.
We can’t wait to have you as a member of our team!
Apply now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=be6fd28c1efac5c1ef8ca18a16c64c4ad326981 6f7dad02e3ff1d0a1ae910783559b9d68eaebd26e
Thank you,
Anna Gainey President
Liberal Party Of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: It may be 2016 but…
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=75404f9f4a0b4a0859a20720bc480d9d3504de612851414da02 a382603d3ec59963a78d6d6916ca89b6e9a504dca53a13172a7fd3a0c7e347eed7cffdbe2cec9e120653c bf345598Real Change - Ready to Share - March 2016
It may be 2016 but it's important to remember we still have further to go to reach gender parity - here in Canada and around the world.
Let’s get started, right now. This International Women's day, be part of the conversation: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e84e94cd948a5d6ca0bbed15944ec1a51d1b 8adadeee0f9e072882852f88c9cb4743f0c78bbed009
Climate Change Action Plan
For the first time ever, we have a Canada-wide climate change action plan to create jobs, develop clean technologies and reduce carbon emissions.
Now is the time to work together.
Ready to do your part? Add your name now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e84e94cd 948a5d6ce53466824f687c44e39a9b2d7ea748205dfd30f800430dfe041baa456317dbf6
'@JustinTrudeau will be the first Prime Minister in history to attend #PrideTO!‬' Retweet it: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b28911f9f027f771c55eed1 d1d13d275b1807d5b208003ad3ccb29f128ef746a6
Justin Trudeau on 60 Minutes
Ahead of this week's historic state visit to the U.S., Justin Trudeau sat down with CBS's 60 minutes to talk about his plan as Prime Minister, and what comes next for Canada. Watch now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7be3c98fa62cde098 4aa87fd9988f460adc74646a0c5e2fae4d4ddeb8e34decff3
'Welcome Home'
Since November over 25,000 Syrian refugees have been welcomed to Canada after they were forced to flee their homeland.
Share and show your support: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7bb236d 03b50bb175cc7dc2801cd584e29837612c6db9f2a7a3d2317dc4999ef3c
Made a donation in 2015 and have questions about your tax receipt? Check out our FAQ: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b154a7be9d6042e2f8c953ebaa1a6ba0f3b db2df239c18c1457e7bf4e0f6d65d8
2016 Summer Leadership Program
We're looking for a diverse set of young Canadians from coast-to-coast-to-coast to come join our team as members of our Summer Leadership Program.
Are you one of them? Apply now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7bdb b4b21ee41bfe22602c855809fd6ee1c9332364d7f20ab608083007ecaa41ae
A Canadian is a Canadian...
… is a Canadian. The conservatives created two classes of Citizenship. We've moved the repeal that, and other unfair sections of Bill C-24. Share this now: http://click .action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7bc1a47111406d5214f837f9164065660114478d83912f81 412d041fcc7080132c
Convention UPDATE
Accommodation information and discounts are now available. If you’re heading to convention, check them out!
Book now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b5a35bca0a159a38948cdf352 00dc51e77582f67f231794d15762f6fd63a7fbdf
Thanks for all your support! http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b59091d3087d30a832ef19339aced7383e5 1b2f680c0786d09e7121f8fa01bf1b
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b73ca40331237ccf8f735a56978749b3e77 f5add27642c8a0bf14ed898d2c44c6 Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7bc1ccc5c43e161f4f4d74c43085d6c83e48 9d97f8e0efdc7c37a0b27e5ed32a15 Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9cd1d86ceb8b02ebfbf8c6b4c8192a9da0b934a241943724bd68abcfcb4d2a14d1 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9cd1d86ceb8b02ebfbf8c6b4c8192a9da0b934a241943724bd68abcfcb4d2a14d1 Unsubscribe
Email updates like this one are the most effective way for us to keep in touch.
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=191fec7c1e3ffb7b4b38fe8b22e19f20648a84aed3bd8fb893 8ce5be4bd5ad9e3b443aaac7cb9365 here to view our policy.

message.subject: Look who was making calls last night!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f3145af9ca1e3666b16df4f0e47c906ace95463c349d5b4dd04 c9b6bb51b316a04bf81bc8e143e5d87f20880157770e25e7ffe590afa9757dbee1bafcd38911593c39bc9 c6fc1ca1
Yes – we did it!
With your incredible support and participation our International Women’s Day Phone Bank reached Canadian women from coast to coast to coast.
Women who are ready to be part of the next wave of real change!
Sophie made calls last night
So did many Liberal MPs and staff!
Alongside over 40 MPs, LPC Senior Staff and volunteers who made made over 25.5 hours worth of calls!
Inspiring and empowering a #PledgeforParity among women in politics.
Average call --> almost 5 mins Longest call --> 30 mins
It’s 2016 and our work for real change is just getting started. Want even more events that put you at centre of our political process? Give now to help make it happen!
Donate now:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d433736256a2e1cb55609fc91ae7a8974e4e007bf641714f78 6e471e75347f3c90e95702d9b107bd

Justin Trudeau said it.
Then thousands of Canadians voted for it!
Get yours now!

Better is always possible!

message.subject: Investing now to help middle class families
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=39f3a0f94f78c8c64dd1c785352b440ec27f658a0a5d1c36a14 7d467e3cd5500dd4100f6dc947fc0bb8390b040a0ab5db47202f999d44a2cea7df5c5956f663e9dc7fe4c 20b8d544Budget 2016: Justin Trudeau and his team just introduced the Liberal plan to help middle class families
Budget 2016 invests now to revitalize and grow our economy for the long-term.
That means more money to help middle class families raise their children.
And investment in roads, bridges, and transit to get you home faster.
Let's build a better future together.
Learn about the plan, then add your name to show your support.
Let’s go: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=07187077879b200769f09b1a290803c8a7e4e929 78e5b9786876cc8d252f69daa6cbed985825c155

message.subject: Waiting on you, Michael
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=35c0d23a40f6eeea6c027b13736bb5eb6c034ba5028cf77950f b76c15b3d034f3b2c4146ff384d5afaf746e23120ff101c8b1b9ee6ea1a48b583002e70b9ce59315a9ff3 6536a49a
Yesterday, Justin Trudeau and Bill Morneau introduced their first Liberal budget.
Here’s what's in it:
Help for the middle class and to grow our economy: A new, fairer, tax-free Canada Child Benefit, and historic investments in infrastructure and innovation
Historic investments in infrastructure: More than $120 billion in public transit, green infrastructure and social infrastructure over 10 years.
Help for young Canadians: Canada Student Grant amounts are being increased by 50%, and graduates won’t have to start paying back student loans until they make at least $25,000 annually. Budget 2016 investments will also create 35,000 new youth jobs each year.
A better future for Indigenous peoples: Investments in education, infrastructure, training to help to secure a better quality of life.
A clean growth economy: Strategic investments in clean technology and concrete steps to address the causes and effects of climate change.
An inclusive and fair Canada: The investments to help to extend opportunities to more Canadians, to help build a healthier, more creative, more generous and more just Canada.
Canadians like you -- from every part of the country -- are chipping in to help hit our party’s biggest fundraising deadline of the year: the end of Q1. But we noticed your donor status for this fundraising drive is still pending
Help our party keep doing its important work -- pledge your support now! And if you donate $100 or more (just $25 after your 2016 tax credit) you’ll get our new, limited edition “Better is always possible” spring T-shirt!
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: 🎥 WATCH: How Budget 2016 will grow the middle class
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=19dea3283e316972e028fc43a52edbb79c6328acba2a3a2ab0d 90f4f30230df6f63a5adca25e3594690554077a15f4c943b9cc4ee70eb29d15f0d56b800b14edce7ab29b 6db5a9a5
Budget 2016 is an ambitious, long-term plan to strengthen the heart of Canada’s economy: The middle class.
Here's how it works.
Watch now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=379f232fd77e5873f4dd8c5ad155f2d2cfedd76 843b6de1137b82439e429dc607c30e89d8d272b76

message.subject: Michael, will you be one?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=cead1251dc37d08b9280778a8b9e395bdd1e5cb0ede8621012a 0e2766db50c20593fdbe82397846f734473e0b003c9609b7c1f6d7f96e222995d2e1e60cb8498be38f16e 2c6e2c2a
⚠️ Q1 Fundraising deadline is in just 3 days!
Only YOU can move the dial!
The generosity of thousands of Canadians helped us outraise the Conservatives at the end of 2015.
Chip in now, and let’s do it again!
If you donate $100 or more - just $25 after your 2016 tax credit - and we’ll send you this limited edition T-shirt!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately. Only donations of $100 or more will receive a t-shirt.

message.subject: FW: t-shirt campaign
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=1974b3849b8471ff6bec8abf2373079872fabf6c118a8a24fd0 3780528d891abe555088ced89a3c9be3f3b4e52e02a03134d9f30ed123580ac92a1f5b70943a2cf94c5b5 a0c4d659
Michael --
You might not realize it, but Justin Trudeau follows these email fundraising campaigns closely.
So it wasn’t a surprise to wake up this morning to a note from him, one I just had to pass on…
"Hey CT - Are we closing in on the Q1 email fundraising goal? Please pass on my sincere gratitude to everyone chipping in to the campaign!
J
PS. Make sure to save me one of those T-shirts!"
If you are like Justin Trudeau and want to get your own limited-edition “Better is always possible” spring t-shirt, then you need to donate $100 or more (just $25 after your 2016 tax credit).
And with just 16 hours left before midnight, we’ve all got to pitch in to hit our Q1 fundraising goal, and I know the Conservatives and NDP are already pushing hard to rally their donors today.
Michael, it’s time to join the thousands who have donated $3,XXX,XXXX in Q1 2016 -- let’s make sure to surpass our Q1 2015 total of $3.8M by midnight.
Any donation -- even $3 -- will help. Donate now and I hope you’ll give enough to get our new spring t-shirt!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aacba2b7e8a6c86cceb35b8e4a664108e4ecf 364cfa738270e8f5f1c53f31bd86c8 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aaccce8b7e1a4c8c1a0ec9b211b6a10dbfbca e09ed38bccf70817eac88fa61a2703 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aac765978370b77d96bba24f16e3fd668e792 8f0cb3d6ad992455b316dca92ef150 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aac49c28ecc47fec65e4af1753c43c7c34ee6 2b877ddd6d0c263e01427dcc4a3105 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aacfafa3f26cac416368d4c3c81c7fb0c307a c3c1e84f891437daf7e950757d21bd Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=6c1e2978e2217aacf90f5751affa096bb441698b4602122f92 919050b68af5ccff5c315baefc1648 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Interim National Director Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

Justin Trudeau said it.
Then thousands of Canadians voted for it!
Get yours now!
Donate $100 or more, and we’ll send you this limited edition T-shirt!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately. Only donations of $100 or more will receive a T‑shirt.

message.subject: Michael: We just need you + a few more
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=af813a1218474f6fd622094885d23a344ea30ac6a7535bdbd1e f12e52976cd2a67023dc5a419a7b11cf59a663a7417873579a13a2e44c73cea4365e65ed7376c1bfc5599 0af9451a
Over 29,000 Canadians from across the country have chipped in to help us reach our Q1 Fundraising goal.
We’re not quite there yet!
But if we get another 25 donations from Nova Scotia before midnight, and we'll get there for sure!
Yes! I'll help!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=df7edd78a698587ce6ec5ccb0781c77de2348ce6414cf60b6b e000f3edc95dc6c853c00f583e2ce4 Give $5 ➜

We think this t-shirt will look great on you!
Justin Trudeau said it.
Then thousands of Canadians voted for it!
Get yours now!
Donate $100 or more, and we’ll send you this limited edition T-shirt!
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately. Only donations of $100 or more will receive a T‑shirt.

message.subject: After a long winter, it’s time for some sunny ways
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5066c8f79e776684d870f87929d0f431ca864ea95677276668c 790ab103685be441b841c67f1a841d29db3bf1bd733244848b290ebec8dfcd956618b57d60c5b397adac7 f520441f Real Change - Ready to Share - April 2016
Building our Communities, and growing the middle class!
Let’s get Canada moving! Budget 2016 begins investing more than $120 billion in infrastructure over 10 years to help create jobs, and grow the economy.
That means investing in roads, bridges, and transit so you can get home faster. Read all about it: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c5c1d2e83b043b2b7dd7b26340d88f5ec9ad 9ca50c8223bd94a9f8023e685ace61ce956c227635e2
1party.ca: We’re working on making the Liberal Party of Canada more open and innovative than ever before – a movement where everyone can participate. Learn more here: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c5c1d2e83b043b2b8aa4c0f8094e3b9dba4aa5108736 cc591bc46c02f941b56596097121a8d89010
Convention Update! It’s really soon!
Join us in Winnipeg this May 26-28 for the biggest Liberal even of the year!
Spaces are going fast, so sign up to become a delegate while you still can: http://cl ick.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fd14bd9bc3a12cdc4b29a7fcadf412b1b60a5e74c91bf f77017a7825045f9bf829
“Many of you know, I am a feminist”
In March Justin Trudeau was recognized by Catalyst for his leadership in advancing diversity and gender equality. Watch and read: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e 15abbf01979fd836313912d5a61cdca08902b19c1da995de371924a0ccb4377f588765eb549f0
A New Era in Canada-US Relations
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and President Barack Obama are working together to strengthen the relationship between our two countries.
Canada is indeed back: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fd3908a4e442b 0b5c7c87e93ef9bca1f7b37c59465c2d2fe3ab312789bde5c169c
@JustinTrudeau: “No community should be under a long-term boil water advisory. #Budget2016 invests $1.8B to bring clean water to Indigenous communities.” Retweet it: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fda2011e7defec3613aa479c1cbc3d64 768e5ef1c94d1da449aee419613d27ec74
A Long-Term Plan to revitalize the economy.
In a rush, but still want to know how Budget 2016 works? We put together this handy video that lays out how Budget 2016 invests now to help middle class families. Watch and share: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fd57d7f0e0e7bb7b8a002131b 56837949bd3a8ebcc93c3e9403fe250e54f4b1ac7
The Team: Hedy Fry
Dr. Hedy Fry has been serving the people of Vancouver Center for 23 years – that makes her the longest serving female MP. An incredible milestone! Say congrats Hedy: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fda7520896185524ff831d2519c509eb2753 60bfeb0d0e2d6900f6b34f56613616
Spring is here!
Going Hiking? Running? Maybe heading to the beach? Stay hydrated with this cool Liberal branded sport bottle! Grab yours here: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fdd46c3d63c46fb7947 8c51c9b33db3672108adb08363785ef9d2389d62f0fa81d
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fd26442e80a3deb03585098eb8efa8f65d15 db323440ca8e65e003bf7f8b1a7d99 Donate ➜
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fdefed41bbb457ecdb37aad224f9be869256 f30ce40d6ca93b8079405c9a9ef6b8 Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=93e15abbf01979fd23c8cb749e92e0a9ffeec9edf48b0b0c08 8dc0d36778051b8be512539cc91600 Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9c576c80dafa541b0c5ee989415706eadbc9c76d2ef0d21573299c6e9045d1c2030990 f4ba9c655672 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9c576c80dafa541b0c5ee989415706eadbc9c76d2ef0d21573299c6e9045d1c2030990 f4ba9c655672 Unsubscribe

message.subject: FIRST LOOK: A new Liberal constitution
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b189a4b1579a6b69a8b99f2b1de080fbf9fc508c1c4c0b30585 e6269cf600972a46fef315d3571dc1da16f662288c54f1a3d6a72a85155050be3c619d103d2da6f1bc231 42670d0f
Michael --
Earlier this year, I invited you to imagine building a Liberal movement that is more open, unified, innovative, and engaging than ever before.
I asked us to be courageous in how we move our party and our country forward, and to show once again that the Liberal Party of Canada is not afraid to challenge the status quo – even if it means breaking with some of our own traditions.
I am deeply impressed by the breadth of ideas that you offered in response.
After remarkable hard work and engagement by LPC President Anna Gainey, your LPC Constitutional Advisers and working group, and your representatives from every province, territory, and Commission on the National Board, I am proud to be able to share our proposed new Liberal constitution.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b8468b288ed95c50cc07586751674679a259 83c0ef3743ea3a9eb18e7b76632a48
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b8468b288ed95c50cc07586751674679a259 83c0ef3743ea3a9eb18e7b76632a48 First look: Our proposed new Liberal constitution ➜
Our Winnipeg biennial convention this May represents a once-in-a-generation opportunity to modernize and strengthen our movement for the 21st century.
At a time when Conservatives are raising barriers to Canadians’ involvement and charging $25 to join their party, this new constitution eliminates the traditional concept of membership entirely. Instead, any Canadian regardless of their means will be able to “register” as a Liberal and help shape our country’s future -- for free.
It’s a bold move that speaks to our values as Liberals – and it doesn’t get more open than that.
I’ve also heard from you that our Liberal policy process has too often felt closed off and difficult to navigate, making it tough for new Liberals to get and stay engaged.
The new constitution opens up policy development to allow for a more flexible, interactive and participatory process for all Liberals, strengthening Liberal voices and enabling new low-barrier engagement opportunities throughout the electoral cycle.
Perhaps most importantly, this new constitution modernizes our movement to win in 2019 – by unifying the party under one streamlined constitution and party structure, while strongly supporting the regional voices and local organizing that have helped us effectively engage Canadians and their ideas.
We all worked so very hard over the past few years to build a modern political movement in this country. It was rewarding, interesting, and gritty work. But our old and overly-prescriptive 81-page constitution often got in the way of that work. It was written for an era that has passed, and it is one of at least 18 constitutions that currently affect the national operations of our party.
Our movement worked long and hard to earn the trust of Canadians last year, and we need to stay at the forefront of modern campaigns as we work together to repeat that success in 2019. This proposed new constitution honours our shared effort by taking the lessons we learned during the last campaign, and applying them to the next.
You can get more details about all of these important reforms at http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b8d468c007be187eefe0e9792ee0b76eec27 31d25af136147bc50420925ba87b77 1party.ca, and together they represent the beginning an even more innovative, open, and engaging future for the Liberal Party of Canada.
Please watch this video to learn more about our proposed new Liberal constitution, read our summary, and take a look at the new constitution itself. Both Anna and I look forward to continuing the conversation.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b8468b288ed95c50cc07586751674679a259 83c0ef3743ea3a9eb18e7b76632a48
Canadians are counting on us to keep building, modernizing, and opening up our movement, and we won’t let them down.
Thank you for your support,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b85603adb169fa421f58ffae0cb05bbc69b5 0d2ea4ae3f4bb7046a9fe85b1f3cff Préférences linguistiques | http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=68102d1d070b62b8726a1d2a1de5505cd111a873a7f49cbd31 d226e490ed69782c6076346202c74a Version française | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9ca6900b7eb729c2669a1822c702fe4c262f0ac842845c1f5f1097b364f65ba3341082 5f634f073696 Update profile | http://click.action.liberal.ca/profile_center.aspx?qs=92f6f16d5b1981a957fec9feac5b1d9 6796b130960e31b9ca6900b7eb729c2669a1822c702fe4c262f0ac842845c1f5f1097b364f65ba3341082 5f634f073696 Unsubscribe

message.subject: Do you remember, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=87a2c01d9f20566b5d400a09583b77bbbccf6ba54b4589ba391 c67a83ac09cfc031c6a338a6e79c069d8c8981c65c7d656bd1bb06cf82947638ef6d3ea4d138c81450de5 3a56abd5
Michael, do you remember what happened six months ago today?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c6ec1ba44cb5092758ddf98eb0b91a6bf0af c7547e39c40c5cc9c9bfee72481f2c
Maybe this photo will help remind you:
It was the night that you and millions of Canadians made history. Six months ago today was October 19, the day that our country came together and showed the world that better is indeed possible.
And a lot has happened in those six months.
A tax cut for Canada's middle class, important steps to tackle climate change, and historic investments in public transit, roads and bridges to help you get home faster – just to name a few.
Most recently, the new Liberal government introduced an historic budget that gives more money to help families raise their kids, and invests now to create jobs and long-term growth for the middle class and all those working hard to join it.
I'm very proud of everything we've accomplished together, and I hope you are too. But while we reflect on what has been achieved, it’s also important to look forward as well.
At a time when the Conservatives are closing their doors to Canadians and making it harder to get involved in their party, we are moving forward to make the Liberal Party of Canada the most modern and inclusive political movement in our history.
Thank you for your continued support of our movement. We depend on the generosity of Canadians like you to keep it growing. On the anniversary of this historic victory, I hope that you will make your first contribution now, and invest in the future of our movement. Most people are giving $35 as their first gift.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c6e52e27cb79e1dba149b29fb9959672f71d 8a25f09f7749435a667af7ffe68555 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c6ae1f0676dad1be39777d33dec56dd9d4fd 0579ba6f21102475cf03fd9104b0e9 Give $35 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c6d7e545e2d2cb0d1fd221fd9e7889e635c0 cb1803efa3066000a755b9a888bcb6 Give $45 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c6a9f1bcb794c1e1bbb63573c9637f15b849 9aaf065e6495149e858a91492e54de Give $100 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8500518143710c65ec0d0635ce078cd9c3f2fb0c28b585c29 feaa6df610934567b57c5096ef8265 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you for being part of this,
Christina Topp Interim National Director Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: 👍 We hope you “like” this, Michael!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=077d39746b0916eb84e444277fafcab4d14721f5d2929c7ae94 2e528ba6a1a08010c634c296c2600d4c581c00eb4c09ffe619b3c79e006a3d5a890e224a4c402ac56c30e ab63c2e9 Real Change - Ready to Share - April 2016 One Party - More open than ever before
The proposed new Liberal constitution opens up the party to become the most inclusive party in Canadian history. Let’s grow and strengthen the Liberal movement together!
Learn More: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f24283646d2e2c0cf1893048 33dbac17f49b36074415efdf998cf2742f638f74e9
--
Who Likes Justin Trudeau?
2 million people from around the world have liked Justin Trudeau on Facebook. Are you one of them?
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f2e2b4cb679831f4361f9afe1182b9b12d74 bbea954e8dc194a45c22c889007203
--
Helping Young Canadians Succeed - And supporting our seniors
Young Canadians must have access to meaningful work at the beginning of their careers.
And our seniors deserve a secure and dignified retirement after a lifetime of hard work.
Find out how Budget 2016 delivers Real Change for youth and seniors: http://click.act ion.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f2b72e5536f0ac18cb0aa03565188d06b7d43c31f67c292ffbac 10d3559e6f1cea
--
Our Biennial Convention is just one month away! Want to be there? Sign up now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f2c3daa475d95fc548f588b 53a30a74a759b5659e83bf0a3839982fe35bcf577db
--
National Volunteer Week
Volunteers are the heart and soul of our grassroots movement. We couldn’t be more thankful for the time and energy they have invested in building and growing our party.
To say thank you, Sophie recorded this special message: http://click.action.liberal.c a/?qs=4838b999049f98f2fcc91b80d85c18ec2d7d01352619e0e315ebbe9d1a973162fc772aca2262543 3
--
The Team: Patty Hajdu
MP for Thunder Bay — Superior North and Minister of Status of Women, Patty Hajdu was recently received the Champion of Mental Health Award for her work on social housing, mental health, substance abuse and harm reduction.
Share this: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f238f5e8a2f7f03bc0851339 29c522e60efb2c54d437bb9015ca46bdac12be1f2b
--
Play Ball!
Blue not your colour? Grab this Liberal branded ball cap and show your friends which team you’re cheering for! Peanuts and Cracker Jacks sold separately.
Shop now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f218af543907506bd30ad1d2fc d668124ace3fc8d392fac8883ef3f406149f2bf3
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=4838b999049f98f28a039db1c953017097ae17d3681af74f84 1f5fdda264d6a1ff8593c7be71ccc9 Donate ➜

message.subject: Today
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=61d7e2c83df08ea511dbab51e21122a686ae5f8873e00799b41 f0d36eb3504a8106bb204668a4a40c9b95694a765b55ae737f601bba419575acf0ab2225684cf2b7bb4d2 43710ffb
Michael --
Today Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and Minister Catherine McKenna are in New York, to join over 160 countries from around the world in signing the historic Paris Agreement on climate change.
This is an ambitious agreement that works with local governments, indigenous communities, NGOs, and the private sector to fight climate change, and build a more prosperous and sustainable future for our children and grandchildren.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c89d816c17a944af4fab2659862c90e0fc596179ffd8365a6a 7a4d15bb95b5729a783bbfe8c88a40 Canada has an important role to play as an international leader in this global fight against climate change, and Liberals are leading the way.
Take for example the Canada-wide Climate Change Action Plan. With Justin Trudeau’s leadership, Canada’s Premiers came together in February to create a national plan that promotes clean growth for our economy, and will protect our environment.
Right now, the Liberal Party of Canada is the only party that understands that we can grow the economy and create good middle class jobs while also protecting our environment for future generations. In 2016, pretending that we have to choose between the two is as harmful as it is wrong.
Show that you're in to step up the fight against climate change, while also growing and strengthening our economy. Add your signature to Justin Trudeau’s in support of the Paris Agreement on climate change:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c89d816c17a944af4fab2659862c90e0fc596179ffd8365a6a 7a4d15bb95b5729a783bbfe8c88a40 Climate change matters to me ➜
Thanks for standing with us,
Braeden Caley Senior Director, Communications Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: It’s not too early
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=8803aa534d47e1b0bb72805fbe8ac3bb2dd86c2d1d18aa32f16 510da36ef9bb6c4c5bd297d113b0f06207053794eff8b9eb0f901e839d11d6f615b955ecf6ede81027714 6e63e080
Michael, we’ve set the bar high.
A gender neutral cabinet. Help for millions of middle class families. A new home for refugees facing fear and uncertainty. Historic investments in our communities and much needed support for young Canadians after graduation. And just this past week, the signing of the historic and ambitious Paris climate agreement.
Our Liberal government is making us proud. And there is no better time to look ahead, than right now.
We’re in the early months, but it’s not too early to start preparing our party for the months and years to come.
It’s going to take more investment in the smartest digital technologies and greater focus on new strategies to engage Canadians.
We’re going to need to get a jump start on organizing and training our incredible volunteers in every part of the country. And our work to modernizing our party is even more important in a rapidly changing digital world.
Above all else we need to keep the conversation with Canadians going -- talking, and listening, to as many people from as many communities as we possibly can. That’s how we make our country stronger. We know the other parties are doing the same, and we can’t take anything for granted.
That’s why I’m calling on you to help build the most open, innovative and inclusive political movement in our country by making an important investment in the future of our party, today.
The Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by Canadians like you. Most people are giving $45 for their first gift. To sweeten the deal, we’ll send you a pack of awesome commemorative stickers as a token of our thanks.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: Values
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=362f724796c1fc596a128e0a64646b2dfe2df365b2f8640fc32 d677bd958c66f9ec1d3f0fa1204fd0410fa7c648c1e344aa515081069733b645b2c4303a7575034f942d4 e1e948cd
Michael --
I’m sometimes asked what political parties bring to the political process. The answer is simple: values.
Liberals believe that the middle class, and everyone working hard to join it, should pay a little less, and that the wealthiest one percent of Canadians should pay a little more.
We believe that our cabinet should have an equal number of women and men.
We believe that protecting our environment and growing the economy can and must go hand in hand.
And we believe that every Canadian child should have access to clean drinking water, no matter where they live.
When Canadians elected Justin Trudeau and the Liberal Party of Canada, above all, they elected a team that believes their job is to help people. To listen. And have a positive impact on people’s lives.
These are our values as Liberals, and they inform our decisions.
Conservatives, as we learned over the past decade, make other choices. Failing to invest in middle class families. Cuts to science. Attacks on a woman’s right to choose. Opposing equal marriage. The list goes on.
We can’t let that happen again, and that’s why I’m asking you to donate now to help us hit our Liberal Party of Canada fundraising target for April.
Donate what you can, and we’ll send you some great stickers as a small token of our thanks. And remember, your donation is helping to protect the values we cherish, and to keep our movement strong.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: Spruce up your stuff!
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=becfed67fe62c34ba41f69c015432e388f2246247a2653d8175 8ce2ef6003bed456f2847f3a48b18fd49c940c15dd7ab0e089d5b0efd25e64f209a08eed545a5cc718fb4 a18de7ef
Michael -- spruce up your stuff with these awesome Liberal stickers!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea7dd4caaaa6988a02b72df09b853a8e0407f 17aa7a282aa755d4d48ed7fad72eeb
We made them especially for you -- to mark 6 months of the Liberal government -- and to show off all your hard work.
Check your record for this fundraising drive now. Then chip in -- any amount -- and we’ll send you the whole pack of limited edition Liberal stickers.
Name: Michael
Email: liberal@mikesmit.com
Total Donated Nationally in 2016: $0
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea71f0e7f88e8c567664ec246fd38e7da0adc 0312ceaaf2c466c29c23feda6b2e70 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea7a98f782143f2cfd66ac8957df1a830edc1 68908a043a1e282fcd9e861f8caef5 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea7b59a55588158c5fa79d904b58436253c66 5f50c90b7aa1fd3040e38104580c34 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea7841a30fe63c7ad924a4b85a5fd2363e305 63fdb54e050f15d78e01250a43e4ab Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea76c196d69c04f7dc1941cee348f6d25e1f5 aed7e618ff8b9b6a4613b57843fc7c Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea718637fa8bb2259aa4f6d71e781dc7ae86f 9aa865193b74ed7950693b7912631a www.liberal.ca/donate
Did you know the Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by individual grassroots donations from Canadians like you? We are working hard to make the party stronger, more open and more inclusive than ever before -- and you can help. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea70a29fcd487f44ebdd1a9c4f1a3201786cb 632bdcc6914c02f0b67c2a4bf95227 When you give any amount before midnight April 30, we’ll send you these great stickers -- our way of thanking you for your generous support.
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=199e8b75d4308ea7dd4caaaa6988a02b72df09b853a8e0407f 17aa7a282aa755d4d48ed7fad72eeb

message.subject: Rumours
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f3e7b993149dc3df0d57f04223fbd6b4fdb5587536597fd1699 d331ef1fc1371994a2ff426aa8bd4136272db815b469060f49702e7679f1960c9ed1d328be9bc4fe3f7e1 5d63fb38
Michael --
In just a few days, elections Canada will release Q1 fundraising numbers for the Liberal Party of Canada, the Conservatives and the NDP.
This will mark the first time the major federal parties have been stacked against each other since the election, and it will be a sobering reminder that we can’t sit back and wait until 2019 to prepare for the next campaign.
We fully expect that the Conservative fundraising machine is operating at full steam, and while we're closing the gap fast, we are even hearing rumours we’ve been out- raised. With their war chest filling up again, the attack ads and food fight politics won’t be far behind.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1bcc135d3f7683f145f38bd70e704b128ced 70c477711edc059c84efe1703c1287 That’s why starting Q2 strong by hitting our end of April goal is so important to building our movement.
We’re calling on all Canadians to help us raise $150,000 by midnight Saturday, April 30, so we can stay on track for our Q2 fundraising target. More than 1400 have already chipped in $54,281 this month, so your contribution could put us over the top.
And because you loved our “better is always possible” t-shirts last month, we created an awesome sticker pack that we’ll send to anyone who gives before the deadline as a thank you.
They’re pretty cool -- check them out. Then donate to get yours.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1b031078a618383a895de4fa060c49a77665 83d9762c170d785a89486f571adb48
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1b023a21ff11c7e4c73245b8ae6a47e1733e f5096023f471281a87ef79e54a2443 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1ba47ccd2fed34c59eaec120c1a3af69f08f 1c453a8c56a012e9587a3bf5918a75 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1bc4426fab04839eabfdad0d70a5d0dd9850 454a28eae7f7c9190c1b90ae124799 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1b1370ecdc682dde3a539702d7686cbda48d 24ad1e11aea6479fa0ba6a0be4a983 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1bea023aace6da85b07b4443f1e2892fa519 61e135c3afba5592eb2c315d21e678 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b4da9012da0a2b1b49c197ef9e15eea342ed76495929ac867d ebe9994a4d384e0319d9f8137ee137 www.liberal.ca/donate
Thank you,
Christina Topp Interim National Director
Liberal Party of Canada
Want to donate by phone?

Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET

message.subject: 3 reasons to make a donation
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5c45ea86d8626ccf20604de0de6596773210cf26a7780f858de dce1dd61aafc54a45579cefeacca2c5bb4c5ab1a5d0ab6725cff2b9c1e5a6f95c123d147910e2da3a0686 5d113709
Michael -- spruce up your stuff with these awesome Liberal stickers!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e465d8cab3e502e2230412fcdba9c505bb9cde25da4b17898f 6885f5e373b5c138f0b96999b0fc34
We made them especially for you -- to mark 6 months of the Liberal government -- and to show off all your hard work.
Check your record for this fundraising drive now. Then chip in -- any amount -- and we’ll send you the whole pack of limited edition Liberal stickers.
Name: Michael
Email: liberal@mikesmit.com
Total Donated Nationally in 2016: $0
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e465d8cab3e502e20e8c5751f2ddf5324cc7169b1cd93cbc2f 8f54f309fd266623bbc904b4cdccce Give $5 ➜

Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e465d8cab3e502e2b93265c9a2eef9107b0fcff8b51d3a0d5a ce57712b31867a316e12b8f2751f6a www.liberal.ca/donate
Did you know the Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by individual grassroots donations from Canadians like you? We are working hard to make the party stronger, more open and more inclusive than ever before -- and you can help. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=e465d8cab3e502e22b1615d4767b8056b3dfacf17a571b9cd1 3c9302c7f5a0a8d2ba2cf71de7a939 When you give any amount before midnight April 30, we’ll send you these great stickers -- our way of thanking you for your generous support.
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET

message.subject: Youth
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=c3c6eef450ad4923e8fd696cccbe2f0e640e62a9290045348bf 9f80ef9e6350374d33a4cbd1fb575ee7d7715ec1377bb397dfd5c0e4770c1cf12fff0552d7e16b68f1d7b e22b50f2
An education. A good paying job. And hope for the future. That’s what young Canadians expect and deserve.
But after a decade of Stephen Harper’s Conservatives, many students are worried that they won’t be able to find a good job when they graduate. Many more young Canadians are facing student debt loads that are quickly becoming unmanageable.
As you can imagine, I’m very pleased that the Stephen Harper decade is over – and I suspect I’m not the only one. We have a new Prime Minister, and a government that is taking major steps to help the next generation of Canadians succeed.
Like the recent Liberal budget, which enhances the Canada Student Grants program to help students cover the cost of post secondary education. This step alone will put more money in the pockets of 360,000 students each year.
And to help young Canadians gain valuable work experience, an expanded Canada Summer Jobs program will offer an additional 34,000 summer jobs, helping give our young people the tools and capacity they need to succeed.
Just as the the government is making critical investments in the future of our country, the Liberal Party is investing now to ensure we keep strengthening, modernizing, and opening up our movement to make it the most inclusive in all of Canada. Canadians are counting on us to deliver real change, and we're counting on you, Michael.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5bb3beb1648f4daad818e12eb0d112c174347dcbc01b9076c5 db0c8ef09954fd6ff5f3c212650ac2 Give $5 ➜

The Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by Canadians like you. To sweeten the deal, we’ll send you a pack of awesome commemorative stickers http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=5bb3beb1648f4daa7d25acae3ee117fc547d79486cb39c32e0 ddb437f58895cd0c7d8f4ecab83326 when you make your first donation as a token of our thanks.
Thanks for everything you do,
Braeden Caley Senior Director, Communications Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Can we send, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=d437578a228259296da084f77bfba84a6eb4dfc65f4cc28e905 4d5aeecb305d70b251a88fec4861047521bbc9b7bdb4623f309cbe40b259c87dfa172b89c2dd36b7693e0 b3b61d67
Michael -- spruce up your stuff with these awesome Liberal stickers!
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e507a6975894c5420c419b813f3663cba442c6 2a74804a0cd728ea84f1a79fb5e469
We made them especially for you -- to mark 6 months of the Liberal government -- and to show off all your hard work.
Check your record for this fundraising drive now. Then chip in -- any amount -- and we’ll send you the whole pack of limited edition Liberal stickers.
Name: Michael
Email: liberal@mikesmit.com
Total Donated Nationally in 2016: $0
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e507244213c9c7b283f8a4110a6d83faacdde5 fca81afeb069f1d5989f0a32939eb8 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e5073006627a8fdecf50ba9e335e8cd5887919 0267df1957af90b2f0aea0ce698ad3 Give $25 ➜
