http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e50717be472aeeb7e384183efe70e48ef114be db737e76a9079ba1afc1ca988847f1 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e5073faf8f703ad3bb2e18608b934b15c083f6 c028f445bc5c698cd09437a1dfad22 Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e507ca0bd5ea5ac117b7e3014b56b90ae698d0 912cd0ff74781688a60b76d9c8cad2 www.liberal.ca/donate
Did you know the Liberal Party of Canada is funded entirely by individual grassroots donations from Canadians like you? We are working hard to make the party stronger, more open and more inclusive than ever before -- and you can help. http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e5074a95bb53b4883de0576c09d8b19b357e3e 258398f078fa6982f22c1d1f62e4f9 When you give any amount before midnight April 30, we’ll send you these great stickers -- our way of thanking you for your generous support.
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=b53ef45b23f4e507a6975894c5420c419b813f3663cba442c6 2a74804a0cd728ea84f1a79fb5e469

message.subject: Thank you for everything
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=205e87a0058a03279afb9a4b1598840ab4641dec93d0f1dae50 39aaaea9722e8f6cd55d6d1ca0a5a0c4e8b3130d543dbf7f472519b3f2903ba0720e1b960d57b98f0dfa2 3923689d
Dear Michael,
Everywhere my family and I go in our great country, I always feel like we are home. Thank you for welcoming us with such warmth and respect.
And in the six months since our historic win, you have helped make a real difference in the lives of millions of Canadians. The results of your hard work are simply inspiring and I feel blessed to be a part of it.
>From speaking in support of healthier kids and building confidence and self-esteem among women and girls, to volunteering at a food bank with Justin, I cherish each one of these opportunities to talk with Canadians and better understand the issues that matter most to you.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef2ea397be39ebcefd9818c1f660eb76e3a38 65e1cf396ce7a9a43d17b35778d99e
And like you’ve welcomed me, the world has welcomed our government -- holding it up as a model of equality, hope and strength. Whenever I travel beyond our borders with Justin I see our country’s reputation shining once again -- because of your hard work and your commitment to real change.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef2ea397be39ebcefd9818c1f660eb76e3a38 65e1cf396ce7a9a43d17b35778d99e
So much incredible progress in these first six months! And you made it possible, Michael.
That’s how I know we can work together to build an even stronger party.A party that works hard to engage with even more Canadians. A party that has an even stronger presence in our communities. And a party that is ready to respond to our opponents with a positive message, when they resort to their negative attacks.
Our fundraising drives are very important to our work. And because we are funded entirely by individual grassroots donors -- a donation of any amount you can afford, makes a real difference in building our movement.
Please give what you can now to help us raise $150,000 by midnight Saturday, April 30.Over 2,200 Canadians have already donated this month and I’m counting on you to join them,Michael.
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef22e892e1b21fa6439962e78adbd5bf772bc 9bb81b0859cbde2eea41a49e0b1685 Give $5 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef29d394b31056d119fe70b2c30da772ae27d 95d9cbedf06c2847049724b34ba1c9 Give $25 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef23030c52723c35364532c6e52b82bccc286 002453529a8dd0e23ca28c98fd5b42 Give $50 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef289762cd05dd6592b16b4385e633812690c 0d8e659bf738d4935a77b62dc2f776 Give $100 ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef244ef9f35d11f3326b60dddf7f9476190a6 967b6fa170f40b8cf38cbd311c136d Give $200 ➜
Or give another amount:
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef21acc750d55bb614ceb4898665b5672d099 ad40e74ad29709c630e372f306e153 www.liberal.ca/donate
With gratitude,
Sophie Grégoire Trudeau
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
Monday - Saturday, 9 AM - 5 PM ET
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=696a633ca334aef2ea397be39ebcefd9818c1f660eb76e3a38 65e1cf396ce7a9a43d17b35778d99e

message.subject: FW: Please pass this on
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=78c5c2186c651f94b24ed4ca1ef672041a164c06fe4834287e0 cd64b903799b836b58261e0a7e08030b0fd0ca4554e0b641cad4d0ae3b87c275cb7d675c9fe35359b86db 4c785be3
Michael --
Take a look at these words of encouragement from Justin Trudeau!
Justin Trudeau is right – we need to keep going. When I hit reply, I’m going to tell him that over X,XXX Canadians have chipped in $XX,XXX to help reach our most immediate goal – our April fundraising deadline – and I want you to be one of them too, Michael.
---
Please pass this on Actions Justin Trudeau 7:25 AM Keep this message at the top of your inbox To: Christina Topp
Christina,
We're making so much progress, and I'm so thankful to all the Canadians who are supporting our work.
Could you please pass this message on to our supporters? I would appreciate it so much.
In just six months, we have taken great steps to build our future. We’re showing that better is always possible -- for Canada, but also for the Liberal Party of Canada.
That’s thanks to the efforts of the hardworking volunteers, generous grassroots donors, and all Canadians who support our work.
It’s so important that as we move forward, we continue to dream bigger and work harder so we can continue to achieve every single goal that we set for ourselves – no matter how ambitious.
Let’s keep going!
Thank you.
J ---
If you've saved your payment information, your donation will be processed immediately.

message.subject: We’re feeling the love. Are you, Michael?
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0667b8fd915db7d8760c8db21817a8ca399eab26acb706d8a83 510afba219f57f789f988aeca958c8279daa6100a950d484d4df3e994b0ac5575844b63f8d11056e47ae5 f7d8de5c
REAL CHANGE - READY TO SHARE - JULY 2016
---
Love is Love
On July 3, Justin Trudeau became the first sitting Prime Minister to walk in a Pride Parade. By doing so he sent an unmistakable message that Canada stands with the LGBTQ2 community - and that he's dedicated to working together to keep building a more inclusive Canada.
Watch as history was made: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf0629a19 482e29126870fea34471411e6b9e56fa3a1c544d1256bbf3fbb18f6ca
---
Justin Trudeau:
'Every Canadian deserves a secure and dignified retirement after a lifetime of hard work'
Learn how a strengthened Canada Pension Plan will help you: http://click.action.liber al.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebfc344f13f23e752ea21ce78a2bfa93b6b856297eef5ebad3d516a16af494 4c141
---
Stronger Together
At the 2016 North American Leaders' Summit, three great nations – who share the same continent and the same values – came together to deliver real results for North Americans. And for the first time in more than 20 years, a US President addressed Canada’s Parliament.
Watch President Obama’s Speech: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf9d 6cb2c32baa863c73873430bc1bd2dbf20bc98d76703549cf32f3bb8765f88c
---
Work at LPC!
Do you have the passion and skills to engage and motivate hundreds of thousands of Canadians online? If your answer is yes, our digital team wants you to join us!
Apply now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf6ca803d8b245890f1e895ef 5416cb5946af2baebd3efe27e136e9fb54d660fb0
---
Our Doors are Wide Open
Party membership fees are a thing of the past. Come join the movement that begins, spends, and ends every day working hard for Canadians.
Register as a Liberal: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf484a4937d88 b65d02d2af4303f0ef1a87e20a5b20386884fb6a7e8a842d39d22
---
Your Voice. Your Canada
We have one simple question for you: Is the Liberal Government heading in the right direction?
Tell us now: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf4557fa7d5139e005dd6c1 306c8b96cee4f6b4f52903980e6100c17439428615c
---
On the Road with LPC
In this new series we’ll be visiting with Liberal MP’s from all across the country to learn more about them, their work, and their communities.
First up: Greg Fergus, MP for Hull-Aylmer: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d 2704beebfab448e16ceaeecf110100d1c60a99429b8b3e86d45727730c303e36aeefe317b
---
Inspiring Moment of the Week:
When two-year-old Sophia Popalyar didn't get to meet Defense Minister Harjit Sajjan on Canada Day she was understandably upset. Watch as she gets a personal tour of the House of Commons from her hero:
So adorable: http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=705ef2d2704beebf4da932eb7f8adea295267 14556aa17c594619be9e8dce417d9b1be83eb427399
---

message.subject: Michael, you might not know this:
message.text:
To view this email as a web page, go to the link below, or copy and paste it into your browser's address window. http://view.action.liberal.ca/?qs=f8a45fa9e17a79a58c2eb4fa8547466a6138022f36da67e5b7c 9ce7bfdcfcf9c1f2ac4df8dc7daa37c6cb96c9a4c1f95506b6aca5cc6411c9a7f5fb96a9fc1eeefe63d1e 967af86a
Michael, you might not know this, but the Liberal Party of Canada is getting ready to hit the campaign trail again.
Yes, that's right. Preparations have started for a number of important by-election campaigns that we all know are going to be underway very soon.
And we need your help to be ready for them.
As a Liberal donor you understand how important it is to be financially prepared for these campaigns. When you make a donation today, your gift can help provide the crucial campaign supplies we need to deliver a Liberal victory, a new Liberal MP, and a better future for all Canadians.
Michael, can our team count on you to help cover important by-election expenses like these? If you've saved your payment information your donation will go through immediately.
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a4490275db58c5d1b62bb326272e9037a8f 16433d5192fbf74adbb65ddaa2cb09 Donate $5 – Serve digital ads to 15 voters ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a1eba0dd0e433f18e027485501b96f01327 4a72499967333ae19c2bd00ad2cd77 Donate $25 – Buy lunch for our hard-working volunteers ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a18fed7a2400f52499627e243e070a3389f 6332f2688028f55779735899204aa2 Donate $50 – Pay for 5 large election signs ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a0efe82575a4065c60bd0705a98d25a4eda b7f295f9404819f131472967d15a9a Donate $75 – Help put a radio ad on the air ➜
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163aab7f1c99c2d5e2c34b0d34d78904aaaa1a ed38c17504fbc47228027692fa0770 Donate $100 – Equip the campaign to canvass voters ➜
Or contribute another amount to help in the lead up to our by-election efforts at http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a660c6e7c5d46920508640ef48f5395641a 7f6eac9a3cb24bde1659aeac37c411 www.liberal.ca/donate .
Thank you for supporting our by-election effort, Michael. Your gift will go a long way toward delivering real change to Canadians across the country.
Adam Carroll
National Field Director
Liberal Party of Canada
http://click.action.liberal.ca/?qs=0c2d949f8ce2163a660c6e7c5d46920508640ef48f5395641a 7f6eac9a3cb24bde1659aeac37c411 Donate now ➜

message.subject: Get your REAL CHANGE sticker set!
message.text:
As we celebrate and look forward, we're making this limited edition commemorative sticker set available to everyone who donates on or before October 19, 2016!
Own a piece of Canadian political history today!
I want these ?
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: We have a rule on the campaign trail:
message.text:
Michael, we have a rule here on the campaign trail at LPC: Everybody knocks on doors. And if you can't knock on doors, you make phone calls.
That goes for me too:
Stan Sakamoto's by-election campaign in Medicine Hat-Cardston-Warner is in full swing, and we couldn't be happier with our progress!
Michael, electing Liberal Members of Parliament like Stan is our number one job. Can you make a contribution now to help elect more Liberals all across Canada?
Hundreds of Team Trudeau volunteers have joined us on the trail, and tens of thousands of doors and phones have been knocked and called on the way.
And just last week, a special visitor came by. Then this happened:
2,500 Southern Albertans packed one of the largest venues in town - and the streets - to the brim, just to see Justin Trudeau and Stan Sakamoto.
If you're as proud of this campaign as I am, I'm asking you to contribute to this and future by-election efforts (we have some tough ones coming up, including Stephen Harper's riding!) by making a donation of $5, or $25, or even $50 now.
Like it or not, there is a hefty cost associated with these campaigns - from training volunteers, printing campaign literature and buttons, to hiring organizers - it all comes from one place only: the generous contributions made by dedicated supporters like you from all across Canada.
So please contribute what you can now, and when you do, we'll send you our one year of Real Change commemorative sticker pack to say thank you!
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
Thank you,
Adam Carroll National Field Director
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: I'm personally asking
message.text:
Michael --
It's been an exciting year of real change, yet every day I'm reminded that there's more hard work ahead of us than behind us.
We got here by being bold. By believing in Canadians. By trusting each other. And by focusing every minute of every day on how we can better support Canada's middle class, and all those working hard to join it.
Above all, one year of real change has been possible because of our hard work together, and our shared commitment to engaging Canadians in building a better future.
Together, Michael, we have so much more left to do. That's why I need you to chip in, right now. And when you do, we'll send you a great commemorative sticker pack to say thank you.
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
Thank you for all of your hard work,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Say you're in to keep moving forward, Michael
message.text:
Today we celebrate one year of Real Change
And today and everyday we keep working together to build a better future for all Canadians - and there's more hard work ahead of us than behind us.
Say you're in to keep moving forward - together
I'm part of this too: http://www.liberal.ca/add-your-name-celebrate-one-year-of- real-change/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: One year already!
message.text:
Michael --
I remember election night like it was yesterday.
Surrounded by volunteers, waiting for the results to come in -- the anticipation giving way to relief as we realized we had earned Canadians' trust with a new majority government.
But that was just the beginning. It's been an exciting year, and this week, as we celebrate one year of real change, we can't help but acknowledge that there's more hard work ahead of us than behind us. From growing the economy for middle class families, to introducing a pan-Canadian plan for pricing carbon pollution, and more, we're ready.
None of it is possible without you. That's why we need your help.
Can you donate what you can now? When you do, we'll send you a Real Change commemorative sticker pack to say thank you!
When I speak with Canadians across the country, I'm conscious that the optimism and hope we have felt since last election isn't diminishing. It's growing. But to continue to grow our movement, and to keep building on our progress, we need your support.
I'm counting on you to give us the boost we need right now.
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
Mï¿½lanie Joly MP, Ahuntsic-Cartierville
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: By popular demand...
message.text:
Thanks to the incredible support of 2,254 Canadians who chipped in to mark One year of Real Change -- we're extending the deadline to get your commemorative Real Change sticker pack.
But you only have until midnight Friday!
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Tick Tock!
message.text:
Michael -- at midnight tonight:
Your chance to get our commemorative One year of Real Change Liberal sticker pack willï¿½be:
Over 2,544 Canadians have chipped in to mark one year of Real Change and to help keep our movement strong and growing.
Donate before midnight tonight, and be part ofï¿½itï¿½too!
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: Thanks, Stan!
message.text:
Thanks Stan!
Stan Sakamoto and Team Trudeau ran an incredible campaign in Medicine Hat-Cardston- Warner. With 22,000 conversations, and 34,000 doors knocked, Stan and all of our volunteers have shown the whole country that Team Trudeau will never stop working hard to earn and honour the trust of all Canadians. Together, they earned the highest Liberal vote share in over 42 years!
Say thanks to Stan - http://www.liberal.ca/say-thanks-to-stan-sakamoto
One Year of Real Change
As we pass the one year mark since the election we need to always remember one thing: there is much more hard work ahead of us than behind us.
Say you're in to keep going - http://www.liberal.ca/add-your-name-celebrate-one-year- of-real-change/
Sophie Grï¿½goire Trudeau is now on Facebook and Instagram!
Sophie is a passionate advocate for gender equality and the rights of women and girls, be sure to keep up with her work!
Like her on Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/SophieGregoireTrudeau/
Follow her on Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sophiegregoiretrudeau/
Leading the Fight Against Climate Change
Real problems require real solutions. Pricing carbon pollution will help grow our economy and protect our planet for our children and grandchildren.
Get the details ? https://www.facebook.com/LiberalCA/videos/10153799052312007/
Your Say: Budget 2017
44,253 Canadians shared their views in our Budget 2017 Survey. Were you one of them?
Have your say now - http://www.liberal.ca/your-say-budget-2017/
What They're saying: Strengthening the CPP
The Liberal government continues to work with the provinces to strengthen the Canada Pension Plan, helping to ensure all Canadians receive the secure and stable retirement they deserve.
Read what they're saying - https://www.liberal.ca/what-theyre-saying-historic-cpp- agreements/
"After a decade of inaction our country and province are taking real action to create opportunity, deliver a better future for our children, and build a stronger economy. We're ready for real change and innovation." - Kent Hehr Member of Parliament for Calgary Centre
Full article - http://www.liberal.ca/albertans-are-ready-to-be-leaders-in-innovation/
The Team: Marc Garneau
Just over 32 years ago, Marc Garneau became the first Canadian in space. Take a look in this blast from the past:
Blast off - http://www.cbc.ca/archives/entry/marc-garneau-blasts-off-as-canadas- first-astronaut
ON THE ROAD WITH LPC
Over the summer we took a cross country road trip and visited with Liberal MPs from every corner of the country in the communities they know best.
Miss any stops - Catch them all here ? https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjF74Yw5Orphh3jWu6m3AS1GRiR7BgRBQ
Donate Now
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: [INFOGRAPHIC] Budget 2017 Survey Results
message.text:
The Liberal Party of Canada is proud to participate in our government's open and transparent consultation process for Budget 2017.
Over 44,450 Canadians participated, representing every province and territory took part. Amazing!
Want to know what you had to say on the issues shaping our country today?
Yes! Show me the results ?
http://www.liberal.ca/your-say-budget-2017-survey-results/
-

message.subject: Michael = Awesome
message.text:
We just submitted our third quarter fundraising numbers.
And guess what? You were awesome - thank you!
In Q3 2016 35,180 of you pitched in.
Donating on average $91 (just $23 after the 2016 tax credit for federal political contributions)
For Canada's Liberal movement, this is the 14th consecutive quarter with more than 30,000 grassroots donors.
And the 5th consecutive quarter with over 35,000 grassroots donors.
Together, you chipped in over $3.2 million, matching our best Q3 ever outside of an election year - from a broader group of individual supporters than any other political party.
Let's build on that momentum, and show the country just how strong our movement is.
Chip in ahead of our October deadline at Midnight tonight!
https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe: http://www.liberal.ca/unsubscribe/
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: Add your name for a stronger middle class
message.text:
Now is the time to invest in people, in innovation and in infrastructure, so that we can build long-term growth for middle class families, their children and grandchildren, and put Canada on the road to long-term prosperity. - Bill Morneau
When the middle class is strong, all of Canada is strong.
Say you're in to keep fighting for a stronger more prosperous Canada.
Add my name: http://www.liberal.ca/stronger-middle-class/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: You're going to ace it!
message.text:
Progress for the middle class . New Support for Families and Children . New Jobs . More Liveable Cities . More Affordable Post-Secondary Education . Renewing the Relationship with Indigenous Peoples . Open and Transparent Government
One way we are marking a year of real change is with a quiz all about what you've helped our Liberal team achieve.
It's a light-hearted look at some of the important progress we're making together. Here's a sneak peek question just for you:
On November 4, 2015, when taking questions from the media Justin Trudeau was asked why he named 15 women and 15 men to his Liberal cabinet. How did he respond?
A. Because it's 2015
B. It's time for some sunny ways
C. Because better is always possible
Think you have the answer? We know you do!
And we have a few more questions up our sleeves.
Ready to take the One Year of Real Change Quiz?
Yes! Born ready! http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
Michael -- one year ago today, we made history together.
On November 4, 2015, I had the honour of being sworn in as Prime Minister, and I named our country's Cabinet. A cabinet as diverse and as strong as Canada itself.
It was your hard work and your unwavering support that made this historic achievement possible. Thank you so very much, Michael.
Every single day since then, our Liberal team has been working make life better for Canada's middle class and every family working hard to join it. One year after that historic day, what better way to be inspired to face the hard work and challenges ahead than to look back at where we've been.
That's why I'm inviting you take our quick One Year of Real Change Quiz. It's one light-hearted way that we're celebrating the real change you've helped make possible, so far. And I think you'll do great.
Get started at http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: FWD: Thank you
message.text:
Michael -- did you see it? Justin Trudeau emailed you yesterday thanking you for all your hard work in our first year of real change. We were blown away by the response -- over 12,400 Canadians have already marked the historic moment by taking our quick One Year of Real Change Quiz. It's a fun look back at the progress we've been achieving together so far. PMJT is curious about how everyone will do -- and we've said we'll report back. Ready to show us what you can do? - BC
Get started at http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: Justin Trudeau Subject: Thank you Date: Friday, November 4, 2016
Friend -- one year ago today, we made history together.
On November 4, 2015, I had the honour of being sworn in as Prime Minister, and I named our country's Cabinet. A cabinet as diverse and as strong as Canada itself.
It was your hard work and your unwavering support that made this historic achievement possible. Thank you so very much.
Every single day since then, our Liberal team has been working make life better for Canada's middle class and every family working hard to join it. One year after that historic day, what better way to be inspired to face the hard work and challenges ahead than to look back at where we've been.
That's why I'm inviting you take our quick One Year of Real Change Quiz. It's one light-hearted way that we're celebrating the real change you've helped make possible, so far. And I think you'll do great.
Get started at http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Report Card for Michael: Incomplete
message.text:
One Year of Real Change Quiz Closes at Midnight!
Over 17,400 Canadians from all across the country have completed it with flying colours!
Hmmmm -- but not you...
--yet.
Check out your quiz grade so far:
QUIZ REPORT CARD FOR: You
Grade: Incomplete Make sure it's not an -- take the quiz now! http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of- real-change/
Best part: it's super quick, it's all about the real change you've helped achieve, and we think it's pretty fun!
What better way to get inspired for the hard work head?
Ready. Set.
QUIZ ME: http://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
-

message.subject: A national plan to protect our oceans and coastlines
message.text:
Our coasts are the traditional territory of many Indigenous communities; they are habitats for rich biodiversity and precious ecosystems; and they offer unparalleled economic, recreational, and tourism opportunities. And it's up to all of us to keep it that way. - Justin Trudeau
Today, Justin Trudeau announced a $1.5 billion Oceans Protection Plan to ensure clean oceans for generations to come. This plan will:
Create a world-leading marine safety system Restore and protect marine ecosystems Strengthen partnerships with Indigenous communities Invest in evidence-based oil spill response methods
Say you're with us as we continue the hard work needed to protect our environment, fight against climate change, and grow our economy.
You can count on me: http://www.liberal.ca/oceans-protection-plan/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Take nothing for granted
message.text:
Michael, last night 12 Conservatives took the stage to make their case for replacing Stephen Harper as Conservative Leader.
If you missed their first debate, here's what we saw:
After 10 years of Stephen Harper's policies leaving the middle class behind, all 12 Conservatives showed that they are still completely out of touch with the real priorities of Canadians.
The same divisive rhetoric that Canadians rejected out of hand in 2015? It's back.
And, most importantly: they have no positive plan to grow Canada's middle class and help all those working hard to join it.
These are the Conservatives vying to replace Justin Trudeau as our Prime Minister, and for all Canadians, the stakes are high.
Regardless of which candidate wins in the end, the Conservative Party has made it clear that they will spend the next three years trying to tear down the real progress being made by Justin Trudeau and the Liberal team.
Michael, one thing is clear right now: we can't take anything for granted.
Together, we need to show that better that is always possible - and it will take every one of us to prove it.
Please chip in now, and let's keep moving forward together.
secure.liberal.ca/donation/
Thank you,
Braeden Caley Senior Director, Communications Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Thank you for supporting Positive Politics
message.text:
Michael
You've done so much for this movement.
So we made these awesome digital wallpapers to give back and say thank you for all your hard work and dedication.
Pick your favourite design (or all 5!) and show your support for Positive Politics with a new digital wallpaper for your phone, tablet, or desktop!
Get my free wallpaper: https://www.liberal.ca/download-your-support/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe: liberal.ca/unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Get inspired, Michael!
message.text:
Real Change - Ready to Share - Novemeber 2016
---
Protecting our Oceans and Coastlines
Our oceans and coastlines are cherished by all Canadians, and it's up to us to protect them. On November 7, 2016, Justin Trudeau announced the $1.5 billion national Oceans Protection Plan to ensure our oceans remain healthy, clean, and safe for generations to come.
Watch and learn about the plan: https://www.facebook.com/JustinPJTrudeau/videos/10154842852240649/
---
Justin Trudeau: 'We'll honour our men & women in uniform, past and present, by providing services and care when and where they need it most.'
Read more: http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/nova-scotia/sydney-veterans-affairs-office- justin-trudeau-reopening-1.3844332
---
What They're Saying: Fall Economic Update
The Liberal government is focused on making smart investments that will revitalize our economy, spur long-term growth, and strengthen the middle class. Because when the middle class does well, everyone does well.
Here's what Canadians are saying: http://www.liberal.ca/what-theyre-saying-fall- economic-update/
---
Quiz: One Year of Real Change
LPC interim National Director Christina Topp only got 6/8 questions right on our One Year of Real Change Quiz. Can you beat her score?
You bet! Quiz me: https://www.liberal.ca/quiz-one-year-of-real-change/
---
In Canadian Politics, People Come Before Special Interests
Canadian federal politics is governed by some of the strictest political financing regulations found anywhere in our country or across North America, and rightfully so.
Read Anna's Op-ed: http://www.liberal.ca/in-canadian-politics-people-come-before- special-interests-and-strong-federal-rules-help-guarantee-it/
---
Liberal Stocking Stuffers
We've got the perfect holiday gifts for you in the Liberal Boutique. Take 15% off with the promo code READY-TO-SHARE15, valid for one week only!
Shop for the Ho-Ho-Holidays: https://boutique.liberal.ca/
---
Conservative Party Leadership Race
Last week 12 Conservatives took the stage in their debate and made their case to replace Stephen Harper as Conservative Leader. We saw:
The same divisive rhetoric that Canadians rejected out of hand in 2015 No positive plan to grow Canada's middle class and help all those working hard to join it. They're still completely out of touch with the real priorities of Canadians.
One thing is clear right now: we can't take anything for granted.
Chip in to make sure we're ready: https://secure.liberal.ca/donation/
---
Q3 Results
For Canada's Liberal movement, this is the 14th consecutive quarter with more than 30,000 grassroots donors, and the 5th consecutive quarter with over 35,000 grassroots donors. That's more individual supporters than any other political party. And you? You were awesome!
See the full breakdown: http://www.liberal.ca/our-third-quarter-fundraising-numbers/
---
The Team: One Year on Parliament Hill
After one year of real change with the Liberal government, Ginette Petitpas Taylor, Randy Boissonnault, Celina Caesar-Chavannes, and Greg Fergus reflect on their most memorable moments and share inspiration for the future.
Watch and get inspired: https://www.facebook.com/LiberalCA/videos/10153861649847007/
---
This Week You Did This:
More than 6,000 Canadians have registered as new Liberals over the last week, with 1,029 Canadians joining our movement on Thursday alone - the day after the first Conservative Party leadership debate.
Join them now, register as a Liberal: https://www.liberal.ca/register/

message.subject: Vote Now: The Liberal Winter toque
message.text:
This winter, we're getting ready to work even harder to keep building a better future for all Canadians. And we're going to need to stay warm to do it! Ready to help? It's going to be fun - promise!
Vote on your favourite design for our LPC Winter 2017 toque, now!
https://www.liberal.ca/pick-your-favourite-liberal-toque/
And have your say in our winter toque design! We'll be making the winning toque available for free for anyone who donates $99 or more (that could be as little as $24.75 after your 2016 tax credit!).
Love them all? donate $99 after you vote and we'll send you the winning toque as soon as it's available!
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Pick your top toque, Michael
message.text:
Hey, Michael --
Coming up with fun and creative ways to connect with Canadians and grow our movement is one of the best parts of my job. And when we at Liberal HQ put our heads together for our winter campaign, one idea got me especially excited -- toques!
They're cozy, they're stylish, and few things are more Canadian than a winter toque. So we've come up with three designs -- and we're looking to you to help decide which one to offer our supporters this month.
But guess what? We just can't decide which is our favourite -- so we need your help. After all, you're the one who's going to wear it!
Here are our top 3 designs. Have a look and tell me -- which is your top toque Michael?
We'll get the winning design into production and it will be available for free for anyone who donates $99 or more (that could be as little as $24.75 after your 2016 tax credit!).
If you love them all, and just can't wait, donate $99 after you vote and we'll send you the winning toque as soon as it's available.
Vote now: https://www.liberal.ca/pick-your-favourite-liberal-toque/
Thanks, Michael -- can't wait to see which one you pick!
Darrell Dean Creative Director Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Last chance to vote for your favourite!
message.text:
Your vote status is: NOT VOTED
You know what happens when you don't vote? Your favourite Liberal winter toque might get left out in the cold - brrrrrr!
11,625 Canadians have already picked their top choice.
They're not leaving it to chance.
But we noticed you still have
NOT VOTED.
Polls close at midnight. Quick - make sure you get your pick in! (Toque-Tock!)
VOTE NOW : https://www.liberal.ca/pick-your-favourite-liberal-toque/

message.subject: And the winning toque is...
message.text:
Over 20,000 Canadians voted for their favorite Liberal winter toque and we absolutely your top pick!
It's warm, stylish and super useful when you're working (or playing) hard.
Our toque and limited-edition scarf are the winter gear that Canadians from coast to coast to coast will be wearing to show their support for Real Change.
Together, we have much more hard work ahead of us -- to strengthen our open and inclusive movement, and build a better future for all Canadians.
Get the gear that will inspire you to help drive real change this winter!
Donate $99 or more (that's as low as $24.75 after your 2016 tax credit!) and we'll send you yours as soon as it's ready!
GET YOUR TOQUE NOW: https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
Or donate $199 or more (that's as low as $49.75 after your 2016 tax credit!) and we'll send you your scarf as soon as it's ready!
GET YOUR SCARF NOW: https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
Don't wait -- they're only available until midnight, December 15. And once they're gone -- they are GONE!
We think they all will look terrific on you!
Or give another amount: https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: I'm asking, Michael
message.text:
Before we took office November 4, 2015, there was no gender-balanced cabinet.
No long form census. No Senate-appointment reform. A signature on the Paris Climate Change Agreement seemed unlikely. And no sitting Prime Minister had ever marched in a Pride Parade.
Just over a year later, we have brought real change to all of these areas -- and real progress for Canada's middle class.
Almost 300,000 children are being lifted out of poverty by our new Canada Child Benefit, which ensures that 9 out of 10 families get more money each month. Our middle class tax cut means that nine million Canadians will pay lower taxes for 2016, while the wealthiest 1% will contribute a little more. And we brought all the provinces together to strengthen the Canada Pension Plan.
Meanwhile, historic investments in infrastructure and ocean protection are creating good middle class jobs, and helping to build a better Canada for future generations.
Our achievements belong to you, Michael, and everyone in our movement. Your support, your dollars, your volunteer hours, and your votes made all of this possible.
https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change-champion/
But in 2019, it could all disappear on election night -- if we take anything at all for granted.
Our opponents are already hard at work preparing to take us on in 2019. Whoever they rally behind, with enough money and resources, we know that anything can happen on election night.
They are already attempting to divide Canadians by bringing up old fears and anxieties. You know as well as I do, Michael, fear has never fed a single family nor created a single job. If they succeed -- and it's possible -- they will undo all the progress that we have made together, and we'll all wish then that we did a little more when we could.
That's why I'm calling on all Canadians who believe in our movement to become champions for real change by raising $1-million dollars together by midnight, December 15, so we can start 2017 strong.
It's time to get serious about building our next campaign. Can you chip in $5, or any amount you can, right now to help?
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
And as a special thank you we have some terrific gifts lined up so you can show your Liberal pride this winter, including a toque -- designed by you -- for everyone who donates $99, or more. A scarf, if you give $199, or more. And the full set if you give $299, or more!
Remember, after your tax credit, that's as low as $24.75 for the toque, $49.75 for the scarf, or $74.75 for both.
Let's get right to work. The next election campaign starts now.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: A call to action from Justin Trudeau
message.text:
Our achievements belong to you, and everyone in our movement. Your support, your dollars, your volunteer hours, and your votes made all of this possible. But in 2019, it could all disappear on election night - if we take anything at all for granted.
That's why I'm calling on all Canadians who believe in our movement to become champions for real change.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
And as a special thank you we have some terrific gifts lined up so you can show your Liberal pride this winter, including a toque -- designed by you -- for everyone who donates $99, or more. A scarf, if you give $199, or more. And the full set if you give $299, or more!
Remember, after your tax credit, that's as low as $24.75 for the toque, $49.75 for the scarf, or $74.75 for both.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion

message.subject: Urgent ask
message.text:
Urgent ask --
Later tonight, 14 Conservative candidates will take the stage for their next leadership debate.
Kellie Leitch will say we need a 'values test' for all new Canadians. Maxime Bernier will say we need to gut the CBC. Other candidates have already said that they want to end a woman's right to choose, end hard-fought marriage equality rights, and roll back real progress to protect our environment for future generations.
They couldn't be any more out of touch with the real priorities of Canadians.
Above all else, their divisive rhetoric will highlight what has been clear to all of us from the start: they have no positive plan for middle class families.
Don't just take my word for it - tune into the Conservative leadership debate tonight to see for yourself.
But on election night 2019, one of them could become Prime Minister -- if you don't chip in tonight so we can start 2017 strong.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
So far, 1,627 of you have stepped up to be an everyday champion for real change. You've raised a truly impressive $123,701 -- thank you. And if this keeps up, we will continue to have far more grassroots supporters than any other federal political party.
But to keep on track to hit our $1-million goal, we're counting on you to join them - by stepping up to make a contribution by midnight tonight.
It's time to choose, and I hope you'll join us. The clock's ticking!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
Thank you.
Braeden Caley Senior Director, Communications Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Our prediction for tonight:
message.text:
Michael, the Conservative Debate is about to begin -- but we can already tell you what they're going to say.
They'll continue to say they want to roll back the real progress that Justin Trudeau is making for a stronger middle class.
That progress is helping to lift almost 300,000 children out of poverty, thanks to the new Canada Child Benefit - which ensures that 9 out of 10 families get more money each month.
That progress that means that nine million Canadians will pay lower taxes for 2016, while the wealthiest 1% will contribute a little more.
And that progress means strengthening the Canada Pension Plan, to help ensure the stable and secure retirement that Canadians deserve.
Make no mistake: all we're hearing from Conservative leadership candidates is that they want to roll back real change - and it's clear that they have no positive plan for middle class families. Instead, they're only offering the same out-of-touch, divisive rhetoric that Canadians rejected in 2015.
But on Election Night 2019, one of them could become Prime Minister -- if we take anything at all for granted. That's why it's so important that you step up and make a donation right now.
Over a thousand champions for real change are counting on you -- join them now.
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thanks,
Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Newsflash, Michael:
message.text:
Newsflash, Michael:
LAST WEEK: We kicked off our CRITICAL December fundraising drive with a poll to choose our 2017 winter toque design. An incredible 22,651 Canadians voted to help choose the winner!
THIS WEEK:ï¿½2,266 Canadians have already become everyday champions for real change, donating $171,226. We are so grateful!
RIGHT NOW: We could cross the $200,000 mark tonight -- YES, TONIGHT! -- if you and everyone reading this email chipped in at least $5 so we can start 2017 strong!
Chip in now:
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thanks for all your support!
Liberal Party of Canada
ï¿½

message.subject: Important information about your record
message.text:
In just over 1 year, our Liberal Team has worked hard to deliver on dozens of commitments-- making life better for millions of Canadians across our country.
But we have much more to accomplish together, and we can't take anything for granted.
2478 Canadians have already become everyday champions for real change, chipping in $185,519 to help raise $1-million by midnight, December 15 -- they're not leaving anything to chance.
Have you done everything you can to help drive real change this year?
Please look at your 2016 Real Change Record and chip in what you can, now.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
TOTAL DONATED IN 2016: $0 Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0 Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 (Just 75 cents after your tax credit!)
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: IMPORTANT: Message from Mélanie Joly
message.text:
"Our values are more than just words. They inform our decisions. Decisions we get to make because we gave everything we could -- and more -- to win in 2015
I need you to make this decision right now. Can you give any amount you can to help?"
-Mï¿½lanie Joly MP, Ahuntsic-Cartierville
Mï¿½lanie Joly is calling on you to take an immediate and important action.
Please donate any amount you can right now so we can hit our mission-critical, $1-million fundraising goal by midnight, December 15.
https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change-champion
And take a look at our special thank you gifts -- available for a limited-time only (until midnight, December 15)!
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Thank you, Michael
message.text:
Michael--
I'm so grateful.
I've just seen the extraordinary numbers coming in from this grassroots fundraising drive, and I can't say it enough: Thank you.
It's moving to know that 3,554 of you have decided to become champions for real change, chipping in a grand total of $269,044. We're well on our way to hitting $1-million by midnight, December 15 so we can start 2017 strong. And if this keeps up, we could continue to have more grassroots supporters than any other federal political party.
It's not too late to join them. You, too, can be a part of this surge of grassroots donations coming in from every part of the country if you give $5, or whatever you can, right now.
When you do, you'll enjoy the feeling of knowing you did everything you could in this drive to build our campaign for 2016, and to keep building a better future for all Canadians. I'll be tremendously grateful for your contribution.
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Justin Trudeau: "Extraordinary numbers"
message.text:
"I've just seen the extraordinary numbers coming in from this fundraising drive, and I can't say it enough: Thank you.
It's moving to know that 3,792 of you have decided to become everyday champions for real change, chipping in a grand total of $285,215.
It's not too late to join them. You, too, can be a part of this surge of grassroots donations coming in from every part of the country."
- Justin Trudeau
Michael -- Justin Trudeau is looking to you to be ambitious. To be a real change champion.
Please chip in any amount you can afford right now so we can hit our goal of $1-million by midnight, December 15 -- and keep our party strong.
https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change-champion/
Don't forget! Our terrific, limited-time only Liberal toques and scarves disappear at midnight, December 15. Make sure you get yours!
Chip in now at https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thanks for all your support!
Liberal Party of Canada
ï¿½

Update profile | Unsubscribe

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Got you covered, Michael
message.text:
Morning, Michael!
Before you do anything else today, remember this: In less than 4 days our limited- edition Liberal toques and scarves will be gone for good!
And if you're looking for a way to show your support for our movement, celebrate our hard work, and gear up for everything we want to accomplish together -- we've got you covered!
Get the Liberal Winter toque when you donate $99 or more! As little as 24.75 after your 2016 tax credit.
Get the Liberal Winter scarf when you give $199 or more! As little as 49.75 after your 2016 tax credit.
Get the whole ensemble when you give $299 or more! As little as $74.75 after your 2016 tax credit.
Over 3,500 Canadians have already chipped in over $300,000 to help raise $1-million together by midnight, December 15 -- less than 4 days away. And we're going to need you to chip in right now so we can to make this all-important goal.
https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thanks for all your support!
Liberal Party of Canada
ï¿½

Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: please read [important]
message.text:
You still have unused tax credits for 2016.
Don't miss out on maximising your savings!
4,046 Canadians have already chipped in $310,843 to take advantage of their tax savings and help us hit our $1-million dollar goal by midnight, December 15.
Don't wait another minute!
Take a look at your 2016 donor record and please chip in, right now.
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0 %%[Output(FormatCurrency(@Room,"en-US",0,))]%% -->
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
ï¿½

message.subject: Randy Boissonnault: "If we don't take action now..."
message.text:
We believe that Canada is a place where the differences between one neighbour and the next are an opportunity to learn from each other, to live in a better community, and to build a stronger country.
That said, there are forces at play in our country who would like to use these differences between us in a cynical way. And they could erase all our progress on election night in 2019 - if we don't take action now.
Randy Boissonnault MP, Edmonton Centre
Michael -- Randy Boissonault is calling on you to step up and help protect our progress. You've worked too hard to help build the most open and inclusive movement in Canada-- don't leave anything to chance.
Please chip in any amount you can right now so we can hit our critical goal of $1-million fundraising goal by midnight, December 15.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
ï¿½

message.subject: Wow!
message.text:
Michael
Justin Trudeau asked you to do something AMBITIOUS this week -- something BIG.
4,730 Canadians have answered his call to action and we just crossed the $380,000 mark!
Our momentum is growing with every single donation. Be a part of it!
You could be the one who makes the difference -- and helps us hit $1-million by midnight, Dec 15!
Take a look at your 2016 donor record and please chip in, right now.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
Give $3
Give $5
Give $20
Give $50
Give $99
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
ï¿½

message.subject: Inspiring
message.text:
Michael --
It's been an ambitious and inspiring year.
I'm so proud of everything we've achieved so far to ensure a cleaner, more sustainable future for our families and for generations to come.
But there are those who think we should be moving backward, not forward. If they get their way, everything we've achieved together could be wiped away on election night in 2019 -- if we don't do everything we can today.
4,986 Canadians have already become real change champions, donating $408,036 toward our $1-million goal. I'm so grateful for their generosity.
But time is running out, and we won't be able to start 2017 strong if you're not a part of this incredible surge of grassroots support.
Can you give $5 -- or any amount you can -- right now?
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
Thank you.
Catherine McKenna MP, Ottawa Centre
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Top priority
message.text:
{FirstName) -- you still have unused tax credits for 2016.
Don't miss out on maximising your savings!
WITHOUT YOU: WE WILL NOT MAKE OUR $1-MILLION GOAL. WITH YOU: OUR MOVEMENT WILL BE STRONGER.
Please donate now -- help hit our top-priority $1-million goal -- so our party can keep fighting hard to build a better future for all Canadians.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD FOR
Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: From Justin and I -- thank you, Michael
message.text:
Michael -- Every time I see a baby or a child I smile deep from the heart. It's been like that for as long as I can remember!
And it reminds me of how important our work for our country is. Together we're building a Canada that is above all, a home -- like no other place on earth. A place where families both young and old, people from all over the world - are all supported for their differences.
Your support and vision have helped build the most open and inclusive movement in Canada. For everything you do, Michael, Justin and I want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts.
And because of our work together now, the next generation of Canadians will also thank you. They will thank you for supporting a progressive vision for our country. And they will thank you for showing the world that an ambitious country can also be a compassionate country.
That's why I'm calling on you now -- to help protect our progress and make our movement even stronger by being a champion of Real Change.
Please donate any amount you can, and join the 5,493 Canadians who have donated $456,691 to help raise $1-million by midnight, tonight - so our party can keep working hard to build a better future for all Canadians.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
And remember, Michael -- as special thank you we have some terrific gifts lined up so you can show your Liberal pride this winter. A toque -- designed by you -- for everyone who donates $99, or more. A scarf, if you give $199, or more. And the full set if you give $299, or more. Remember, after your tax credit, that's as low as $24.75 for the toque, $49.75 for the scarf, or $74.75 for both.
With deep gratitude, Sophie Grï¿½goire Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

-

message.subject: Michael, don't let this offer slip away!
message.text:
LAST 2 DAYS TO GET THE LIBERAL WINTER GEAR THAT SHOWS YOUR SUPPORT FOR REAL CHANGE.
Don't wait another second. Once our limited-time only Liberal winter gear is gone - it's gone for good.
Hard work without a warm, stylish toque? We wouldn't dream of leaving you out in the cold!
GET YOUR TOQUE NOW: https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change- champion/
Want to help grow our open, inclusive movement this winter? But not without bundling up with a cozy scarf (your mom will thank us!).
GET YOUR SCARF NOW: https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change- champion/
Super keen on doing everything you can to help protect our progress and build a better future for all Canadians?
We're counting on you! Get inspired with the full Liberal winter ensemble!
THE FULL SET PLEASE: https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change- champion/
Or give any amount you can right now - be an everyday champion for real change -- and help us hit our ambitious goal of $1-million by midnight tomorrow. We won't make it without you, Michael
ï¿½

message.subject: [time sensitive] Unused 2016 tax credits
message.text:
INCREDIBLE!
Individual grassroots donations from Canadians just like you - everyday champions for Real Change -- made this happen:
BUT WE'RE NOT THERE YET.
You can be the difference maker. Be a grassroots supporter who gets us to our ambitious $1-million goal by midnight, tomorrow.
You're the one, Michael. Be a part of this momentum. Please donate now.
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD FOR
Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion
ï¿½

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: Absolutely urgent, Michael
message.text:
Michael,
Two weeks ago we set an ambitious goal for our movement.
Whether we reach that goal -- or fall short, it all comes down to the choice you make right now.
We only have until midnight tonight to reach $1-million in grassroots online donations.
Over 6,869 everyday champions for real change -- your neighbours, friends and supporters from coast-to-coast-to-coast -- have chipped in an incredible $592,605 so far.
But we won't make it without you, Michael.
It's time to go all in, to be ambitious, to be a part of something big -- and to keep building a better future for all Canadians. Our movement is counting on you.
Can you chip in $5, or whatever you can, right now, so our real progress can continue?
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: [important update] Tax credit info enclosed
message.text:
Michael -- don't forget about your unused 2016 tax credits
To learn how to maximize your savings -- read on!
Michael -- YOU CAN SAVE BIG BY GIVING RIGHT NOW.
Every moment that goes by, more and more Canadians are chipping in -- bringing us closer to our $1-million goal - and taking advantage of their 2016 tax credits.
Can you help take us the rest of the way?
BE PART OF THIS MOMENT.
Check your status now, and please donate what you can!
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD FOR
Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/Become-a-Real-Change-Champion

message.subject: Community
message.text:
Michael --
I feel fortunate to come from a strong and loving family that taught me the value of giving back to the community.
Integrity, inclusion, fairness, accountability and service. Those are the values that guide my life and my work.
That's why I feel so grateful that I am able to work hard to contribute to our movement as an everyday champion for real change. And it's why I believe so strongly in the Canada we are building together.
It's a Canada that embraces everyone, that recognizes different religions, ethnicities and languages. It is the Canada we know and love.
We've worked so hard to get this far. We want to continue our work beyond election night in 2019. Let's continue to work towards building our next campaign together.
That's why I'm hoping you'll give $5, or whatever you can, right now. Because we can't leave the Canada our grandparents envisioned, and that our grandchildren deserve, to chance.
So far, 7,593 champions for real change have donated $678,562 toward our $1-million goal. But time is running out before midnight, December 15. We need your help to start 2017 strong.
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thank you.
Jody Wilson-Raybould MP, Vancouver-Granville
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Justin Trudeau: "Go all in"
message.text:
'It's time to go all in, to be ambitious, to be a part of something big -- and to keep building a better future for all Canadians. Our movement is counting on you.' -Justin Trudeau
There are just hours to our midnight deadline to raise $1-million. An extraordinary 7,980 everyday champions for real change have donated $730,562 -- thank you all!
Show Justin Trudeau that you're up to this ambitious task.
Please give what you can now -- we won't make it without you
https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/become-a-real-change-champion/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: [deadline] This is it, Michael
message.text:
Michael - there's no time to lose. This is your last chance to step up and reach our critical $1-million online grassroots fundraisingï¿½goal.
It's urgent you reply to this email -- and here's exactly why:
If you join with the hundreds of Canadians donating every hour, you'll have the satisfaction of having worked with the 8,432 Canadians who stepped up as champions for real change to achieve something BIG.
You can join them by making an immediate donation of $50, $25, or even $5. Without you, and without your support -- this movement that you've worked so hard to build is simply not as strong. The Conservatives will soon be rallying behind a new leader, so it's important that we start 2017 strong.
So far we've raised $839,080 toward our ambitious $1-million dollar goal -- all from online grassroots donations from Canadians like you.
If you chip in any amount you canï¿½-ï¿½right now - you'll help make sure that goal is achieved, ensuring that our party will be able to fight even harder for a better future for all Canadians.
Canadians are counting on you to do this. Justin Trudeau is counting on you to do this. So let's do this, Michael. Show Canadians that you're up to the task of building a better future together.
https://go.liberal.ca/become-a-real-change-champion/
Thank you.
Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Sign the card: Wish the Trudeau family a Happy Holidays!
message.text:
>From your family to theirs, send the Trudeaus your holiday cheer.
Michael,
Wish the Trudeau family Happy Holidays!
Sign the card: https://www.liberal.ca/wish-the-trudeau-family-happy-holidays/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: Big news, big thanks
message.text:
REAL CHANGE - READY TO SHARE - DECEMBER 2016 Real change, in one place, just for you. The latest updates, straight from LPC HQ
---
Thank you!
On December 1 we set an ambitious goal for our movement, and you delivered in a BIG way. To help us start 2017 strong, 10,483 Canadians have already generously contributed $1,013,778 in grassroots online donations this month alone.
Thank you for everything you do for this movement!
Chip in now: https://go.liberal.ca/page/contribute/get-your-2016-tax-credit/
---
'We gather here in this moment to reflect on the first year of this journey to build a new relationship, one based on recognition and respect.'
-Justin Trudeau
Read the full speech to the Assembly of First Nations: http://www.liberal.ca/speech- assembly-of-first-nations/
---
Meet the New LPC National Director
After an extensive four-month search, the Liberal Party of Canada has recruited leading campaign mobilization expert, Azam Ishmael, to serve as our new National Director.
Meet Azam: http://www.liberal.ca/liberals-recruit-top-mobilization-leader-as-new- national-director/
---
Thousands of grassroots Liberals have helped shape the 10 new party by-laws that will make our movement more open, responsive, and campaign-focused than ever before.
Read the by-laws: http://www.liberal.ca/1party/
---
Let's Leave a Better World for our Kids
Following the First Minister's meeting on December 9, Canada now has a strong new agreement to fight climate change, create jobs, and leave a cleaner environment for our kids.
Read the full plan: https://www.canada.ca/en/services/environment/weather/climatechange/pan-canadian- framework.html
---
Our Holiday Gift to You:
Take 15% off everything in the Liberal Boutique with the discount code START2017STRONG
Shop now: https://boutique.liberal.ca/
---
The Team: Carolyn Bennett
Carolyn Bennett, Minister of Indigenous Affairs and Northern Development, and MP for Toronto-St. Paul's has been named one of Foreign Policy's Global Thinkers of 2016 for her work on the National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls.
Learn more: https://gt.foreignpolicy.com/2016/profile/carolyn-bennett-and-marion- buller
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Michael, join us in wishing the Trudeau family a Happy Holidays!
message.text:
Michael --
With your help, the team here at LPC is putting together an awesome surprise for the Trudeau family this Holiday season: A special holiday card signed by thousands of Liberal supporters from every corner of the country.
But I need your help to make it truly special.
So far over 17,000 Canadians have signed our Holiday card. That's terrific, but I know we can do even better.
I'm hoping that I'll be able to tell Justin and Sophie that over 20,000 Liberals signed our card before midnight on December 22.
Imagine how grateful the Trudeau family will be to know so many Liberals from all across the country - including you Michael! - have sent season's greetings.
Please take a moment to spread some festive cheer and sign our holiday card for the Trudeau family. I know they'll appreciate your warm wishes!
Sign the card: https://www.liberal.ca/wish-the-trudeau-family-happy-holidays/
Thank you for everything you do. Happy Holidays and all the best to you in the year to come!
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: Your name would look great on this card, Michael!
message.text:
Michael
We think that your name would look great on this card:
HAPPY HOLIDAYS TO HADRIEN, ELLA-GRACE, XAVIER SOPHIE & JUSTIN
From: You!
Spread some festive cheer!
Get your name on the card before midnight tonight!
Sign the card: https://www.liberal.ca/wish-the-trudeau-family-happy-holidays/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Thank you so very much, Michael
message.text:
Family is about unity, openness, courage, love and perseverance. This holiday season, may we celebrate these values that unite us all!
And Michael, Justin and I would like to offer you and your loved ones our family's warmest holiday wishes.
[PHOTO]
Across the country, Canadians like you are part of our extended family. Some have always called Canada home. And for some, Canada is a new home -- where generations to come will build their lives and help grow our great country.
To all of you, thank you so very much -- for the warmth you've extended to my family, for your continued hard work to make this a better country for all Canadians, and for your support and faith in our Liberal team.
We have much more we want to achieve for our country together, and 2017 is sure to bring new opportunities and challenges. That's why I am calling on you now -- please, during this time of giving, your generosity will help our party continue our important work together to keep building stronger communities across the country.
Michael, we are tremendously grateful for your support. Every single donation counts -- and any amount is truly appreciated to help us start the new year strong.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
With deep gratitude, Sophie Grï¿½goire Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Boxing week special: Toques are back!
message.text:
Michael,
With all the hard work coming up in 2017 we wanted to give you ONE LAST CHANCE to get your limited-edition Liberal winter toque!
Be one of the first 550 donors to give $99 or more (as low as $24.75 after your 2016 tax credit), and we'll send you one of our VERY LAST Liberal winter toques as a thank you!
But don't put it off. Once these are gone, we're not making more! REALLY!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thanks for all your support this year. It makes all the difference.
Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: We can do this, Michael
message.text:
Michael,
The Conservative Party is ready to start 2017 on the offensive. They'll have a new leader and the war chest they need to try to roll back the progress we're making together for a stronger middle class.
This is our last chance to out-raise the Conservative Party in 2016 -- so we can start 2017 strong and keep building the Canada we believe in.
LPC projections have the Conservatives closing the year at as much $18-million. We're at least $1-million behind. Can you help us close the gap?
Together, we can do this.
Michael, please chip in any amount you can afford right now.
When you do, you'll get a chance to maximize your 2016 tax credits on federal political contributions.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thank you,
Justin Trudeau
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-
