message.subject: CHART: Your guide to 2016 tax credits
message.text:
Michael Just 4 days left to take advantage of your 2016 tax credits on political contributions!
The clock is ticking -- give now, get that tax credit, and help us close the $1-million gap with the Conservatives by midnight, December 31. Let's start 2017 strong!
As low as $24.75 after your tax credit!
Or give another amount: https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: [please read] About your 2016 tax credits
message.text:
IN LESS THAN 4 DAYS YOUR UNUSED 2016 TAX CREDITS WILL DISAPPEAR FOR GOOD.
Michael -- you'll sleep better tonight if: You make sure to check your 2016 donor record -- and chip in right now to maximize your 2016 tax credit for federal political donations!
Total Donated in 2016: $0 Estimated 2016 Tax Savings: $0 Suggested Donation: $3 - just 75 cents after your 2016 tac credit!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Let's check this off our 2016 list
message.text:
Michael --
On December 31 of last year, I wrote a checklist with my three big goals for our movement in 2016. I've crossed off two out of three, but I still need your help with the third -- and time is running out!
Back in May, we passed a new constitution, seizing a once-in-a-generation opportunity to modernize, strengthen, and open up our party for the 21st century. It's now easier than ever for Canadians who share our values to register for free as Liberals, shape party policy, participate locally, and organize and win local campaigns.
>From testing new campaign tactics in the field and achieving the best Liberal result in 42 years in the Medicine Hat-Cardston-Warner by-election, to growing our data and digital campaign capacity, this year we were already looking ahead to 2019. We have one job: prepare for and win the next election.
Here's where we fell short. While we have more Canadians stepping up to give than any other federal political party, the Conservatives are still on track to out-raise us this year. We've only got today, tomorrow and Saturday until midnight to change that -- and all of our work together to support real change is riding on it.
That's where you come in. If you help, you'll get a chance to maximize your 2016 tax credits on federal political contributions. Take a look at the chart below to see how much you'll save.
Our projections have them closing the year at $18-million. We're less than a $1-million behind.
We can do this. Just like we've achieved every big, ambitious goal we've set for ourselves.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thank you for your support.
Anna Gainey President Liberal Party Of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: [time sensitive]: 2016 tax credits will disappear
message.text:
Michael-- 3 days left to
Please check your 2016 donor record then chip in -- help close our $1-million gap with the Conservatives by midnight, December 31 -- and take advantage of your tax credits on political contributions.
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD FOR
Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
ï¿½

message.subject: Something extraordinary is happening
message.text:
Michael --
I've been keeping a close eye on our fundraising dashboard this morning, and something extraordinary is happening.
Canadians from every corner of the country are chipping in to help us close in on the Conservatives.
Take a look -- the gap is narrowing, but time is also running out.
LPC Fundraising Dashboard
LPC Revenue (Actual 2016): $17M CPC Revenue (Estimated 2016): $18M Amountï¿½to closeï¿½theï¿½gap: $1,000,000
With just today and tomorrow until midnight left to reach our goal, I noticed you haven't donated to this final fundraising drive -- yet.
Don't miss out on your unused tax credit for political donations. Have a look at your 2016 donor record and then pitch in so we can keep building our movement for real change.
2016 REAL CHANGE RECORD FOR: Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thank you and have a safe and happy New Year.
Stephen Bronfman Chief Revenue Officer, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.

message.subject: How to save big on your 2016 taxes
message.text:
Michael
2,695 Canadians have already chipped in -- taking advantage of their 2016 tax credits and helping us close our $1-million gap with the Conservative Party by midnight, December 31.
Don't risk losing your unused 2016 tax credits! Please chip in now.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
December 28 - 30, 9 AM - 9 PM ET ï¿½ | ï¿½ December 31, 9 AM - Midnight ET
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Disappearing! Your unused 2016 tax credits
message.text:
BIG FLAG, Michael. All your unused 2016 tax credits for federal political donations expire tomorrow at midnight!
3,017 Canadians have already chipped in $390,875 to take advantage of their tax credits and help hit our $1-million goal by midnight, December 31.
But we can't make that goal -- and close the gap on the Conservatives -- without you, Michael!
Please take a look at your 2016 donor record and please chip in, right now.
2016 SUPPORTER RECORD FOR
Michael
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0 -- don't miss out on getting up to $650 tax credits -- donate now! https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Suggested donation to become an everyday real change champion: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
December 28 - 30, 9 AM - 9 PM ET ï¿½ | ï¿½ December 31, 9 AM - Midnight ET
ï¿½
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: You really have the Liberal team's attention, Michael!
message.text:
Michael -- Wow! Now you really have the Liberal team's attention! Did you see who has emailed you since December 26?
Sophie Grï¿½goire Trudeau emailed you a special holiday greeting and asked for your to help to keep our party strong.
Justin Trudeau emailed you -- he's looking to you to help our party build the Canada we believe in by raising $1-million in grassroots donations by midnight, tomorrow.
Stephen Bronfman emailed you with an urgent mandate -- to help close the fundraising gap with the Conservatives Party.
Anna Gainey emailed you to help complete our party's 2016 checklist. And we've been emailing you from LPC HQ -- about your unused 2016 tax credits -- they expire at midnight, tomorrow!
Can we all count you in with 3,434 Canadians who have already donated $466,782 to help reach our mission-critical $1-million goal -- to help us out-raise the Conservatives by midnight, tomorrow?
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thanks for all your support this year. It makes all the difference.
Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: I'm personally asking, Michael
message.text:
Michael --
This morning, our movement looks back on an extraordinary year -- and ahead to the exciting opportunities of 2017.
This year we achieved great things.
We began lifting 300,000 children out of poverty with the new Canadian Child Benefit, which gives more money to 9 out of 10 families. We raised taxes on the wealthiest 1%, while lowering them for nine million Canadians with our middle class tax cut. And we brought the provinces together to strengthen the Canada pension plan, to support the secure retirement that Canadians deserve.
But delivering on our core election promises to help the middle class is just the beginning.
2017 will see us continue to move forward with historic investments in infrastructure and our pan-Canadian plan for pricing carbon pollution, initiatives that will create good middle class jobs, and help us build a better Canada for future generations.
I am tremendously grateful for the support, generosity and hard work of all Canadians who call this movement their own.
Still, there is so much more work to be done, including working together in the final hours of this year to out-raise the Conservatives and send a strong signal about our commitment to keep building on our progress.
That's why I'm asking you to think of someone you care about and to make a donation, not just because you believe in our movement , but for them. Because you both deserve a government that believes that in Canada, better is always possible .
If you do chip in, you'll get a chance to maximize your 2016 tax credits on federal political contributions. Take a look at the chart below to see how much you'll save.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thank you.
Justin Trudeau Leader of the Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe

-

message.subject: URGENT: Michael, you're missing out on tax savings
message.text:
ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½URGENTï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
ï¿½ï¿½WHAT HAPPENS TO YOUR UNUSED 2016 TAX CREDITSï¿½ï¿½ ï¿½ï¿½AT MIDNIGHT?ï¿½ï¿½
ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½GONE FOR GOOD.ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½
Michael -- by taking a quick moment right now to check your 2016 supporter record, you could help us start strong in 2017 while saving yourself money at tax time -- quite a bit of money.
But put it off -- and you could miss out on your savings!
2016 SUPPORTER RECORD
Please review your 2016 donation history -- and take advantage of up to $650 in end- of-year tax credits on federal political donations:
Total donated in 2016: $0
Estimated 2016 tax savings: $0 -- Don't miss out on getting up to $650 tax credits -- donate now!
Suggested 2016 donation: $3 -- Just 75 cents after your tax credit!
**If you've made a recent donation using a different email address, contributed by cheque or mail, or made a donation to a local LPC riding association it may not be reflected in this record. Tax credit estimates based solely on amounts donated to LPC. If you have any questions about your donations or tax receipts please give us a call. Thank you for your continued support!
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Want to donate by phone?
Call 1-888-LIBERAL (542-3725)
December 28 - 30, 9 AM - 9 PM ET ï¿½ | ï¿½ December 31, 9 AM - Midnight ET
ï¿½

message.subject: Justin Trudeau: "Tremendously grateful"
message.text:
'I am tremendously grateful for the support, generosity and hard work of all Canadians who call this movement their own.
Still, there is so much more work to be done, including working together in the final hours of this year to out-raise the Conservative Party and send a strong signal about our commitment to keep building on our progress.'
- Justin Trudeau
Michael -- this week, Justin Trudeau set an ambitious $1-million grassroots fundraising goal for us and we have until midnight to show him we can do it.
Remember! Your unused 2016 tax credits disappear at midnight tonight! 4,817 Canadians have already chipped in $658,900 -- taking advantage of their tax savings -- but there’s no way we can hit $1-million to out-raise the Conservative Party by midnight without you.
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thanks for all your support this year. It makes all the difference.
Liberal Party of Canada

message.subject: Last chance, Michael
message.text:
Michael --
When this clock hits zero, we say goodbye to 2016, a year where the Liberal team delivered on some of our biggest election promises: lower taxes for middle class Canadians, more money for families to raise their kids, and real action to fight climate change while growing our economy.
2016 was also a year where our movement - your movement - saw incredible growth. Nearly 50,000 Canadians have joined since the summer alone, and we've worked hard together to build the broadest base of grassroots support of any Canadian political party.
Thank you for everything you've done this year, Michael.
But before this clock hits zero, I'm counting on you to rally with us, and make a contribution towards our end of year fundraising drive. Because:
This is your last chance to maximize your 2016 tax credit for federal political contributions. For a donation of $5, you could get up to $3.75 back.
This is your last chance to help close out the gap with the Conservative Party. Only you can help us get there.
This is your last chance to support the team that is delivering real progress to Canadians on every coast, and in every province and territory.
So, before time runs out at midnight tonight, will you chip in $5, or whatever works for you and help us start 2017 off strong?
https://go.liberal.ca/start-2017-strong
Thank you, Michael. Your support of our movement is so important. We couldn't do it without you.
Christina Topp Interim National Director, Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Stephen Harper is back
message.text:
Michael --
It's still the early days of 2017, but our work to strengthen and grow Canada's middle class continues - all powered by your incredible support and hard work. Thank you, Michael.
In fact, our work together is more important than ever. In the last few months, the Conservative Party's leadership candidates have opposed middle class tax cuts, denied climate change, opposed marriage equality, committed to screening all immigrants for "anti-Canadian values," and even promised to lock up all union members. One of these candidates will be their next leader.
And just this week, the Conservative Party sent out a national note from their newest fundraising director - Stephen Harper. His mandate is to out-raise Canada's Liberal movement and ensure that his party is "well prepared to fight the 2019 election". We know that while he was Prime Minister, the Conservative Party out-raised the Liberal Party by over $91 million.
Michael, together we can make sure it doesn't happen again.
Canada's Liberal movement counts upon the broadest base of grassroots supporters of any political party - and we know that your active support is our biggest advantage.
https://www.liberal.ca/say-you-are-in-for-2017/?email=liberal@mikesmit.com&SCID=1 03536128&sf_campaign=701j0000001qHNF&utm_source=liberal&utm_medium=email& amp;utm_campaign=20170110_BC_SYI2017
2017 brings exciting opportunities for the Liberal team to continue our progress together to support Canada's middle class, and there's much more hard work ahead of us than behind us.
The Conservative Party will choose Stephen Harper's replacement on May 27. Before they do, let's make sure we're fully prepared today to support Justin Trudeau's commitment to real change and positive politics.
Thanks for everything you do.
Braeden Caley Senior Director, Communications Liberal Party of Canada
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Quick Survey: Justin Trudeau wants to hear from you
message.text:
"Engaging in our democracy, sharing concerns, asking questions, and offering suggestions - they're all part of the active citizenship that we need more of in our country. And it's how we move Canada forward - together." - Justin Trudeau
Michael It's a new year and Justin Trudeau wants to hear from you!
How are you feeling early in this new year?
What issues are top of mind for you?
How do you think the Liberal Party of Canada is doing in our work together to deliver real change for Canadians?
Take our super-quick, 2017 New Year Check-in Survey and let us know!
https://www.liberal.ca/new-year-check-in-survey-2017/

message.subject: Quick Survey: Justin Trudeau wants to hear from you
message.text:
"Engaging in our democracy, sharing concerns, asking questions, and offering suggestions - they're all part of the active citizenship that we need more of in our country. And it's how we move Canada forward - together." - Justin Trudeau
Michael It's a new year and Justin Trudeau wants to hear from you!
How are you feeling early in this new year?
What issues are top of mind for you?
How do you think the Liberal Party of Canada is doing in our work together to deliver real change for Canadians?
Take our super-quick, 2017 New Year Check-in Survey and let us know!
https://www.liberal.ca/new-year-check-in-survey-2017/
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-

message.subject: Announcing the 2017 Liberal Internship Program
message.text:
Michael --
Working in politics is among the most exciting and rewarding professional experiences there are. It's how I got my start -- working with the Liberal team in the nation's capital -- and why I'm honoured to help recruit the next generation of leaders by announcing the 2017 Liberal Internship Program.
If you've dreamed of making a difference, the Liberal Internship Program will give you a great start. And with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's commitment to positive politics, you'll be learning directly from experienced campaign leaders who share these values.
Sound like something you can't wait to be a part of? Well, we're looking for a talented, diverse, and energetic group of young Canadian leaders to join Justin Trudeau's team this summer. You'll be helping us continue to grow Canada's Liberal movement from coast to coast to coast.
As a paid, full-time 2017 Liberal Intern over the summer, you will join a passionate, collaborative, and data-driven team that is already hard at work across Canada. You will have the opportunity to learn directly from the people who paved our road to victory in 2015 -- and those who are hard at work planning for the next election.
Whether it's reaching out to Canadians with our communications team in Ottawa, learning all about cutting-edge campaigns from our National Field team, or joining our local Field Organizers across the country as they lay the groundwork for 2019, I can't wait to welcome you to our team.
Apply now -- http://www.liberal.ca/2017-liberal-internship-program/
Thank you, Anna Gainey President Liberal Party of Canada
-

message.subject: A new year and an even stronger movement
message.text:
REAL CHANGE - READY TO SHARE - JANUARY 2017 Real change, in one place, just for you. The latest updates, straight from LPC HQ
---
Real change, in one place, just for you. The latest updates, straight from LPC HQ
Ready to support positive politics in Canada? Say you're in for 2017 and let's show we're ready to keep working hard to deliver real change for Canadians!
I'm in for 2017! -- https://www.liberal.ca/say-you-are-in-for-2017/
Movement Milestone: 50,000 Registered Liberals since last summer alone And counting! Since the summer alone, 50,000 Canadians from coast to coast to coast have signed up as new registered Liberals.
Join the movement! -- https://www.liberal.ca/register/
Justin Trudeau -- Town Hall Tour 2017 "Engaging in our democracy, sharing concerns, asking questions, and offering suggestions - they're all part of the active citizenship that we need more of in our country. And it's how we move Canada forward - together."
Justin Trudeau is checking in with Canadians from coast-coast-to-coast early this new year.
Catch up with the tour -- https://www.facebook.com/JustinPJTrudeau/videos/10155111808990649/
The Team: Haley Brown
Haley Brown to be Team Trudeau candidate in Calgary Midnapore
"Haley Brown is a passionate advocate for middle class families in her community and across Canada, and I know that she will be a tireless champion for Calgary Midnapore in Ottawa." - Justin Trudeau
Meet Haley Now -- https://www.liberal.ca/haley-brown-to-be-team-trudeau-candidate-in- calgary-midnapore/
What They're Saying: Canada Child Benefit Lots of you have been letting us know how the Canada Child Benefit is helping your family pay for the high cost of raising your kids.
Nine out of ten Canadian families are receiving more money than before.
Here are some of the ways it's helping real Canadians, just like you. -- https://www.liberal.ca/what-theyre-saying-the-canada-child-benefit/
Watch the video
Quick Survey: 2017 New Year Check-in Our 2017 goal is to build an even stronger, more inclusive, and more open Liberal movement than ever before -- and we want your input!
Over 19,000 Canadians have already responded. Are you ready to be heard? -- https://www.liberal.ca/new-year-check-in-survey-2017/
The Team: Ahmed Hussen
Ahmed Hussen, serves as MP for York South-Weston and has been recently named Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship. A lawyer and social activist, he has a proven track record of leadership and community empowerment.
[Learn More] -- http://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/politics/from-refugee-to- immigration-minister-ahmed-hussen-appointed-cabinet-role/article33573878/
Did somebody say shuffle? Learn all about 2017's newly named Ministers and their portfolios, now! -- http://pm.gc.ca/eng/cabinet
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com

message.subject: Michael, we want to know what you think
message.text:
Michael
Our 2017 goal is to build an even stronger, more inclusive and more open Liberal movement than ever before.
So tell us:
What are your top priorities to grow and strengthen our middle class? What is essential to building a strong democracy? How important are positive politics to you?
We know you have valuable input about these important topics. And we can't wait to hear what it is!
Take our super-quick, New Year Check-in Survey before midnight, January 25 -- and tell us what's on your mind.
[Have your say]
Over 20,100 Canadians have already had their say. Survey deadline is midnight, January 31 -- so don't wait too long!
This email was sent to: liberal@mikesmit.com
Update profile | Unsubscribe
To contact the Liberal Party of Canada, please email assistance@liberal.ca. Our mailing address: 350 Albert Street, Suite 920 Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 6M8, CA. Authorized by the The Federal Liberal Agency of Canada, registered agent for the Liberal Party of Canada.
We respect your right to privacy - go here to view our policy.
-
